Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: lashworm
Desc 1: This is an ugly, mottled gray worm, about three feet in length. It
Desc 2: appears to be eyeless, and weaves its head about in the air as if
Desc 3: searching for something. This hideous beast has a mouth full of
Desc 4: extremely sharp teeth, and is known to strike with lightning speed.

Name: filthbug
Desc 1: The filthbug is a two foot long beetle-like creature. It has a black
Desc 2: and brown spotted shell, and long spindly legs with small claws on
Desc 3: the ends. The filthbug is known to be a scavenger, and though it does
Desc 4: not pose much of a threat, its shell makes it tough to kill.

Name: carrion beast
Desc 1: This creature is an obvious mutation: it is the size of a small dog,
Desc 2: and is furred, but has six jointed legs and a snout bristling with
Desc 3: gnarled fangs. The carrion beast is known to be a berserker when
Desc 4: disturbed, and can be tough to kill.

Name: acid slime
Desc 1: This is a small bluish glob of protoplasm, a product of strange
Desc 2: magical mutations. It moves quite slowly, and is fairly easy to hit
Desc 3: as it does not dodge, but it can deal serious and painful wounds with
Desc 4: its pseudopods.

Name: orc rogue
Desc 1: With its squinting narrow eyes, sharp pointed teeth, and harsh,
Desc 2: callous demeanor, the figure before you could only be an orc. It is
Desc 3: wearing rigid leather armour, and carries a readied short sword. It
Desc 4: looks around furtively, as if searching for trouble.

Name: kobold thief
Desc 1: The creature before you stands about four feet tall, has small pointy
Desc 2: teeth, and is garbed in mismatched armour. It carries a short sword,
Desc 3: and flicks its eyes around nervously as it sneaks about.

Name: cave worm
Desc 1: This long, grey worm is about one foot in diameter, with pale
Desc 2: gelatinous eyes and a maw full of three inch long needle-sharp teeth.
Desc 3: It weaves about as if searching for prey. Cave worms are quite tough,
Desc 4: and when they hit inflict horrible jagged wounds.

Name: thug
Desc 1: This thug creeps around stealthily, looking for some unsuspecting
Desc 2: person to ambush and rob. He wears leather armour, and wields a nasty
Desc 3: looking spiked club.

Name: skeleton
Desc 1: The animated skeleton of a humanoid creature stands before you. Bits
Desc 2: of dried flesh cling to its yellow bones, and faint flickers of red
Desc 3: light can be seen in its eye sockets. The undead are known to be very
Desc 4: difficult to destroy, as they are already dead.

Name: zombie
Desc 1: This is an animated, rotting corpse. It walks around listlessly, and
Desc 2: its eyeless face gives no hint of emotion. The necromantic magic that
Desc 3: has animated this creation has made it quite tough to slay, and it is
Desc 4: imbued with an unnatural strength.

Name: guardsman
Desc 1: This is a fierce-looking guardsman. He wields a drawn broadsword and
Desc 2: carries a round shield, and his well-polished chainmail armour gleams
Desc 3: in the light. Guardsmen are known to be excellent fighters, and are
Desc 4: more than a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: guardsman
Desc 1: This is a fierce-looking guardsman. He wields a drawn broadsword and
Desc 2: carries a round shield, and his well-polished chainmail armour gleams
Desc 3: in the light. Guardsmen are known to be excellent fighters, and are
Desc 4: more than a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: shade
Desc 1: This is a shadowy spirit in the vague shape of a human, with glowing
Desc 2: red points of light where its eyes should be. It is hard to see, and
Desc 3: seems to fade in and out of existance.

Name: ghoul
Desc 1: This awful-looking creature appears to be a filthy, emaciated human -
Desc 2: until you see its glowing red eyes and sharp claws. Its frail
Desc 3: appearance belies powerful muscles, and it moves with surprising
Desc 4: grace.

Name: wight
Desc 1: This revolting undead creation is a bent, misshapen humanoid with
Desc 2: glowing red points for eyes, and cruelly-hooked claws. Despite its
Desc 3: gaunt appearance, you can see it is powerfully muscled, and moves
Desc 4: with the confident speed of a cat.

Name: orc sentry
Desc 1: This leather-clad warrior has the unmistakeable features of an orc.
Desc 2: It wields a wickedly sharp scimitar, and stands with uncharacteristic
Desc 3: discipline for its race.

Name: orc lieutenant
Desc 1: This tall, ferocious-looking orc wears chainmail and wields a razor-
Desc 2: sharp scimitar, a sure sign of high rank. He is disciplined and holds
Desc 3: himself in such a manner as to indicate that he knows how to use his
Desc 4: weapon skilfully.

Name: mercenary
Desc 1: This leather-clad warrior has a decidedly shifty appearance. The
Desc 2: readied longsword he carries is notched and looks as if it has seen
Desc 3: much use. These mercenaries are sometimes nothing more than hired
Desc 4: thugs, and this particular one seems to fit right into that category.

Name: half-ogre bodyguard
Desc 1: This huge warrior is unmistakeably a half-ogre, as his 7 foot tall
Desc 2: frame clearly shows. He looks strong enough to snap a human in two.
Desc 3: He is clad in leather armour and wields a massive hammer.

Name: Aiken
Desc 1: This bored-looking young man is apparently some sort of magician's
Desc 2: apprentice, if his robes and demeanor are anything to go by. He is
Desc 3: plain-looking, but is decently built, and has a gleam of intelligence
Desc 4: in his eye.

Name: Thuluk
Desc 1: Before you stands a powerfully-muscled dwarf, stocky and bare-
Desc 2: chested. His long braided beard is thrust through his belt, and a
Desc 3: broad double-bladed axe hangs at his side.

Name: Helfgrim
Desc 1: This tall, powerfully built man has long reddish hair and flashing
Desc 2: blue eyes. His ferocious demeanor is offset by his soft and calming
Desc 3: tone, which is more suited to a diplomat than to a weaponsmith. He
Desc 4: wears nicely-stitched leather clothes, and a broadsword sits nearby.

Name: Colin
Desc 1: Colin is a tall, moderately-built human with short, dark, greying
Desc 2: hair. He appears to be near fifty years of age, but he has a
Desc 3: youthfulness about him which is reflected in his slate-coloured eyes.
Desc 4: He appears to be one who would have many tales to tell.

Name: Skali
Desc 1: Skali is slim and bony, but is so well-muscled that he must not have
Desc 2: an ounce of fat on him. His long, lustreless brown hair is swept back
Desc 3: into a long ponytail, and he wears a thick leather apron. His thin
Desc 4: moustaches and squinting eyes give him a sinister appearance.

Name: Gurbultis
Desc 1: Gurbultis is quite short, even for a gnome, but more than makes up
Desc 2: for this fact in pure volume. He is very fat, and wears thick violet
Desc 3: robes and golden chains and rings of all sizes and types, so that he
Desc 4: jangles with each movement. He has a sullen, brooding look.

Name: Lady Sentara
Desc 1: The Lady Sentara is well-known as the most beautiful woman in
Desc 2: Silvermere. Though she must be nearing her fortieth year, she looks
Desc 3: barely older than half that. Her platinum-blonde hair, sea-blue eyes
Desc 4: and girlish figure have made many a man beg her hand in marriage.

Name: dark cultist
Desc 1: This black-robed figure is completely shrouded, so that you cannot
Desc 2: see even the smallest feature. It could be nearly any humanoid
Desc 3: creature. A black iron pendant in the shape of a five-pointed star
Desc 4: hangs around its neck, and it wields a curved shortsword.

Name: grey spider
Desc 1: This disgusting grey spider is huge, at least four feet long, and has
Desc 2: long hairy legs. Its cluster of eyes glitter malevolently, and it
Desc 3: scuttles around with blinding speed.

Name: mummy
Desc 1: This seven foot tall humanoid monstrosity is completely shrouded in
Desc 2: filthy, yellowed burial wrappings. Its every movement is made with
Desc 3: slow deliberation, and it reeks of decay and tomb rot, forcing you to
Desc 4: turn your head to avoid the fumes.

Name: bounty hunter
Desc 1: This man is garbed in well-worn chainmail, and a broad sword hangs on
Desc 2: his back. His skin is tanned and rough, and covered in many small
Desc 3: scars. He appears experienced and when he looks you up and down, you
Desc 4: get the impression that he is evaluating you abilities.

Name: dark cleric
Desc 1: The figure standing before you is clad in enameled black chainmail,
Desc 2: and wears a hooded mask so that you cannot see its face. It wields a
Desc 3: spiked morning-star, and carries a large shield with a hideous horned
Desc 4: skull emblazoned on it. It moves without uttering a sound.

Name: dark priest
Desc 1: This black-shrouded figure stares at you with unmistakeable
Desc 2: intensity. It wields a spiked mace which it waves about menacingly,
Desc 3: and it makes arcane gestures with its free hand.

Name: dark paladin
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is entirely clad in glittering black
Desc 2: chainmail. It wields a heavy broadsword and a black shield emblazoned
Desc 3: with a red horned skull. It stands with the practiced grace of a
Desc 4: competent warrior, and is likely to be a tough opponent.

Name: hellhound
Desc 1: This nightmarish creature looks at first glance to be a huge wolf
Desc 2: with greasy black fur. It is hideously misshapen, however, having
Desc 3: glowing crimson eyes and unnaturally large fangs. It wears a spiked
Desc 4: iron collar around its neck, in some sort of parody of domesticity.

Name: tentacled abomination
Desc 1: This disgusting beast looks like nothing you have ever seen before.
Desc 2: Its lumpy, scaly hide is a green so dark it is almost black. It walks
Desc 3: on four webbed legs, and is covered in a dozen spiky tentacles. It
Desc 4: has a powerful finned tail which it waves about menacingly.

Name: Guildmaster
Desc 1: This large, plain-looking man is garbed in fine clothing. His
Desc 2: features are thick and solid, as if he were made of stone. He looks
Desc 3: like a very sober man, but not unkind, and his eyes twinkle with a
Desc 4: light that belies his age.

Name: old man
Desc 1: This wizened man sits here on a carved wooden bench. He wears faded
Desc 2: grey robes with what appear to have once been symbols on them. His
Desc 3: gaze wanders around vaguely, but as you turn to look away you think
Desc 4: you seem him appraise you shrewdly out of the corner of his eye.

Name: Sheriff Lionheart
Desc 1: Silvermere's sheriff is an imposing figure -- six and a half feet of
Desc 2: pure muscle, he wears the crest of a lion on his chest, standing for
Desc 3: honor and truth. Icy blue eyes gaze from a face instilled with
Desc 4: vigilance and dedication to duty and justice.

Name: Giovanni
Desc 1: This tall, slim young man is dressed in tight, brightly coloured
Desc 2: clothing, and sports large golden hoops in his ears. He is quite
Desc 3: handsome, and his brilliant smile is almost disarming. He has an air
Desc 4: of almost exaggerated casualness about him.

Name: Meia
Desc 1: This delicate-looking woman has large, almond-shaped brown eyes and
Desc 2: long black hair down to her waist. She is quite young, and is as
Desc 3: beautiful as a fresh new flower. She bows slightly at your gaze, and
Desc 4: turns away, blushing.

Name: Sarkhee
Desc 1: Before you stands perhaps the handsomest goblin you have ever seen.
Desc 2: He wears embroidered red robes and a multitude of golden bracelets,
Desc 3: and his wiry black hair is slicked back. A pair of delicate
Desc 4: spectacles is perched on the end of his nose.

Name: bishop
Desc 1: This tall, well-built man is clad in sandals and the simple white
Desc 2: robe of his order. A large silver amulet hangs from around his neck
Desc 3: as some sort of symbol of office. He has dark blue eyes, greying hair
Desc 4: and the large rough hands of a farmer, and he smiles at you warmly.

Name: priest
Desc 1: This thin, handsome young man has dark curly hair down to his
Desc 2: shoulders, and clear blue eyes. He wears white robes and soft shoes,
Desc 3: and stares at your with a serious gaze.

Name: healer
Desc 1: This tall, solidly-built woman has bright green eyes and long blonde
Desc 2: hair which is plaited into one long braid hanging over her left
Desc 3: shoulder. She wears the same long white robes as her brethren, with
Desc 4: the difference that her sleeves are rolled up to her elbows.

Name: dark goblin archer
Desc 1: This sneaky-looking goblin has dusky grey skin and is clad in black
Desc 2: leather armour. It wields a short bow, and a shortsword swings by its
Desc 3: side.

Name: bandit
Desc 1: This sleazy-looking brigand wears studded leather armour, and wields
Desc 2: a broadsword as if he knows how to use it. He eyes you shiftily and
Desc 3: approaches with a sneer.

Name: wild dog
Desc 1: This filthy dog reeks quite badly, and shakes as if having a seizure.
Desc 2: It has a crazy look in its eyes, and foams profusely at the mouth.

Name: forest spider
Desc 1: This large brown spider has a small body and powerful head and jaws.
Desc 2: Its underbody is striped with white, and its two front legs are quite
Desc 3: short and have gripping claws.

Name: giant spider
Desc 1: This huge, revolting spider is quite hairy and is as black as jet.
Desc 2: Its cluster of faintly glowing eyes seems to mock you, and it moves
Desc 3: with deceptive slowness. You notice something shimmering on one of
Desc 4: its large fangs.

Name: dark goblin
Desc 1: This sly goblin has dusky grey skin and luminescent red eyes. He
Desc 2: wears black chainmail armour and wields a cruel-looking morningstar.
Desc 3: He leers evilly at you and chuckles.

Name: kobold slave
Desc 1: This pathetic-looking kobold is clad in nothing but filthy rags, and
Desc 2: wields a small knife.

Name: black orc
Desc 1: This tall, menacing-looking orc stands with uncharacteristic
Desc 2: discipline. He wears black chainmail armour, and wields a heavy
Desc 3: sword.

Name: dire wolf
Desc 1: This huge wolf stands nearly four feet in height, and is covered in
Desc 2: a glossy grey pelt. Its red eyes glare at you visciously, and it
Desc 3: bares its fangs and grows spitefully.

Name: slime beast
Desc 1: This large amorphous mass of slime is brownish-black in colour, and
Desc 2: oozes about disturbingly. Bits of unidentifiable objects poke out of
Desc 3: it occasionally.

Name: half-ogre warrior
Desc 1: This huge half-ogre wears brigandine armour, and wields a massive
Desc 2: maul as if it were a light club. It grins at you stupidly from
Desc 3: beneath its helm.

Name: Thrag
Desc 1: This huge, fifteen foot tall giant is garbed in the thick hides of
Desc 2: woodland animals, and wields a massive dark club in one hand. You spy
Desc 3: a golden sparkle from under his clothes. He sneers at you
Desc 4: contemptuously, hefts his club, and utters a bellowing cry!

Name: minotaur champion
Desc 1: This hideous, ten foot tall beast has the head and legs of a massive
Desc 2: black bull, and the body of an incredibly muscled man. He wields a
Desc 3: huge, bone-hafted greataxe with a heavy, single-edged blade. He leers
Desc 4: at you evilly, and his squinting red eyes are only filled with hate.

Name: boatman
Desc 1: This gnarled, weaselly-looking man has stringy gray hair and watery
Desc 2: green eyes. He is garbed in a shapeless robe that once might have
Desc 3: been a shade of blue, and his bony, calloused feet are bare and
Desc 4: tanned. He grins at you with an insane, lop-sided leer.

Name: crippled adventurer
Desc 1: This middle-aged man has a grizzled brown beard, only just beginning
Desc 2: to turn grey. He is missing his left leg, and walks with the aid of
Desc 3: a crutch. His right arm is withered and is swathed in bandages, and
Desc 4: one eye is simply a mass of scars. He moves as though in great pain.

Name: gigantic black ooze
Desc 1: This horiffic, immense blob nearly fills up the entire corridor. It
Desc 2: ripples along without making a sound. Its incredible bulk sends a
Desc 3: stab of fear into your heart, and you are uncertain whether or not
Desc 4: any mere mortal could stop its inexorable flow.

Name: death dog
Desc 1: This appears to be an ordinary, if somewhat large, reddish-brown
Desc 2: mastiff. As you look closer though, you see that it has no eyes, just
Desc 3: bony hollows. It seems to move around using only its sense of smell,
Desc 4: as it sniffs about continually.

Name: skeletal warrior
Desc 1: This tall, mail-armoured figure walks rigidly erect. A long
Desc 2: broadsword hangs from its waist, and it carries a round shield in its
Desc 3: left hand. Twin points of light glow from within its polished iron
Desc 4: helm like burning fires.

Name: moaning spirit
Desc 1: All you can see of this strange apparition is a swirling, misty
Desc 2: shape somewhat like smoke. It moans ominously, making the hair stand
Desc 3: up on the back of your neck.

Name: huge tiger beetle
Desc 1: This insectile mutation is about four feet long, and has a striped
Desc 2: carapace and six jointed legs. Two large, multifaceted eyes are
Desc 3: placed alongside its enormous mandibles. Insects of unnatural size
Desc 4: are known for their incredible strength and speed.

Name: guardian golem
Desc 1: This appears to be a tall, heroically-proportioned stone sculpture of
Desc 2: a man-like creature. Its rough, chiseled features are set in a fierce
Desc 3: scowl. You see a slight gleam of something deeply imbedded beneath
Desc 4: the stone surface of its chest.

Name: chest
Desc 1: This appears to be a large, ordinary-looking wooden chest. It is
Desc 2: bound with iron bands, and sits upon four short steel feet.

Name: warlock mercenary
Desc 1: This tall, well-built man wears rigid leather armour, and a curved
Desc 2: sword hangs by his side. He looks confident, and if his hard,
Desc 3: calculating gaze is anything to go by, this confidence is well-
Desc 4: founded.

Name: giant bat
Desc 1: This enormous bat has a six-foot wingspan, and is covered in short
Desc 2: black fur. Its beady eyes peer at you hungrily as it flaps towards
Desc 3: you!

Name: gelatinous cube
Desc 1: What appears to be a ten foot cube of quivering protoplasm is before
Desc 2: you. It oozes forward at a respectable pace, and suspended within its
Desc 3: transparent core are various objects it apparently could not digest.

Name: healer
Desc 1: This short man stares at you with a somewhat brooding look, with dark
Desc 2: eyes set deeply in his skull. He sports a small black beard, and is
Desc 3: quite stocky in build. The white robes he wears clearly show him to
Desc 4: be a healer.

Name: Nathaniel
Desc 1: This tall, stocky man greets you with a welcoming smile. He has a
Desc 2: lined, careworn face and sports drooping moustaches that hang down
Desc 3: past his chin. He gestures towards his array of weaponry with a
Desc 4: sweeping motion.

Name: Betram
Desc 1: This portly, smiling fellow greets you with a good-natured, booming
Desc 2: welcome. He gestures broadly towards his wares, encouraging you to
Desc 3: browse the merchandise.

Name: Dathalar
Desc 1: This tall, handsome man has long black hair down to the middle of his
Desc 2: back, and wears bright red clothes that immediately catch your eye.

Name: Rayth
Desc 1: This gnarled old man has seen so much sun that he is as brown as a
Desc 2: nut. His frazzled white hair sticks up at all angles, and his faded
Desc 3: grey robes are covered in obscure sigils and runes. He looks up
Desc 4: sharply as you approach, but then breaks into a large grin.

Name: Corwyn
Desc 1: Before you stands a fine example of a fighting man. He is well-
Desc 2: muscled and stands with the relaxed but alert posture of someone who
Desc 3: is used to combat. If the silence with which he moves is anything to
Desc 4: go by, then fighting is not all he has some knowledge of.

Name: hardened practice dummy
Desc 1: This large stuffed dummy somehow has survived all the ravages the
Desc 2: city has thrown at it. Magically enchanted to endure unlimited
Desc 3: beating, it is used to test combat and spellcasting skills. This
Desc 4: particular one has been hardened and enchanted to resist attacks.

Name: cave bear
Desc 1: This huge, menacing bear seems to be more demon than beast. Its red
Desc 2: eyes glare at you malevolently, and it roars a challenge as it
Desc 3: approaches. Its sharp curved claws appear to be able to part stone
Desc 4: as easily as flesh.

Name: ferryman
Desc 1: This wiry, scruffy-looking man sits with his legs dangling over the
Desc 2: edge of the dock, a fishing pole in one hand. He nods curtly to you
Desc 3: as you approach.

Name: troll
Desc 1: This hideous beast looks like something out of your worst nightmare.
Desc 2: It is a humanoid monstrosity, a perversion of nature verified by its
Desc 3: foot-long claws and serrated teeth. Red eyes peer at you from a thin,
Desc 4: grey-skinned face, and it flexes its ropy muscles in preparation.

Name: warrior spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the shimmering figure of a kang warrior, armoured
Desc 2: in glittering plate mail. Twin broadswords hang from his back, and
Desc 3: as you look him up and down, he bows slightly. With a shock, you
Desc 4: recognize him as one of the old Heroes of Silvermere!

Name: fire lizard
Desc 1: This ten foot long lizard is bright red, and seems to be sheathed in
Desc 2: flames! Its powerful clawed legs propel it slowly towards you, and
Desc 3: its wide-set black eyes glitter evilly. Its tail swishes back and
Desc 4: forth hypnotisingly, leaving glowing trails in your mind's eye.

Name: witchunter spirit
Desc 1: The image of a mammoth, mailed half-ogre floats before you. His huge
Desc 2: greatsword hangs from its side as if it were a one-handed blade. At
Desc 3: your approach, he looks you up and down with a surprisingly
Desc 4: intelligent gaze.

Name: ogre
Desc 1: This huge figure towers nearly ten feet above the ground. It wears
Desc 2: heavy leather skins, and wields a massive club bound with iron. The
Desc 3: ogre's massive musculature makes you feel like an insect compared to
Desc 4: his power.

Name: mystic spirit
Desc 1: This is image of a well-built half-orc, wearing nothing but a loose
Desc 2: pair of white pants. He stands in such a manner as to suggest that if
Desc 3: you blinked your eyes, he could be upon you before they opened again.
Desc 4: Despite his forbidding appearance, he gives you a toothy grin.

Name: ranger spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the image of a leather-clad elf, shrouded in a
Desc 2: cloak which makes her nearly invisible. A long blade and ash bow hang
Desc 3: from her back. Her long blonde hair is done up into many small braids
Desc 4: which cascade down her shoulders, and she looks you over cooly.

Name: horned demon
Desc 1: This towering demon has brilliant yellow skin and two sharpened
Desc 2: sets of antlers that branch out from the sides of its head. Its
Desc 3: powerful arms have long, hooked claws, and its glaring black eyes
Desc 4: have no hint of mercy in them.

Name: young girl
Desc 1: This dark-haired girl is clad in the white embroidered robes of a
Desc 2: temple priest, though she looks far too young to hold such a
Desc 3: position. Her wide blue eyes seem to hold much wisdom in them, and
Desc 4: more than a little secrecy.

Name: priest spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the image of a tall, white-robed man, his hair
Desc 2: greying with age. His bright green eyes seem to pierce through the
Desc 3: insubstantial haze surrounding him, and his commanding personality
Desc 4: gives him an almost regal demeanor.

Name: cleric spirit
Desc 1: The image of a short, stocky dwarf clad in shining mail and bearing
Desc 2: a massive warhammer stands before you. The dwarf's fierce grin can
Desc 3: be seen through his winged helm, and as you approach he raises a
Desc 4: mailed fist in greeting.

Name: paladin spirit
Desc 1: A shimmering image of a tall man wearing full plate armour stands
Desc 2: before you. He rests his hands on the pommel of his great sword, and
Desc 3: though you cannot see his face through his visored helm, he seems to
Desc 4: exude an aura of quiet sorrow.

Name: missionary spirit
Desc 1: An image of a lithe human woman stands before you. She is clad in
Desc 2: dark leather armour, and wields a peculiar curved blade. Her shoulder
Desc 3: length red hair flutters like a cloud around her, and her clear grey
Desc 4: eyes hold your unwaveringly.

Name: owlbear
Desc 1: This huge, ponderous creature appears to be some sort of cross
Desc 2: between a bear and a bird -- it has a massive, furred body, and the
Desc 3: head and beak of an oversized owl. Although it looks extremely
Desc 4: powerful, it does not appear too quick or perceptive.

Name: ninja spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands a tall, lean half-orc, wearing full black ninja
Desc 2: armour. Twin short swords swing by his side, and his hood is pulled
Desc 3: low over his eyes. Despite his unsettling appearance, he manages a
Desc 4: short bow at your approach, and motions you closer.

Name: thief spirit
Desc 1: The image of a halfling wavers before you. He wears soft leather
Desc 2: clothing, and a shortsword swings by his side. As you approach, he
Desc 3: grins and gives a little bow in welcoming.

Name: bard spirit
Desc 1: The transparent image of a half-elven bard stands before you. She
Desc 2: wears bright red silks, and carries a golden harp in her hands.

Name: fire elemental
Desc 1: This flickering, fiery shape holds a roughly humanoid form. It moves
Desc 2: about with a quiet roaring sound, and as it approaches you it reaches
Desc 3: out with a flaming limb to strike you.

Name: frost serpent
Desc 1: This eight foot snake is completely white, save for its slitted
Desc 2: yellow eyes. Its black tongue flicks in and out rapidly, and it
Desc 3: slithers towards you.

Name: two-headed hydra
Desc 1: This hideous beast is about twice the size of a large bull. Its four
Desc 2: scaly legs propel its heavy body forward slowly, and its two dragon-
Desc 3: like heads swivel around to face you. It hisses malevolently as it
Desc 4: methodically plods toward you.

Name: gypsy spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the image of a goblin, dressed in brightly coloured
Desc 2: clothes and bearing a broadsword across its back. He grins easily at
Desc 3: your approach, and with an elaborate flourish, bows in greeting.

Name: warlock spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the image of a gnarled, aged gnome with a long
Desc 2: white beard. He wears rigid battle leathers, and a short pointed
Desc 3: sword hangs by his side.

Name: mage spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the shadowed image of a black-shrouded dark elf.
Desc 2: His bright blue eyes peer from the depths of his hood, and as he
Desc 3: looks you up and down, he seems to nod to himself in satisfaction.

Name: druid spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the image of a grey-cloaked druid leaning upon a
Desc 2: nightblack staff. His piercing grey eyes seem to penetrate your mind,
Desc 3: and he looks as if he is evaluating you as the merchants examine
Desc 4: livestock.

Name: Aldreth
Desc 1: The man standing before you appears to be nearly ageless -- at least,
Desc 2: his greying hair means he is in his middle years, but he has the
Desc 3: build and supple grace of a warrior of half that age. There is a
Desc 4: penetrating intelligence in his eyes that unsettles you.

Name: roc hatchling
Desc 1: This small three foot tall bird appears to be freshly hatched, as it
Desc 2: still has its eyes closed. It is small, and quite awkward, yet its
Desc 3: beak appears to be razor sharp.

Name: ice sorceress
Desc 1: This beautiful, but menacing woman appears to be made of ice. She
Desc 2: moves gracefully, and he violet robes flutter gently over her almost
Desc 3: perfect figure. In her right hand she clutches a sceptre made of a
Desc 4: dark blue glass, which she handles with great care.

Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: stone golem
Desc 1: This is a tall, grey statue of a powerfully-built man. It swings its
Desc 2: fists as if they were hammers, slowly but with deadly force. Its
Desc 3: rocky hide makes it a tough opponent.

Name: minotaur
Desc 1: This hideous, nine foot tall beast has the head and legs of a massive
Desc 2: black bull, and the body of an incredibly muscled man. He wields a
Desc 3: double-bladed battleaxe, and grins at you evilly.

Name: giant snake
Desc 1: This long, mottled serpent is perhaps twenty feet in length. Its
Desc 2: grey-green hide is thick and lumpy, its head arrow-shaped and blunt.
Desc 3: The snake peers at you maliciously with its evil yellow eyes, and
Desc 4: slithers towards you.

Name: banshee
Desc 1: This misty appararition appears to be a white-robed woman, her face
Desc 2: hidden by a dark hood. Her translucent form seems to radiate power,
Desc 3: and a chill of fear runs up your spine.

Name: minotaur chieftain
Desc 1: This hideous, ten foot tall beast has the head and legs of a massive
Desc 2: black bull, and the body of an incredibly muscled man. He wields a
Desc 3: huge, glittering black battleaxe, and is adorned with tattoos and
Desc 4: all sorts of primitive jewelry.

Name: vampire rosebush
Desc 1: This large, spiny bush is covered in the most delicate, beautiful
Desc 2: red roses you have ever seen. The leaves are a deep, glossy green,
Desc 3: and the stems are unusually long and supple. The plant seems to
Desc 4: quiver at your approach.

Name: archer bush
Desc 1: This dense, woody bush grows close to the ground. Its thick, squat
Desc 2: trunk sprouts many branches studded with wicked-looking thorns.

Name: animated tree
Desc 1: This tall, twisted darkwood tree looms ominously over you. Its deep
Desc 2: green foliage is covered in a creeping yellow rot, and its bark is
Desc 3: peeling and diseased. It has been animated by some unknown force, and
Desc 4: moves about on thick roots, slowly but with great power.

Name: carnivorous plant
Desc 1: This large, spiny plant has many broad jagged-edged leaves. Its thick
Desc 2: stem supports a bulbous head filled with inward-curving teeth. Dozens
Desc 3: of tendrils sprouting from its base move it about, and wave
Desc 4: menacingly.

Name: wood golem
Desc 1: This is a twisted wooden construction in the rough shape of a human.
Desc 2: It stands about seven feet high, and moves with a jerky, awkward
Desc 3: gait. Its heavy arms could cause considerable damage in combat.

Name: earth elemental
Desc 1: This massive, lumpish creature is formed out of the very earth you
Desc 2: walk on. Sticks and twigs poke out of its body, and it is riddled
Desc 3: with stones. It moves slowly, but has the fearsome power of the
Desc 4: elemental plane of earth at its command.

Name: dark druid
Desc 1: This mysterious, cowled figure wears a robe of dark gray embellished
Desc 2: with black runes. Glittering eyes peer at you maliciously from the
Desc 3: depths of its hood, and it wields a twisted oaken staff as if it
Desc 4: knows how to use it.

Name: high druid
Desc 1: This tall, dark figure is garbed in a robe of deep grey, with silvery
Desc 2: runes around the cuffs and hem. A long white beard flows from the
Desc 3: depths of the hood, and glittering eyes peer at you evilly. The high
Desc 4: druid holds a wicked-looking golden sickle with a shimmering edge.

Name: black orc captain
Desc 1: This tall, powerfully built orc has jet black skin and glowing red
Desc 2: eyes. He wears glittering black chainmail, and wields a heavy
Desc 3: scimitar. His evil grin exposes his sharp yellow fangs.

Name: black orc shaman
Desc 1: This brutal-looking figure is garbed in a rough brown robe. Glowing
Desc 2: red eyes peer at you from the depths of its hood, and it waves its
Desc 3: clawed hands about in mystical patterns. An evil aura emanates from
Desc 4: this creature.

Name: dark goblin warlock
Desc 1: This evil-looking goblin has dusky grey skin and luminescent red
Desc 2: eyes. He wears shiny black hide armour, and wields a long curved
Desc 3: sword. His pointy white teeth are bared in an evil grin as he
Desc 4: advances towards you.

Name: slave-master
Desc 1: This tall, heavily muscled man wears gaudy, mismatched armour, more
Desc 2: for show than for effectiveness. His face and head are hidden by a
Desc 3: heavy iron helm, with a slit for the eyes and metal grilles over the
Desc 4: ears and mouth. He wields a large, wicked-looking barbed scourge.

Name: werewolf
Desc 1: This lithe, well-built figure is completely covered in shaggy,
Desc 2: reddish hair. Its long arms sport wicked-looking curved claws. A
Desc 3: heavy helm crafted in the shape of a wolf's head conceals its facial
Desc 4: features, but the glint of red eyes and shining fangs can be seen.

Name: shadowy healer
Desc 1: This mysterious figure is garbed in plain, midnight-black robes. At
Desc 2: your approach, it beckons to you softly.

Name: mad wizard
Desc 1: This golden-robed man has frizzy grey hair and wears thick
Desc 2: spectacles. He hurries about nervously, with a crazed expression on
Desc 3: his face.

Name: Jorah
Desc 1: This odd-looking, four-armed creature has opalescent black eyes and
Desc 2: pale white skin. It wears a beautiful blue robe, heavily ornamented
Desc 3: with silvery stitching. It seems to smile to you, and beckons for you
Desc 4: to approach.

Name: cyclops
Desc 1: This huge, powerfully-built humanoid is garbed in ragged skins, and
Desc 2: wields a large twisted tree trunk in one hand. Its single baleful eye
Desc 3: glows with a greenish fire. Wound about one of its wrists is some
Desc 4: sort of bracelet, probably belt-sized on a normal human.

Name: Dhelvanen
Desc 1: This tall, intense-looking man is garbed in deep blue robes with
Desc 2: silvery stitching. His long brown hair is shot through with grey. He
Desc 3: is calm and composed, and has a glint of vast experience in his eye.
Desc 4: He could be a valuable ally, or a dangerous opponent.

Name: violet spore
Desc 1: This bulbous, slow-moving mound of fungus is coloured a deep purple,
Desc 2: with patterns of red. It slides about on rippling pads, and is
Desc 3: studded with many short, blunt nozzles.

Name: black fungus tree
Desc 1: This large, twisted tree has been completely taken over by some form
Desc 2: of deep violet fungus, which has animated it. It moves slowly about
Desc 3: on thick roots, its limbs creaking and groaning quietly.

Name: giant toad
Desc 1: This massive, bloated toad is a mottled black and green. Its huge
Desc 2: luminescent white eyes gleam eerily, and its toothy maw drips wetly.
Desc 3: It hops forward on its powerful legs.

Name: shambling mound
Desc 1: This tall, quivering tower of plants and vines is roughly shaped like
Desc 2: a humanoid. It moves about on thick legs, every step resounding with
Desc 3: a wet thump. It waves its arms about menacingly, liquid dripping
Desc 4: from it in rivulets.

Name: winged horror
Desc 1: This large, reptilian beast is jet black, with a wingspan wider than
Desc 2: three large men are tall. Its wedge-shaped head is filled with long,
Desc 3: needle-sharp teeth, and is set on a slender neck. Its slitted red
Desc 4: eyes peer at you maliciously, and it hisses ferociously at you!

Name: swamp serpent
Desc 1: This large, green serpent is mottled with patterns of brown and
Desc 2: black. It waves its head about searchingly, as if looking for prey.

Name: giant ant
Desc 1: This six-foot-long ant is reddish-brown, and has massive mandibles.
Desc 2: Its chitinous armour makes it extremely tough. Giant ants are known
Desc 3: for their ferocity and deadliness.

Name: bola spider
Desc 1: This thin, long-legged spider is covered in many spiky black hairs.
Desc 2: Its dull yellow skin is thick and leathery, and its clusters of
Desc 3: glittering eyes glow softly. Sharp fangs jut out from its mouth at
Desc 4: odd angles.

Name: serpentkin hunter
Desc 1: This tall, evil-looking creature seems to be some form of human-snake
Desc 2: combination. It has the long sinuous body of a serpent, and the same
Desc 3: wedge-shaped head and slitted eyes, but has the upper body and arms
Desc 4: of a human. It slithers about softly, and wields a crystalline spear.

Name: dark cultist
Desc 1: This black-robed figure is completely shrouded, so that you cannot
Desc 2: see even the smallest feature. It could be nearly any humanoid
Desc 3: creature. A black iron pendant in the shape of a five-pointed star
Desc 4: hangs around its neck, and it wields a curved shortsword.

Name: dark cleric
Desc 1: The figure standing before you is clad in enameled black chainmail,
Desc 2: and wears a hooded mask so that you cannot see its face. It wields a
Desc 3: spiked morning-star, and carries a large shield with a hideous horned
Desc 4: skull emblazoned on it. It moves without uttering a sound.

Name: dark priest
Desc 1: This black-shrouded figure stares at you with unmistakeable
Desc 2: intensity. It wields a spiked mace which it waves about menacingly,
Desc 3: and it makes arcane gestures with its free hand.

Name: dark paladin
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is entirely clad in glittering black
Desc 2: chainmail. It wields a heavy broadsword and a black shield emblazoned
Desc 3: with a red horned skull. It stands with the practiced grace of a
Desc 4: competent warrior, and is likely to be a tough opponent.

Name: dark warrior
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is entirely clad in glittering black
Desc 2: platemail. It wields a heavy greatsword, and a tabard with the symbol
Desc 3: of a red horned skull hangs upon its chest. It stands with the
Desc 4: discipline of the trained fighter.

Name: dark warlock
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is garbed entirely in black leather and
Desc 2: robes. It wields a long, straight blade in one hand, and makes
Desc 3: mystic gestures with its other. A red-horned skull is stitched in
Desc 4: thread on the dark warlock's tabard.

Name: dark assassin
Desc 1: This lean, stooped figure is tightly swathed in jet black robes. A
Desc 2: horned skull is emblazoned on its chest, and a pair of straight
Desc 3: blades hang on its back. It moves with the incredibly quiet grace of
Desc 4: the trained killer.

Name: dark mage
Desc 1: This hunched, black-robed figure creeps about with the aid of a
Desc 2: gnarled staff. Embroidered in crimson thread upon the chest and cuffs
Desc 3: of its robe is a hideous horned skull. Eyes glitter darkly at you
Desc 4: from the depths of its hood, and an aura of evil power surrounds it.

Name: elite guard
Desc 1: This tall, muscular figure wears glittering black chainmail armour,
Desc 2: and holds a black shield emblazoned with a red horned skull. It
Desc 3: wields a fine broadsword, and a golden brooch holding its cloak
Desc 4: declares it as a being of rank.

Name: guard captain
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is clad in glittering black plate and
Desc 2: chainmail. Dark eyes peer at you maliciously from within its steel
Desc 3: helm. It wields a finely crafted broadsword, and moves with the grace
Desc 4: and discipline of the master warrior.

Name: mutant
Desc 1: This hideous, misshapen creature appears to have once been a
Desc 2: humanoid. Its blistered skin is deformed and covered in thick black
Desc 3: hairs, and its face would make an ogre look beautiful. Its limbs are
Desc 4: filled with unnatural strength, and it attacks with berserk fury!

Name: earth elemental
Desc 1: This massive, lumpish creature is formed out of the very earth you
Desc 2: walk on. Sticks and twigs poke out of its body, and it is riddled
Desc 3: with stones. It moves slowly, but has the fearsome power of the
Desc 4: elemental plane of earth at its command.

Name: winged horror
Desc 1: This large, reptilian beast is jet black, with a wingspan wider than
Desc 2: three large men are tall. Its wedge-shaped head is filled with long,
Desc 3: needle-sharp teeth, and is set on a slender neck. Its slitted red
Desc 4: eyes peer at you maliciously, and it hisses ferociously at you!

Name: giant rattlesnake
Desc 1: This long, brown snake is covered in a black, diamond-shaped pattern.
Desc 2: Its beady eyes glitter at you, and it rattles warningly as it
Desc 3: slithers towards you!

Name: bola spider
Desc 1: This thin, long-legged spider is covered in many spiky black hairs.
Desc 2: Its dull yellow skin is thick and leathery, and its clusters of
Desc 3: glittering eyes glow softly. Sharp fangs jut out from its mouth at
Desc 4: odd angles.

Name: giant ant
Desc 1: This six-foot-long ant is reddish-brown, and has massive mandibles.
Desc 2: Its chitinous armour makes it extremely tough. Giant ants are known
Desc 3: for their ferocity and deadliness.

Name: serpentkin hunter
Desc 1: This tall, evil-looking creature seems to be some form of human-snake
Desc 2: combination. It has the long sinuous body of a serpent, and the same
Desc 3: wedge-shaped head and slitted eyes, but has the upper body and arms
Desc 4: of a human. It slithers about softly, and wields a crystalline spear.

Name: obsidian demon
Desc 1: This small, angular creature seems to be made of a shiny black glass.
Desc 2: Its pointy head has two brightly glowing red eyes, and its fingers
Desc 3: are tipped with long, sharp claws. It moves with uncanny speed, and
Desc 4: leaps towards you!

Name: magma man
Desc 1: This large, glowing figure seems to be made entirely of red-hot lava!
Desc 2: It moves slowly, its huge bulk being a great encumbrance, but its
Desc 3: burning fists could cause horrendous damage.

Name: flame elemental
Desc 1: This burning, crackling shape is made of pure fire. It moves about on
Desc 2: a tower of flame, and maintains a roughly humanoid form. Searing heat
Desc 3: radiates from it, making it hard to approach.

Name: fire bat
Desc 1: This huge, crimson bat is sheathed in writhing flames! The bat's
Desc 2: beady black eyes peer at you hungrily, and it squeaks loudly as it
Desc 3: flaps towards you!

Name: greater hellhound
Desc 1: This huge, powerfully-built beast appears to part dog, and part
Desc 2: demon. Its thick pelt is a glossy black, and its long teeth and claws
Desc 3: glimmer whitely. A wisp of smoke trails from the corner of its mouth,
Desc 4: and it eyes you with unnerving intelligence.

Name: pyro jelly
Desc 1: This huge, quivering blob glows brightly with the heat of a furnace.
Desc 2: It moves quickly about in a peculiar rolling motion, and pseudopods
Desc 3: of flaming matter reach out searchingly!

Name: serpentkin hunter
Desc 1: This tall, evil-looking creature seems to be some form of human-snake
Desc 2: combination. It has the long sinuous body of a serpent, and the same
Desc 3: wedge-shaped head and slitted eyes, but has the upper body and arms
Desc 4: of a human. It slithers about softly, and wields a crystalline spear.

Name: serpentkin warrior
Desc 1: This tall, evil-looking creature seems to be some form of human-snake
Desc 2: combination. It has the long sinuous body of a serpent, and the same
Desc 3: wedge-shaped head and slitted eyes, but has the upper body and arms
Desc 4: of a human. It wields a long crystalline sword in both hands.

Name: serpentkin shaman
Desc 1: This tall, evil-looking creature seems to be some form of human-snake
Desc 2: combination. It has the long sinuous body of a serpent, and the same
Desc 3: wedge-shaped head and slitted eyes, but has the upper body and arms
Desc 4: of a human. It wields a crystal club, and makes arcane gestures!

Name: serpentkin chieftain
Desc 1: This tall, muscular serpent man is garbed in all sorts of bone and
Desc 2: crystal jewellry. A large, heavy necklace hangs down over its chest,
Desc 3: and in its powerful hands it wields a crystal sword. The glint of
Desc 4: cunning is in its eyes, and it moves with grace and speed.

Name: serpentkin witchdoctor
Desc 1: This tall, sinister-looking serpent man is covered in an array of
Desc 2: jewelry and fetishes of all sorts and descriptions. Swirling blue
Desc 3: tattoos cover its body. It eyes you with contempt and malice, and
Desc 4: waves its hands about in arcane pattern.

Name: glowing worm
Desc 1: This long, brightly glimmering worm seems to be encrusted with a fine
Desc 2: layer of opalescent crystal. Its mouth is filled with long,
Desc 3: needle-like teeth, and it waves its head about searchingly. Its
Desc 4: whiplike tail is tipped with a serrated crystalline blade.

Name: crystalline spider
Desc 1: This large, shining creature appears to be a strange combination of
Desc 2: hard black shell and glittering crystal. It moves about on spiky,
Desc 3: angular legs, scuttling about with incredible speed.

Name: glittering ooze
Desc 1: This bulbous, pulsating mass glitters and sparkles, its skin studded
Desc 2: with a coating of crystalline shards. It moves about with a rolling
Desc 3: motion, and reaches out searchingly with its pseudopods.

Name: wounded worker
Desc 1: The man before you is wearing ragged clothing, and cowers before you
Desc 2: in fear. He seems to be clutching his leg, which is twisted
Desc 3: unnaturally beneath him.

Name: dark bishop
Desc 1: This large, ugly man is garbed entirely in plate and chainmail. He
Desc 2: wields a massive, wicked-looking flail. An aura of power surrounds
Desc 3: him, despite his ordinary appearance, and something about the
Desc 4: fanatical light burning in his eyes makes you very afraid!

Name: alchemist
Desc 1: This short, stooped figure wears a dull grey robe adorned with black
Desc 2: stitching. A pair of thick spectacles sit on the end of his nose. He
Desc 3: carries a long iron tube in one hand.

Name: dark wizard
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious man wears a glittering jet-black robe covered
Desc 2: in glowing red runes. He wields a slender, silvery staff that
Desc 3: crackles with lightning. The look in his eyes speaks of incredible
Desc 4: knowledge, and he is surrounded by a withering aura of power.

Name: prisoner
Desc 1: This pale, emaciated man appears to be on the brink of death. His is
Desc 2: severely malnourished and has many festering wounds. Despite all this
Desc 3: he still has a glint in his eye, and raises his head as you approach.

Name: master assassin
Desc 1: This lithe, well-built woman has the smooth, angular features of a
Desc 2: dark-elf. She is garbed in a leathery black wrap, and wields a pair
Desc 3: of long, slightly curved blades. She moves with the deadly grace of
Desc 4: a predator, and has a ruthless gleam in her eyes.

Name: Champion of Blood
Desc 1: This tall, massively muscled man is garbed in an exotic collection of
Desc 2: black platemail and red robes. He wields a heavy, evil-looking sword,
Desc 3: and from the depths of his helm, his eyes glow with a fervent light.
Desc 4: The overwhelming aura of evil surrounding this man makes you shudder!

Name: greater hellion
Desc 1: This twenty-foot-tall monstrosity is some sort of demon of fire. Its
Desc 2: dull red body is powerfully muscled, and is covered in long black
Desc 3: spikes. Long curved horns adorn its head. The hellion is shrouded in
Desc 4: flame, and it glares at you with a look of unspeakable evil.

Name: baby red dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twelve feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright orange scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: young red dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright red scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from its
Desc 4: mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: adolescent red dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in blood-red scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from its
Desc 4: mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: adult red dragon
Desc 1: This massive dragon is at least fifty feet long, with a wingspan of
Desc 2: many times that. Her scales are a deep blood red, and glimmer like
Desc 3: steel. Her talons are like swords, her teeth like spears, and the
Desc 4: intelligence in her hateful gaze almost paralyzes you with fear.

Name: aged titan
Desc 1: This gigantic, human-like being is well over thirty feet tall, with
Desc 2: piercing blue eyes and a snow-white beard flowing down his chest. He
Desc 3: is garbed in clothes of an ancient fashion, but of exquisite make.
Desc 4: His restful demeanor belies unfathomable wisdom and terrible power.

Name: raven
Desc 1: With feathers the shade of midnight, this avian creature has been
Desc 2: mentioned many times in myth as symbols of evil or black magic. This
Desc 3: particular one points its eyes towards you, cawing once before
Desc 4: turning away to find a more appetizing morsel.

Name: bluejay
Desc 1: This simple blue bird swoops through the trees, looking for some
Desc 2: tasty worm to feast on. It pauses for a moment gazing around before
Desc 3: it takes flight in a blue flash.

Name: cardinal
Desc 1: A saintly bird indeed, it is a bright sunburst through the trees as
Desc 2: it flies from branch to branch. It takes little notice of you, and
Desc 3: your thoughts linger on what it must be to fly so swiftly, suddenly
Desc 4: the bird dives down and snatches a tasty insect, and returns skyward.

Name: drunken gambler
Desc 1: A poor drunken sod, he just lost all his winnings on the last roll.
Desc 2: He scrounges around on the floor looking for loose change, anything
Desc 3: to build that streak up again. Heaving an awful sigh he grabs a
Desc 4: nearby drink to at least drown out his sorrows.

Name: huge gruesome creation
Desc 1: This monster looks to be made out of parts of countless monsters and
Desc 2: animals. Myths tell of a crazed magus manufacturing a magical horror
Desc 3: and this nightmare can only be this. Six twisted arms move in chaos
Desc 4: as its own mishapen mouths cry agony and its eyes look at you in hate

Name: giant bat
Desc 1: This enormous bat has a six-foot wingspan, and is covered in
Desc 2: black fur. Its beady eyes peer at you hungrily as it flaps to
Desc 3: you!

Name: practice dummy
Desc 1: This large stuffed dummy somehow has survived all the ravages the
Desc 2: city has thrown at it. Magically enchanted to endure unlimited
Desc 3: beating, it is used for combat practice and to test weapons.

Name: Kotar Bloodthorn
Desc 1: This tall dark-elf sits calmly in a plain wooden chair while carving
Desc 2: a piece of dark wood.  He is armed with a large assortment of wicked
Desc 3: looking weapons, and his dark-green garb doesn't help you hide your
Desc 4: fear.  As you approach, he looks up briefly then continues to carve.

Name: red dragon hatchling
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about nine feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright orange scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: dark-elf courser
Desc 1: This shady ranger is clad in dark leathers and carries a plethora of
Desc 2: weaponry. He moves silently and shows no emotion.  You can only guess
Desc 3: his reason for stalking such a strange place.

Name: priest
Desc 1: This kindly-looking priest wears soft white robes and sandals, and
Desc 2: smiles warmly at you as he goes about his business.

Name: priestess
Desc 1: This friendly priestess wears soft white robes and has long flowing
Desc 2: hair, tied with a thong. She nods briefly to you and then hurries on.

Name: practice dummy
Desc 1: This large stuffed dummy somehow has survived all the ravages the
Desc 2: city has thrown at it. Magically enchanted to endure unlimited
Desc 3: beating, it is used for combat practice and to test weapons.

Name: roc
Desc 1: This giant birdlike creature resembles a huge two headed buzzard,
Desc 2: aside from its white downy feathers. It has a twenty foot wingspan,
Desc 3: and its enormous claws hold razor sharp talons.

Name: nomadic tribesman
Desc 1: This large humanoid in garbed in soft white pelts. His headgear
Desc 2: consists of several large roc feathers, which hang droopily from the
Desc 3: top of his head. He carries a large club, spiked with several fangs,
Desc 4: possibly from the mountain cats that inhabit this area.

Name: grey wolf
Desc 1: The animal in front of you is superior in size to a regular wolf.
Desc 2: This impressive specimen has a thick grey pelt, under which you can
Desc 3: see huge, powerful muscles, which allows it to survive in such
Desc 4: desolate areas.

Name: grey guardian wolf
Desc 1: The animal in front of you is superior in size to normal wolves.
Desc 2: This impressive specimen has a thick grey pelt, under which you can
Desc 3: see huge, powerful muscles, which allows it to survive in such
Desc 4: desolate areas.

Name: nomadic huntsman
Desc 1: This large humanoid in garbed in soft white pelts. His headgear
Desc 2: consists of several large roc feathers, which hang droopily from the
Desc 3: top of his head. He cares a large club, spiked with several fangs,
Desc 4: possibly from the mountain cats that inhabit this area.

Name: wild turkey
Desc 1: This turkey seems incredibly lost and hysterical about it. With wild
Desc 2: eyes it looks at you with horror, keeping its distance as if it saw
Desc 3: a butcher knife in one hand and stuffing in the other.

Name: nomadic huntsman
Desc 1: This large humanoid in garbed in soft white pelts. His headgear
Desc 2: consists of several large roc feathers, which hang droopily from the
Desc 3: top of his head. He cares a large club, spiked with several fangs,
Desc 4: possibly from the mountain cats that inhabit this area.

Name: nomadic shaman
Desc 1: This figure is dressed in several ceremonial shamanic robes of an
Desc 2: unkown order. Most of the symbols are naturally made, suggesting a
Desc 3: druidic alignment. He carries a twisted oak staff in one hand, and
Desc 4: several small pouches attached to his belt.

Name: large yeti
Desc 1: Before you stands a large, powerfully muscled ape-like creature of
Desc 2: approximately 9 feet in height. Its white fur pelt makes it hard
Desc 3: to distinguish in the deep snow. It bares its yellow, chipped fangs
Desc 4: at your approach and bellows, extending its huge arms upward.

Name: nomadic chieftan
Desc 1: This heavily built humanoid is garbed from head to toe in various
Desc 2: animal skins. In his right hand he carries a staff etched with
Desc 3: several tribal sigils, and is crowned in what appears to be
Desc 4: be ceremonial headgear. A faint blue aura surrounds his body.

Name: ice golem
Desc 1: This giant human-like contraption has been made from solid ice. It
Desc 2: moves quite slowly, but its chiseled arms look big enough to crush
Desc 3: an ogre's head in its arms.

Name: fire assassin
Desc 1: Flame encircles this evil spirit like a cloak. Jet eyes gaze at you
Desc 2: with hatred, and with supernatural agility it throws a pair of firey
Desc 3: stars at you as it draws its blade to strike!

Name: mosquito swarm
Desc 1: Hundreds of small mosquitos swarm around you, looking for a fresh,
Desc 2: flowing vein to feast on. Were it not for their stinging bite, the
Desc 3: immense buzzing they make would surely drive you insane.

Name: Templar
Desc 1: This tall, plate-armoured figure stands with a quiet watchfulness
Desc 2: that makes you hope you're not his enemy. The Templars are known to
Desc 3: be deadly adversaries with both magic and the massive greatswords
Desc 4: they employ in combat.

Name: Zanthus the Lich
Desc 1: Embodied by darkest necromancy, this once living foe has now been
Desc 2: transformed into an undead nightmare. Two spheres of malevolence
Desc 3: stare at you from a white skull as wicked fangs grin from a lipless
Desc 4: mouth. His death shroud sways as he begins to summon your demise!

Name: Demoness Irikani
Desc 1: A monstrosity of nightmares, a serpenttine beast with the upper body
Desc 2: of a beautiful maiden and the lower body of a massive serpent. Her
Desc 3: very skin is set aflame. With demonic eyes she looks at you evilly
Desc 4: and her fanged grin slips out a serpentine tongue, tasting your fear.

Name: elite orc guard
Desc 1: This tall, muscular orc is garbed in a well-maintained suit of
Desc 2: chainmail, and glares at you through the eyeslits of a steel helm.
Desc 3: He wields a slightly curved bastard sword as if he knows how to use
Desc 4: it, and at your approach he goes into a fighting stance!

Name: orc warleader
Desc 1: You are looking at a powerfully muscled orc, wearing a full chainmail
Desc 2: suit and wielding a wickedly curved battle-axe. A number of large
Desc 3: pouches hang from his belt, and a grey wolf's cloak hangs from his
Desc 4: shoulders. Strapped to his left arm is a large black shield.

Name: displacer beast
Desc 1: This jet-black animal ressembles a puma almost exactly-- with the
Desc 2: exception of glowing green eyes and spiked tentacles growing from its
Desc 3: shoulders. Displacer beasts are known to create illusions of
Desc 4: themselves up to a few feet away, so it makes them very hard to hit.

Name: manticore
Desc 1: The manticore is a strange beast indeed-- with the body, legs and
Desc 2: mane of a lion, the wings of a bat, an almost demonic-looking man's
Desc 3: head, and a spiked tail, it qualifies as one of the oddest
Desc 4: monstrosities encounterable. It is a fierce and ruthless fighter.

Name: gargoyle
Desc 1: This hideous creature appears to be made out of dark grey stone. Its
Desc 2: curved claws, batlike wings, and horned, demon-like head instill fear
Desc 3: in all but the boldest adventurers. They are known to be vicious
Desc 4: fighters, delighting in torture when their adversary is down.

Name: gorgon
Desc 1: This terrifying creature appears to be a jet-black, armour-plated
Desc 2: bull with glowing red eyes. Despite its apparent toughness, its large
Desc 3: size makes it fairly slow to react. The gorgon's main weapons are its
Desc 4: sharp metal horns, and its petrifying breath.

Name: harpy
Desc 1: This filthy beast looks like a cross between a human woman and a
Desc 2: large carrion bird. Her greasy feathers are a grey-brown in colour,
Desc 3: and her hooked talons look extremely sharp. Harpies are known to
Desc 4: be the most unclean of creatures, often infecting their victims.

Name: gnoll scout
Desc 1: This creature looks like a tall combination of a human and hyena,
Desc 2: with greenish-grey fur. It wears light leather armour, and carries a
Desc 3: long bow and a quiver bristling with arrows. Gnolls are known to be
Desc 4: relatively lazy and hate most humanoid races with a passion.

Name: gnoll axeman
Desc 1: This creature looks like a tall combination of a human and hyena,
Desc 2: with greenish-grey fur. It wears chainmail armour and wields a heavy
Desc 3: greataxe with relative ease. This gnoll looks bigger and tougher than
Desc 4: the more commonly-seen scout.

Name: hill centaur
Desc 1: This fierce, territorial centaur warrior roams the hills protecting
Desc 2: the boundaries of his tribe. He is garbed in leather armour and
Desc 3: wields an impressive composite bow. Centaurs are known to have
Desc 4: explosive tempers when provoked, and trespassers are not tolerated.

Name: brigand
Desc 1: This cloaked, hooded figure wields a drawn longsword and wears full
Desc 2: leather armour. It gestures to you impatiently, seemingly waiting for
Desc 3: you to hand over your valuables.

Name: dark monk
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is garbed in flowing robes of dark grey
Desc 2: and black, and moves with an alarming grace. Emblazoned on the front
Desc 3: and cuffs of its robe is a clenched grey fist.

Name: ankheg
Desc 1: This seven-foot long, six-legged insect has a hard carapace coloured
Desc 2: mottled brown and yellow. Its large mandibles are extremely strong,
Desc 3: able to snap a small tree in half with a bite, and its antennae wave
Desc 4: about in search of fresh meat. Ankhegs are known to attack on sight.

Name: bombardier beetle
Desc 1: This four-foot-long beetle has a dull green carapace, long spindly
Desc 2: legs and a strange set of tubelike organs protruding from its behind.
Desc 3: It mandibles are fairly large, and could cause serious damage.

Name: carrion crawler
Desc 1: This fat, hideous insectile beast ressembles a nine foot-long maggot,
Desc 2: except with eight long thin tentacles ringing its mouth, and two
Desc 3: dozen legs. It slithers towards you, its tentacles waving about in
Desc 4: the air as if searching for prey!

Name: umber hulk
Desc 1: This eight-foot tall monstrosity appears to be a some sort of
Desc 2: humanoid insect. Its two arms and legs sport long claws suitable for
Desc 3: tearing through stone and flesh alike. Four strangely glittering
Desc 4: eyes gaze at you with malevolent intensity.

Name: mermex hunter
Desc 1: This insectile monstrosity bears great ressemblance to a scorpion,
Desc 2: except that it has violet-black chitin, and is covered with a
Desc 3: multitude of pulsating organic growths, some of which have small
Desc 4: tubes protruding from them. It moves with great speed and agility.

Name: mermex warrior
Desc 1: This insectile monstrosity bears great ressemblance to a scorpion,
Desc 2: except that it has violet-black chitin, and is covered with a
Desc 3: multitude of pulsating organic growths, two of which have wide
Desc 4: openings. It appears larger and stronger than most other mermex.

Name: mermex worker
Desc 1: This insectile monstrosity bears great ressemblance to a scorpion,
Desc 2: except that it has violet-black chitin, and is covered with a few
Desc 3: pulsating organic growths. It seems to be heavier built than the
Desc 4: other types of mermex, though somewhat slower.

Name: mermex royal guard
Desc 1: This insectile monstrosity bears great ressemblance to a scorpion,
Desc 2: except that it has violet-black chitin, and is covered with many
Desc 3: pulsating organic growths sporting nozzle-like tubes. This mermex is
Desc 4: substantially larger and more powerfully built than the others.

Name: gnoll chieftain
Desc 1: This huge gnoll towers over his lesser brethren, and wields a massive
Desc 2: two-headed morningstar in one hand. He wears an impressive array of
Desc 3: leather and chainmail armour. His massive muscles stand out from
Desc 4: beneath his garments, and it is easy to see why he is the commander.

Name: Madame Alexia
Desc 1: Standing before you is a woman of astounding beauty. Golden hair
Desc 2: spill down pale shoulders, and bright, crystal blue eyes look at you
Desc 3: with an aloof gleam. Though the clothes she wears is not revealing,
Desc 4: her figure seems to make them stand out with an exotic appeal.

Name: silvery skull
Desc 1: This real-size, metallic skull floats about with apparent ease and
Desc 2: agility. Burning points of fire glow in its eye sockets, occasionally
Desc 3: flickering brightly.

Name: mermex queen
Desc 1: This monstrously huge mermex is covered by grotesquely pulsating
Desc 2: organic growths, many of which spout nozzle-like tubes. She is armed
Desc 3: with the same vicious pincers and scorpion-like tail as the other
Desc 4: mermex, and due to her size, will be a difficult foe to defeat.

Name: giant pulsating cocoon
Desc 1: This gigantic, revolting cocoon has been fastened to the wall with
Desc 2: a mass of sticky threads. It appears to be somewhat like an organ
Desc 3: made of pasty white skin, and inside you can vaguely see the outlines
Desc 4: of bodies!

Name: cocoon
Desc 1: This is a large, oval-shaped cocoon fastened to the wall here. It
Desc 2: is a pale translucent white in colour, and pulsates slightly. Inside
Desc 3: you can see the vague dark shape of a body!

Name: wounded messenger
Desc 1: This tall, weary-looking man is garbed in the livery of the church.
Desc 2: He rests upon a wooden table here, and you see that although his leg
Desc 3: has been heavily bandaged, blood still seeps through. He appears to
Desc 4: be in some pain, but manages to retain a firm composure.

Name: Chancellor Annora
Desc 1: This thin-featured woman is the embodiment of patience-- her steely
Desc 2: blue eyes could make a rock blink first. She is garbed in lightly
Desc 3: embroidered silk robes, and is surrounded with an air of confident
Desc 4: dignity, which is reinforced by her obvious advanced age.

Name: royal soldier
Desc 1: This tall, mail-armoured soldier carries an iron-bound shield and
Desc 2: sharpened longsword at his side. His tabard proudly displays the
Desc 3: purple-and-gold eagle crest of the kingdom. He stands at attention,
Desc 4: carefully scanning the area for all intruders.

Name: Commander Markus
Desc 1: This bearlike, muscular man is quite tall and wide, but is not fat--
Desc 2: he is a mountain of pure muscle. He is garbed in shining chainmail,
Desc 3: and a long two-handed sword is strapped to his back. His intense blue
Desc 4: eyes seem to note every detail of his surroundings.

Name: Jael
Desc 1: This lithe, handsome elf has pale blonde hair and piercing green
Desc 2: eyes. He wears soft embroidered leathers, and moves with an ease that
Desc 3: makes him seem as if he floats from place to place.

Name: barmaid
Desc 1: This pretty barmaid walks around in tight-fitting kitchen garb, a
Desc 2: tray in one hand, and the other free to slap the hands of forward
Desc 3: men.

Name: hooded traveller
Desc 1: This odd-looking stranger wears riding leathers, and is shrouded in
Desc 2: a heavy cloak with a hood, which obscures all the facial details, but
Desc 3: from the powerful build and body shape it could only be an adult man.
Desc 4: His glittering eyes peer out at you from the depths of his hood.

Name: nasty-looking man
Desc 1: This odious stranger reeks heavily of alcohol, and is covered in a
Desc 2: grizzly growth of facial hair. He has a cheap-looking eyepatch, and
Desc 3: sports numerous scars. His shifty gaze continually scans the area,
Desc 4: and if there is one word to describe him, it is "seedy".

Name: The Grey Lord
Desc 1: This tall, thin being is completely shrouded in intricate robes
Desc 2: patterened with black, white and grey. From the depths of his hood
Desc 3: you can see twin pinpoints of pale green. The Grey Lord exudes an
Desc 4: aura of incredible power, ancient knowledge, and chilling calm.

Name: shopkeeper
Desc 1: This cowering shopkeeper is obviously in fear of his life. As you
Desc 2: approach, he fauns over you, displaying his best wares prominently.
Desc 3: He is quite a pathetic person, and you might have felt sorry for him
Desc 4: if he wasn't such a piece of worthless scum.

Name: greasy thief
Desc 1: This sleazy bastard sits here with an insolent grin. He is just
Desc 2: asking to get the tar beaten out of him. As you approach, he spits on
Desc 3: the ground, and lazily waves to his wares for sale.

Name: barmaid
Desc 1: This whorish-looking barmaid wears a sleazy outfit that barely
Desc 2: conceals her feminine charms. She has a stout cudgel at her belt, and
Desc 3: she does not refrain from clubbing anyone who gets on her bad side.

Name: greedy healer
Desc 1: This money-grubbing loser has no good qualities whatsoever, aside
Desc 2: from his ability to heal. His only love is money, and if there was a
Desc 3: sick person on his doorstep who could not pay, not only would he not
Desc 4: help, he would kick the person back into the gutter.

Name: grizzled trainer
Desc 1: This tall, powerful man is built like a bear, and is just as fat. His
Desc 2: bare chest is covered in thick brown hair, and numerous scars line
Desc 3: his arms and face. He appears to be tough as nails.

Name: huge dwarven witchunter
Desc 1: This massive, scary-looking dwarf is nearly as tall as a man. He is
Desc 2: literally rippling with muscles, and looks like he could tear you in
Desc 3: two. He is garbed in an exotic suit of armour, and wields a strange
Desc 4: glittering sword.

Name: dark monk
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is garbed in flowing robes of dark grey
Desc 2: and black, and moves with an alarming grace. Emblazoned on the front
Desc 3: and cuffs of its robe is a clenched grey fist.

Name: drunken brawler
Desc 1: This obviously plastered person staggers aimlessly about, an empty
Desc 2: pewter tankard in one hand, and a link of sausages in the other. He
Desc 3: is quite angry, probably at being thrown out of every bar in town,
Desc 4: and is picking fights with everyone he meets.

Name: cutpurse
Desc 1: This sneaky cutpurse thinks he's crept up on you. He is quite stupid
Desc 2: though and probably doesn't realize that you've noticed him. In his
Desc 3: right hand he holds a dull dagger.

Name: depraved murderer
Desc 1: This slobbering, vicious murderer prowls about here in search of
Desc 2: victims. He holds a bloodstained spiked club in one hand, and a large
Desc 3: bag full of scalps in the other.

Name: crazed lunatic
Desc 1: This naked, drooling idiot runs about like, well, a madman. He has
Desc 2: obviously escaped from the local mental asylum, and is delighting in
Desc 3: his freedom to streak once more.

Name: Balthazar
Desc 1: This tall, dark man has glowing red eyes and sharp white teeth. He is
Desc 2: dressed in the finest silks and wears numerous stylish, expensive
Desc 3: pieces of jewelry. There is a palpable aura of evil surrounding him,
Desc 4: as well as one of extreme power.

Name: fungus lizard
Desc 1: This six-foot-long lizard is a mottled grey and brown, and has
Desc 2: strange, spherical rotating eyes. Its maw is filled with many shiny
Desc 3: white teeth, very sharp, and dripping with venom. A thin grey fungus
Desc 4: covers most of its body like a parasite.

Name: vampire bat
Desc 1: This huge, jet-black bat has a wingspan of at least twelve feet. Its
Desc 2: small, crimson eyes glow evilly, and it flexes its razorlike talons
Desc 3: compulsively.

Name: silverfish
Desc 1: This sleek, peaceful creature is about six feet in length and is
Desc 2: covered in glittering silvery scales. Its main source of food is
Desc 3: algae and river weeds, which it considers a delicacy. When attacked,
Desc 4: the silverfish is known to ram into its foe with its poisoned spines.

Name: dragonfish
Desc 1: The dragonfish is widely known as one of the most vicious freshwater
Desc 2: predators. Though it is not huge, its razor-sharp teeth, incredible
Desc 3: speed, and burning steam breath make it a terrible foe. Dragonfish
Desc 4: are thought to be the result of a mad wizard's experiments.

Name: water elemental
Desc 1: The water elemental is extremely difficult to notice, as it is only
Desc 2: barely visible in any body of water. It flows about rapidly, able to
Desc 3: change its shape and to deliver powerful blows with its watery limbs.
Desc 4: Elementals are also known to sometimes command elemental magics.

Name: night hag
Desc 1: This hideous creature appears to be a twisted, hunchbacked woman with
Desc 2: long, greasy black hair and dark glittering eyes. She is garbed in a
Desc 3: coarse black robe, and iron bracelets rattle around her bony wrists.
Desc 4: In one hand she grasps an odd skull-headed wand.

Name: quickling
Desc 1: This small, elf-like creature has pale grey skin and glowing red
Desc 2: eyes. Its four-foot-tall body is slender and appears frail, but it
Desc 3: moves with unearthly speed and agility. In its hand it wields a long,
Desc 4: black, wavy-bladed dagger.

Name: imp
Desc 1: This hideous little creature flies around on reddish bat wings. It
Desc 2: leers at you evilly with its grotesque demon face, and flicks its
Desc 3: scorpion tail at you. Imps are known to be quite evil, and while not
Desc 4: as powerful as some demons, still dangerous to the unwary.

Name: bloodbear
Desc 1: The deadly bloodbear is named for its ability to sense strife and
Desc 2: aggression, which enrages and attracts it. When it feels these
Desc 3: emotions nearby, it enters a berserker rage, and races to where the
Desc 4: sensations are coming from to slay indescriminately.

Name: killer bee
Desc 1: This insectile monstrosity is fully as large as a man, and many times
Desc 2: faster. Its huge stinger could easily gut someone, even without its
Desc 3: deadly poison. Killer Bees are known to attack unprovoked, and
Desc 4: although not truly evil, they are as close to it as can be.

Name: huorn
Desc 1: The huorns are the semi-intelligent trees of the forest. They are
Desc 2: not truly sentient, but obey the commands of the intelligent trees.
Desc 3: All huorns are tough and slow, but can make formidable opponents.

Name: pixie
Desc 1: This small, mischievious creature is one of the elusive faeries. It
Desc 2: wears curious, brightly coloured clothing and flutters around on its
Desc 3: dragonfly-like wings. Pixies are generally harmless but many command
Desc 4: powerful magics, and dislike being disturbed.

Name: leprechaun
Desc 1: This interesting-looking fellow is clad in green clothes and wears a
Desc 2: pair of sturdy shoes. His bright red beard and hair are somewhat
Desc 3: spiky and coarse. In one hand he wields a gilded club, and in the
Desc 4: other holds a long smoking pipe.

Name: grizzly bear
Desc 1: This large, generally peaceful animal can nonetheless be a deadly
Desc 2: foe when aroused. Its incredible strength, good speed, and sharp
Desc 3: claws can down many adventurers before they have the opportunity to
Desc 4: strike back. If left alone, they tend to ignore people.

Name: ancient willow
Desc 1: This massive and ancient willow tree is rife with a black rot.
Desc 2: Despite this malady it appears powerful and strong, and is possibly
Desc 3: the oldest tree you have ever seen. A haunting melody seems to
Desc 4: emanate from it, drawing you irresistably closer.

Name: huorn
Desc 1: The huorns are the semi-intelligent trees of the forest. They are
Desc 2: not truly sentient, but obey the commands of the intelligent trees.
Desc 3: All huorns are tough and slow, but can make formidable opponents.

Name: huorn
Desc 1: The huorns are the semi-intelligent trees of the forest. They are
Desc 2: not truly sentient, but obey the commands of the intelligent trees.
Desc 3: All huorns are tough and slow, but can make formidable opponents.

Name: quickling lord
Desc 1: This quickling is dressed in fine gold and black silks, and sports
Desc 2: glittering jewelry. He wields a large, black blade which drips with
Desc 3: a smoking liquid. Moving with supernatural speed, the quickling lord
Desc 4: is a vicious, deadly opponent.

Name: faerie
Desc 1: This exquisite, beautiful creature closely ressembles a tiny elf with
Desc 2: dragonfly wings. She glows with a soft light, and as she flies about
Desc 3: a trail of glittering faerie dust spins out behind her. Faeries are
Desc 4: incredibly magical creatures, and often command powerful magics.

Name: treant
Desc 1: Treants are the eternal shepherds of the trees and guardians of the
Desc 2: forests. While not any tougher than the huorns they command, they are
Desc 3: as intelligent as any human, and are far wiser, as their lifespans
Desc 4: range in the hundreds of years. They make fearsome opponents.

Name: unicorn
Desc 1: The beautiful unicorn is a magical protector of the woods. It is
Desc 2: strong and quick, and extremely skilled with its horn. Although
Desc 3: normally shy and reclusive, the unicorn is a relentless and deadly
Desc 4: foe when it encounters creatures of evil.

Name: woodelf ranger
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is cloaked in a deep-green cape which
Desc 2: almost seems to blend into the background. The elf wields a long
Desc 3: broad-bladed war spear with skill, and stalks about the forest
Desc 4: patrolling for evil creatures.

Name: woodelf druid
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is cloaked in a deep-green cape which
Desc 2: almost seems to blend into the background. The elf wields a long
Desc 3: darkwood staff, and strides around tending to the forest.

Name: woodelf citizen
Desc 1: The elf is clad in green and brown leathers, and is girded with a
Desc 2: long blade by his side. He appears to be somewhat suspicious and
Desc 3: keeps a careful eye out for trespassers.

Name: woodelf citizen
Desc 1: The elf is clad in green and brown leathers, and is girded with a
Desc 2: long blade by her side. She appears to be somewhat suspicious and
Desc 3: keeps a careful eye out for trespassers.

Name: woodelf guard
Desc 1: This tall, muscular elf wears an elaborate wooden breastplate in
Desc 2: addition to green leathers. He wields a deadly war-spear with extreme
Desc 3: skill, and is vigilant in his pursual of trespassers and creatures of
Desc 4: evil.

Name: woodelf wardancer
Desc 1: This athletic figure is garbed in nothing more than shimmering silks.
Desc 2: He twirls and dances with incredible speed, whirling his blade about
Desc 3: in deadly arcs. Wardancers are known to be excellent, agile warriors
Desc 4: who often use acrobatics in their attacks.

Name: woodelf wardancer
Desc 1: This athletic figure is garbed in nothing more than shimmering silks.
Desc 2: She twirls and dances with incredible speed, whirling her blade about
Desc 3: in deadly arcs. Wardancers are known to be excellent, agile warriors
Desc 4: who often use acrobatics in their attacks.

Name: woodelf lord
Desc 1: This tall, well-built elf has a commanding air about him. Garbed in
Desc 2: shimmering silvery robes and wielding a shining silverwood staff, he
Desc 3: is the definition of regal. Although he appears stern, a hint of
Desc 4: warmth and compassion can be seen in his eyes.

Name: war dog
Desc 1: This massively-muscled beast stands fully four feet tall at the
Desc 2: shoulder. It has a maw filled with curved, razor-sharp teeth, claws
Desc 3: like steel, and a rabid fury to match. Around its neck it wears a
Desc 4: thick spiked iron collar.

Name: hobgoblin
Desc 1: This tall, brutish figure is unmistakeably a hobgoblin. Its cruel
Desc 2: eyes glare out at you evilly from its helm, and it hefts its heavy
Desc 3: flail with malice.

Name: half-ogre guard
Desc 1: Chosen because they are smarter than their hobgoblin and ogre
Desc 2: compatriots, the half-ogres play the roles of guards here. Wielding
Desc 3: heavy bastard-swords in one hand, and armoured with spiked shields
Desc 4: and iron scalemail, they present difficult foes.

Name: ogre grunt
Desc 1: These brutish ogres are used for intimidation and as shock troops.
Desc 2: Their massive bulk and incredible strength, coupled with their nearly
Desc 3: inexhaustible fighting power, make them effective fighting machines
Desc 4: despite their clumsiness and extreme stupidity.

Name: ogre-mage
Desc 1: The powerful ogre-mages are ogres who have been magically altered so
Desc 2: that their intelligence is increased, and so they gained magical
Desc 3: powers. They are cunning and intimidating foes who have no love for
Desc 4: other races. Their ruthlessness and bloodlust is legendary.

Name: white dragon serpent
Desc 1: This eight-foot-long serpentine creature ressembles an ivory white
