Desc 2: anaconda, except that it has an evil-looking dragon's head. It has
Desc 3: long sharp fangs and short curved horns, and it radiates an aura of
Desc 4: extreme cold.

Name: black dragon serpent
Desc 1: This eight-foot-long serpentine creature ressembles a coal black
Desc 2: anaconda, except that it has an evil-looking dragon's head. It has
Desc 3: long sharp fangs and short curved horns, and black ichor drips from
Desc 4: its mouth, burning holes in the ground.

Name: green dragon serpent
Desc 1: This eight-foot-long serpentine creature ressembles an emerald-hued
Desc 2: anaconda, except that it has an evil-looking dragon's head. It has
Desc 3: long sharp fangs and short curved horns, and a hazy cloud of green
Desc 4: gas surrounds the beast.

Name: blue dragon serpent
Desc 1: This eight-foot-long serpentine creature ressembles an azure-hued
Desc 2: anaconda, except that it has an evil-looking dragon's head. It has
Desc 3: long sharp fangs and short curved horns, and small sparks of
Desc 4: electricity jump from it occasionally.

Name: red dragon serpent
Desc 1: This eight-foot-long serpentine creature ressembles a blood-coloured
Desc 2: anaconda, except that it has an evil-looking dragon's head. It has
Desc 3: long sharp fangs and short curved horns, and wisps of smoke and
Desc 4: licks of flame shoot from its mouth.

Name: lamia
Desc 1: This horrific creature appears to be half serpent, half woman. Her
Desc 2: snakelike lower body is long and muscular, and her upper body is that
Desc 3: of a beautiful, evil woman. In one hand she wields a wavy-bladed
Desc 4: dagger, and with the other makes arcane gestures.

Name: twisted one
Desc 1: This hideous mutation can only be the product of some form of magical
Desc 2: experimentation, or the result of some curse of the gods. The twisted
Desc 3: one is a combination of beast and man, with great strength and a
Desc 4: hunchbacked body.

Name: small gibbering horror
Desc 1: This disgusting blob-like beast pulls itself around with sticky
Desc 2: protrusions. It is covered in glowing red eyes of all sizes, and many
Desc 3: fanged mouths which continuously babble an almost hypnotic chant.

Name: gibbering horror
Desc 1: This disgusting blob-like beast pulls itself around with sticky
Desc 2: protrusions. It is covered in glowing red eyes of all sizes, and many
Desc 3: fanged mouths which continuously babble an almost hypnotic chant.

Name: large gibbering horror
Desc 1: This disgusting blob-like beast pulls itself around with sticky
Desc 2: protrusions. It is covered in glowing red eyes of all sizes, and many
Desc 3: fanged mouths which continuously babble an almost hypnotic chant.

Name: ghost
Desc 1: This nearly transparent apparition moans softly as it floats about.
Desc 2: It clutches its torn white funeral rags closely to itself. Although
Desc 3: it appears sad and lonely, the undead are known to vent their rage
Desc 4: and frustration upon the living.

Name: crimson mist
Desc 1: This mysterious swirling mist flies through the air with great speed.
Desc 2: Flashing within the mist are tiny red lights, and emanating from the
Desc 3: mist cloud are sounds which ressemble the shrieking and moaning of
Desc 4: hundreds of tortured beings!

Name: shadowraith
Desc 1: This unnerving apparition seems to be your worst nightmare-- a large
Desc 2: shadowy figure with long, wicked claws and hellishly burning eyes. It
Desc 3: moves with an unnatural grace as it stalks you!

Name: Goru-Nezar
Desc 1: This massive ogre-mage warlord wears a wicked-looking spiked plate
Desc 2: ensemble, and bears a sapphire-orbed staff. Incredible muscles strain
Desc 3: under his clothing, and the hatred in his eyes is both ferocious and
Desc 4: disconcerting-- there is cunning there as well as sheer brutality.

Name: huge basilisk
Desc 1: This massive beast is nearly fifteen feet in length, and resembles
Desc 2: a brown-black giant lizard. Its eight short legs are thick and strong
Desc 3: and its toothy maw filled with razor-sharp fangs. It hangs its heavy
Desc 4: head, and its large lidded eyes seem to be staring at the ground.

Name: chimera
Desc 1: This ugly beast has the hindquarters of a huge goat, and the fore-
Desc 2: quarters of a lion. Its body has black wings like those of a dragon.
Desc 3: The chimera has three heads, one of a goat, one of a lion, and one of
Desc 4: an orange-scaled dragon. They are known to be voracious in appetite.

Name: beholder
Desc 1: This spherical monstrosity levitates about slowly. In the centre of
Desc 2: its body a huge, lidless eye stares, emanating an aura of anti-magic
Desc 3: in front of it. Atop it are eight small eyestalks, which swivel about
Desc 4: looking in every direction. Beholders are incredibly dangerous foes.

Name: prismatic dragon
Desc 1: This glittering dragon has scales of a thousand hues, all of which
Desc 2: reflect the light in prismatic sprays. Shining chrome teeth and claws
Desc 3: arm this deadly beast, and the light of hatred in its eyes makes you
Desc 4: pause in fear.

Name: frost hydra
Desc 1: This monstrous beast nearly reaches the ceiling of this forty-foot
Desc 2: high cave. Its scaly hide is tougher than iron, its icy breath
Desc 3: deadly. Seven heads sprout from its muscular shoulders, each with
Desc 4: beady glowing eyes which glare at you from deep within their sockets!

Name: wraithlord
Desc 1: This tall figure radiates an aura of horror, making your hair stand
Desc 2: on end. It is shrouded in an evil darkness which saps the courage
Desc 3: from you. Its shadowy form is difficult to see, but its slitted,
Desc 4: glowing red eyes are readily apparent.

Name: unholy idol
Desc 1: This huge, six-armed obsidian statue is crafted to appear as an
Desc 2: unholy warrior armoured in wickedly spiked plate and helm. In two of
Desc 3: its hands it wields a long barbed lance, blood-red in colour. Burning
Desc 4: flame lights its eyes, and it advances with uncanny precision!

Name: cave lizard
Desc 1: This stocky, eight-foot long lizard is speckled green and grey. Its
Desc 2: four legs are quite powerfully muscled, and its mouth is full of six
Desc 3: inch long fangs. Speeding towards you, it drools expectantly!

Name: mutant spider
Desc 1: This thing is a hideous parody of a spider. It is almost as tall as a
Desc 2: man, and scuttles around on some 12 legs. Its cluster of black eyes
Desc 3: appear to glow in the darkness, and on the back of its black body are
Desc 4: several razor sharp spikes.

Name: mind flayer
Desc 1: This hideous creature stands six feet tall and has mauve skin that
Desc 2: glistens with slime. Its head ressembles that of an octopus, with
Desc 3: white pupilless eyes, and four tentacles around its mouth. It is
Desc 4: dressed in flowing robes adorned with symbols of death and despair.

Name: dark-elf hunter
Desc 1: This dark-elf moves about with superb grace and makes no sound
Desc 2: whatsoever. Wielding an adamantite spear and black, form-fitting
Desc 3: leather, he has the look of a predator in his eyes.

Name: drider
Desc 1: This strange creature has the head and torso of a dark-elf, and the
Desc 2: body of a giant spider. It is armed with a shortsword, and the
Desc 3: numerous scars on its body tell you it's seen several battles and
Desc 4: survived.

Name: hordeling
Desc 1: This vicious beast stands only three feet tall, and runs about with
Desc 2: great speed on its thin, muscular legs. Its arms are long and sport
Desc 3: wicked-looking claws, while two gleaming green eyes peer at you out
Desc 4: of its head. Needle-like fangs line its wide mouth in triple rows.

Name: nexus hunter
Desc 1: This tall, forbidding figure is garbed in a strange assortment of
Desc 2: shimmering multicoloured clothing, in contrast to its ebony skin.
Desc 3: In one hand, it wields a gleaming metal disc, and as it stalks
Desc 4: though the wasteland you witness its catlike grace.

Name: planar storm
Desc 1: This swirling cloud is a mix of dark grey, violet, and blue. It rolls
Desc 2: through the air with a crackling noise, arcs of brilliant energy
Desc 3: continually spearing out in all directions. Moving with a malevolent
Desc 4: speed, it almost seems alive as it seeks out the nearest life-form.

Name: terror beast
Desc 1: This hideous creature flies about swiftly on leathery wings. Its
Desc 2: three heads are mounted on long, serpentine necks, and are filled
Desc 3: with countless dripping fangs. A wave of terror comes over anyone
Desc 4: who hears its heart-wrenching wail!

Name: behemoth
Desc 1: This massive creature towers above you like a living hill. Its four
Desc 2: short, powerful legs propel its huge body about with surprising
Desc 3: speed. Thick, sharp tusk-like teeth jut out of its cavernous maw,
Desc 4: easily wide enough to swallow someone whole.

Name: Lord of the Hunt
Desc 1: This terryfing being stands at least fifteen feet tall, and is as
Desc 2: lithe as a cat. Garbed in a strange, metallic garb, he wields a long
Desc 3: spear which sparkles with blue light. The Lord of the Hunt's bright
Desc 4: green eyes almost entrance you as he stares right at you!

Name: gnome sentry
Desc 1: This short, leather-armoured gnome wields a short spear with
Desc 2: proficiency. Extremely alert, he continually scans around for enemies
Desc 3: and intruders.

Name: gnome shaman
Desc 1: An aura of mystic power surrounds this gnarled gnome. Garbed in a
Desc 2: fine red robe, he carries a twisted oaken staff, and many pouches
Desc 3: full of reagents and magical talismans hang from his belt.

Name: gnome commander
Desc 1: This large, middle-aged gnome has a crafty glint in his eye, and the
Desc 2: easy grace of an experienced warrior. He is garbed in studded leather
Desc 3: armour, and a slim-bladed thrusting sword hangs by his side.

Name: dark-elf hunter
Desc 1: This dark-elf moves about with superb grace and makes no sound
Desc 2: whatsoever. Wielding an adamantite spear and black, form-fitting
Desc 3: leather, he has the look of a predator in his eyes.

Name: dark-elf soldier
Desc 1: This dark-elf's finely chiseled features are partially shielded by a
Desc 2: chain coif. Garbed in a chainmail hauberk, he wields a fine
Desc 3: broadsword inscribed with strange letters.

Name: dark-elf faithkeeper
Desc 1: This dark figure is clad in flowing black robes that are marked in
Desc 2: several places with stange arcance symbols. His face is shrouded in
Desc 3: some unnatural darkness by his drawn hood. Around his neck is an
Desc 4: amulet of his dark goddess, and in his hand is a bloodstained knife.

Name: dark-elf citizen
Desc 1: This dark-elf has a rather noble air about her and moves with much
Desc 2: grace. She is dressed in black robes that nearly reach the ground
Desc 3: and a drawn hood hides her features. A long curved dagger hangs from
Desc 4: her belt.

Name: dark-elf nobleman
Desc 1: This haughty dark-elf is dressed in fine silks and silvery jewelry.
Desc 2: A long blade hangs from a scabbard on his back, and from the easy
Desc 3: grace with which he moves, he knows how to use it.

Name: dark-elf servant
Desc 1: This dark-elf moves about performing such jobs as delivering meals,
Desc 2: cleaning messes and passing on messages. Although subserviant to the
Desc 3: other dark-elves, he is nonetheless a decent fighter with his long
Desc 4: curved knife.

Name: dark-elf warlock
Desc 1: This formidable-looking warrior is garbed in black leather armour.
Desc 2: Around his neck hangs a strange talisman, and he wields a long blade
Desc 3: in one hand. His intense gaze seems to pierce the shadows, an aura of
Desc 4: power emanating strongly from him.

Name: dark-elf priestess
Desc 1: Garbed in black robes and gazing at you with a look of absolute
Desc 2: hatred, before you stands a priestess of the dark-elf goddess.
Desc 3: Swearing at you in her native language, she gathers her arms about
Desc 4: her, preparing to summon the wrath of her diety upon you.

Name: dark-elf high priestess
Desc 1: Before you stands one of the most feared creatures in dark-elf
Desc 2: society, the royal priestess. She is dressed in robes of the deepest
Desc 3: black and in one hand she holds a rune-etched sceptre. Her eyes are
Desc 4: bottomless pools of darkness and her gaze chills you to your soul.

Name: dark-elf weaponsmaster
Desc 1: This mail-clad warrior moves with the feral grace of a seasoned
Desc 2: warrior. His every movement is both accurate and lightning-quick.
Desc 3: Girded about his waist is an elaborate scabbard, and a long black
Desc 4: sword hilt thrusts out from within.

Name: dark-elf queen
Desc 1: The queen of the dark-elves of this region is almost masculinely
Desc 2: muscular, moves with uncanny speed even for an elf. An aura of utter
Desc 3: dominance radiates from her, and she eyes you with a gaze so piercing
Desc 4: you feel as though she sees right through you.

Name: master torturer
Desc 1: This cruel-looking dark-elf is feared throughout the city as the
Desc 2: embodiment of pitiless evil. He is wearing bloodstained black robes,
Desc 3: and carries a nine-tailed whip which is streaked with flayed flesh
Desc 4: and gore. A look of insane rapture is upon his face.

Name: dark-elf archmage
Desc 1: An aura of power surrounds this master of magic. From beneath his
Desc 2: drawn hood you see glowing eyes peering out at the world with a dark
Desc 3: knowledge no mortal should possess. He grips a long, twisted bone
Desc 4: staff in both hands.

Name: captain of the guard
Desc 1: This fearsome-looking dark-elf is garbed in black field plate and
Desc 2: wears a robe of the deepest crimson. His face is completely obscured
Desc 3: by the lowered visor of his helmet, which emanates a dull blackness.
Desc 4: He deftly wields a large claymore that pulsates with blue energy.

Name: obsidian statue
Desc 1: This tall, finely-chiseled stone statue glitters darkly in the light.
Desc 2: Carved to ressemble a mail-clad dark-elf bearing a long sword, it
Desc 3: stands guard over the black gates.

Name: sleazy shopkeeper
Desc 1: This ancient-looking dark-elf must be upwards of four hundred years
Desc 2: old if he's a day. His clothing looks to be old and tattered, but
Desc 3: still functional. He frequently falls into hacking coughing spasms,
Desc 4: doubling over and clutching his chest.

Name: slime serpent
Desc 1: This long, finned monstrosity slithers through the incredible filth
Desc 2: of the moat. Hundreds of glossy black scales glisten with slime, and
Desc 3: its wide mouth is filled with a multitude of long, curved, needle-
Desc 4: like teeth.

Name: dark-elf royal guard
Desc 1: This frightening-looking dark-elf has only one purpose in life - to
Desc 2: protect his king and queen. His is clad in grey and black chainmail,
Desc 3: and in his heavily muscled arms he wields a fine bastard-sword.

Name: guardian beast
Desc 1: This eight-foot monstrosity looks like something out of a nightmare.
Desc 2: Its skin is jet black, and its head is nothing more than a lump
Desc 3: peeking out of its barrel-like chest. Glowing amber eyes peer out
Desc 4: above a wide mouth filled with sharp, thick teeth.

Name: slaver
Desc 1: This seedy-looking fellow is clothed in dirty leather armour, and a
Desc 2: well-used blade hangs by his side. He peers about with a sneaky grin,
Desc 3: seemingly thinking of new and improved ways to abuse whatever his
Desc 4: gaze lands on.

Name: slaver leader
Desc 1: This cruel-looking man is dressed in well-kept combat leathers, and
Desc 2: wields a vicious barbed whip. There is a nasty, but intelligent glint
Desc 3: in his eye.

Name: guard dog
Desc 1: This large, vicious creature is as large as a wolf, and appears to be
Desc 2: a cross of two or more of the most dangerous breeds of hounds. Its
Desc 3: dirty grey-black pelt is covered in mangy patches, and it snaps
Desc 4: wildly at you with bloodlust in its eyes!

Name: prisoner
Desc 1: This dishevelled, frightened person cowers in the corner. Garbed in
Desc 2: filthy, tattered clothing, it makes no attempt to make contact and
Desc 3: does not respond to talking.

Name: slave lord
Desc 1: Garbed in a strange assortment of half-plate and leather, the slave
Desc 2: lord is a figure of utter dominance. An unflinching look of command
Desc 3: spears out from beneath bushy eyebrows, his steady hand would wield
Desc 4: the long sword at his hip with remarkable skill.

Name: dark-elf emissary
Desc 1: This dark-elf moves about with superb grace and makes no sound
Desc 2: whatsoever. Wielding an adamantite spear and black, form-fitting
Desc 3: leather, he has the look of a predator in his eyes.

Name: wererat
Desc 1: This shifty-eyed creature looks like a cross between a rat and a
Desc 2: human. It stands five feet tall on its two legs, and in its clawed
Desc 3: hands it grips a wide-bladed sword. Wererats are immune to all
Desc 4: poisons and to the disease which they pass on wherever they go.

Name: wererat shaman
Desc 1: This shifty-eyed creature looks like a cross between a rat and a
Desc 2: human. It stands five feet tall on its two legs, and in its clawed
Desc 3: hands it grips a short, iron-knobbed staff. Bags of ritual talismans
Desc 4: and grisly spell components hang from its belt.

Name: wererat champion
Desc 1: This tall, muscular wererat is garbed in an assortment of half-plate
Desc 2: armour, and wields a heavy greatsword with ease and skill. It leers
Desc 3: cruelly at you from beneath its iron helm, and moves with grace and
Desc 4: speed despite the heavy armour.

Name: wererat plague-crafter
Desc 1: This nasty-looking wererat is garbed in a swath of black robes. An
Desc 2: aura of pure evil radiates from it, and the crafty look of lunacy in
Desc 3: its eyes only adds to its crazed appearance. Flasks of a strange
Desc 4: liquid hang from its belt, and in one hand it wields a heavy sickle.

Name: plagued prisoner
Desc 1: This dishevelled, frightened person cowers in the corner. Garbed in
Desc 2: filthy, tattered clothing, it makes no attempt to make contact and
Desc 3: does not respond to talking. Pustulent boils and raw festering wounds
Desc 4: on the prisoner's skin constantly drip a vile, stinking fluid.

Name: ghost knight
Desc 1: A haze of shimmering light surrounds this ghostly apparition. The
Desc 2: spectral knight's features are drawn with an incredible sadness, his
Desc 3: once-proud and powerful form now sunken with grief. Powerful
Desc 4: emanations of goodness ripple out from him in waves.

Name: wererat emissary
Desc 1: This tall, muscular wererat is garbed in an assortment of half-plate
Desc 2: armour, and wields a heavy greatsword with ease and skill. It leers
Desc 3: cruelly at you from beneath its iron helm, and moves with grace and
Desc 4: speed despite the heavy armour.

Name: dying slaver leader
Desc 1: The once-haughty slaver leader has now been reduced to a babbling
Desc 2: fool. He is a complete coward and would respond to any threats or
Desc 3: requests for information given to him.

Name: Remik of the Ebon Blade
Desc 1: His attention drawn from his carving, Remik approaches you his
Desc 2: robes billowing up as he crosses the room. Your eyes dart between
Desc 3: the blade hanging at his hip and the tricks he performs with his
Desc 4: carving knife. He grins at your apprehension and bows.

Name: Marquis de Bassi
Desc 1: The Marquis de Bassi is an average height man with long dirty-blonde
Desc 2: hair and a full red-blonde beard. Dressed in luxurious robes of jade,
Desc 3: he has a single silver earring in his left ear and pair of of thin
Desc 4: spectecals perched on his nose. He stares at you arrogantly.

Name: feline prisoner
Desc 1: Wearing only unwashed, tattered travelers clothes. this man is like
Desc 2: none you have seen before. Resembling a bipedal lion, his feline eyes
Desc 3: are wide-eyed, darting in lunacy. He looks near death, yet grasps
Desc 4: something wrapped in cloth closely. He huddles here, watching you.

Name: fallen angel
Desc 1: This tall, fearsome creature is the spiteful, burning remnant of a
Desc 2: once-beautiful angel. Twisted and misformed by its unfathomable hate,
Desc 3: it flies about on hooked wings the colour of soot, and wields a
Desc 4: spectral glass blade that burns with unholy intensity.

Name: Timelord
Desc 1: The entity emits the most powerful energy you have ever felt. He
Desc 2: exists more as a spiritual entity rather then a physical one, and
Desc 3: appears as a semi-transparent figure of vaguely humanoid form-- his
Desc 4: true features cannot be distinguished.

Name: crimson high priest
Desc 1: Garbed in vile robes drenched with the blood of many innocences, this
Desc 2: ancient man wears a hideous mask, giving him even more of an evil
Desc 3: appearance. Raising a skull sceptre, he points a hand at you,
Desc 4: preparing to make you his next sacrifice

Name: Devil Fiend Malivek
Desc 1: A great demonic beast, it is guarded by two large cruel wings of
Desc 2: black. Thick reddish hide glow with a dark aura of fire and its
Desc 3: pupiless eyes show unending torture and pain. In one hand it carries
Desc 4: a sword of pure flame, and the other a wickedly barbed whip.

Name: shard creature
Desc 1: This hideous creature has a long, wormlike body that glitters with
Desc 2: a metallic sheen. Heavy armour plates around its head protect a
Desc 3: cluster of opalescent, multifaceted eyes. Around its head, a ring of
Desc 4: barbed tentacles waver about threateningly.

Name: metallic monstrosity
Desc 1: This massive, armour-plated beast closely ressembles the other,
Desc 2: smaller creatures in these tunnels. Scythe-like jaws, fifteen-foot
Desc 3: long tentacles and intimidating size set it apart from the rest, as
Desc 4: well as gleam of what might be intelligence in its eyes.

Name: aurumvorax
Desc 1: This strange creature greatly ressembles a large badger, but has
Desc 2: eight legs and has a beautiful golden pelt. Its small silver eyes
Desc 3: peer out with a suprising ferocity, and it moves quickly to the
Desc 4: attack!

Name: wild dog
Desc 1: This filthy dog reeks quite badly, and shakes as if having a seizure.
Desc 2: It has a crazy look in its eyes, and foams profusely at the mouth.

Name: wild dog
Desc 1: This massive creature appears to be more wolf than dog... its black
Desc 2: eyes glare at you maliciously from beneath its shaggy brow, and its
Desc 3: red tongue lolls out in a parody of a grin.

Name: bandit
Desc 1: This sleazy-looking brigand wears studded leather armour, and wields
Desc 2: a broadsword as if he knows how to use it. He eyes you shiftily and
Desc 3: approaches with a sneer.

Name: warlock bandit
Desc 1: This sleazy-looking brigand wears rigid leather armour, and wields
Desc 2: a longsword with competence. Waving free hand in arcane gestures, he
Desc 3: advances!

Name: bandit leader
Desc 1: Cheap jewelry adorns the ugly form of this tall, well-built man. He
Desc 2: wears a gaudy chain shirt over normal leathers, and carries a curved
Desc 3: bastard sword as a weapon. He sneers contemptuously at anyone he
Desc 4: encounters.

Name: dwarven merchant
Desc 1: This squat, broad figure is perhaps the most ludicrous sight you
Desc 2: could wish to see. Perched on his back is a backpack at least the
Desc 3: same size as he is! The dwarf wears fine robes, underneath which the
Desc 4: glint of chainmail can be seen, and at his side is a broad axe.

Name: bodyguard
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: He says nothing, but appears constantly on guard for any threat to
Desc 3: his master.

Name: wandering cleric
Desc 1: This tall, noble-looking woman is garbed in fine chainmail armour.
Desc 2: A long warhammer hangs by her side, and draped over her armour is
Desc 3: a tabard with a strange crest of four symbols: a torch, a sword, a
Desc 4: bolt of lightning and a tear.

Name: Orfeo Talespinner
Desc 1: Before you stands one of the heroes of old! Ancient indeed is Orfeo
Desc 2: of the Host of Light, who banished the Dark One to his prison in the
Desc 3: days of yore. Retired now (but no less powerful), he is content to
Desc 4: play music on his lute in his inn.

Name: old gypsy woman
Desc 1: It is a wonder this ancient woman is still alive. She seems older
Desc 2: than stone. A strange aura of otherwordly power surrounds her, and
Desc 3: a feeling that she sees beyond the normal world fills you. She would
Desc 4: make a powerful enemy.

Name: old gypsy man
Desc 1: Despite the fact that he appears ancient as the world, this tall,
Desc 2: well-dressed man is spry and strongly built. He has a crafty gleam
Desc 3: in his eye, and his hands never stray far from the scimitars hanging
Desc 4: from his belt.

Name: young gypsy
Desc 1: This tall, handsome gypsy lad has flashing blue eyes and coal black
Desc 2: hair. His effect of his brilliant smile is matched only by the speed
Desc 3: at which he twirls about the knife in his hand.

Name: catoblepas
Desc 1: This ugly beast ressembles a fat, misshapen buffalo, with short
Desc 2: stumpy legs and a long neck. It has a snakelike tail topped with a
Desc 3: knobbly bone ball, and a large head on the end of its neck that
Desc 4: droops down under its own weight. Its red bloodshot eyes glow softly.

Name: swamp leech
Desc 1: This two-foot-long horror is a massive version of the common blood-
Desc 2: sucking leech. Black and slimy, it fastens onto its target with its
Desc 3: sharp, sucker-like mouth and tears the skin to feed on blood.

Name: crocodile
Desc 1: This terror of the swamp sports tough, natural armour plating, and
Desc 2: a long snout filled with vicious teeth. A powerful killer, the
Desc 3: crocodile lurks in wait for its prey, then strikes with great speed.

Name: giant crocodile
Desc 1: This huge creature is at least twice the size of a normal crocodile.
Desc 2: It sports massive jaws that could snap someone in half, or swallow
Desc 3: them whole.

Name: swamp troll
Desc 1: This hideous beast looks like something out of your worst nightmare.
Desc 2: It is a humanoid monstrosity, a perversion of nature verified by its
Desc 3: foot-long claws and serrated teeth. Red eyes peer at you from a thin,
Desc 4: grey-skinned face, and it flexes its ropy muscles in preparation.

Name: giant two-headed troll
Desc 1: This huge, mutated troll is jet black and stand at least fifteen feet
Desc 2: tall. Its long, gangly arms end in huge hands with sword-like claws,
Desc 3: and its two head glare evilly about. Clutched in one hand is a mass
Desc 4: of black wiry roots, which it nibbles on periodically.

Name: huge black dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about fifty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in shiny black scales. Her wingspan is easily twice her
Desc 3: length, and her teeth and claws could easy rip someone in two with a
Desc 4: single swipe. The dragon appears fully grown, and quite deadly.

Name: dwarven guard
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: dwarven guard
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: gnome villager
Desc 1: This gnarled gnome walks about on daily errands, whistling a little
Desc 2: tune. Garbed in leather clothing and armed with a belted shortsword,
Desc 3: the gnome appears ready for a fight should it arise.

Name: gnome farmer
Desc 1: This gnome toils in the fields, cultivating the crops that feed both
Desc 2: the gnomish villagers and the dwarven populace. Garbed in light
Desc 3: leathers and with a belted shortsword, he is nonetheless somewhat
Desc 4: prepared in case of trouble.

Name: gnome shopkeeper
Desc 1: This well-dressed gnome stand idly around her shop, occasionally
Desc 2: dusting the wares or rearranging a display.

Name: gnome inventor
Desc 1: This odd gnome is garbed in strange, many-pocketed clothes, and a
Desc 2: belt covered in pouches hangs from his waist. Running about in a
Desc 3: frenzy, the inventor tends to his many projects.

Name: gnome alchemist
Desc 1: This aged gnome walks around with the aid of a gnarled oak cane. He
Desc 2: has a crafty look in his eye, and looks about with birdlike
Desc 3: quickness. Pouches of herbs and roots hang from his belt like
Desc 4: bloated fruit on a vine.

Name: gnome enchantress
Desc 1: This ancient woman is cloaked in a deep blue robe covered in silver
Desc 2: symbols. She leans heavily upon a golden cane topped with a
Desc 3: glittering sapphire, but the sparkle in her eye tells of wisdom and
Desc 4: intelligence.

Name: centipede
Desc 1: This two-foot-long creature is titanic compared to normal centipedes.
Desc 2: Its flesh is pale while, its eyes and hundreds of legs black and
Desc 3: shiny. Known to be poisonous, they are extremely fast and can deliver
Desc 4: painful bites.

Name: kobold
Desc 1: The creature before you stands about four feet tall, has small pointy
Desc 2: teeth, and is garbed in mismatched armour. It carries a short sword,
Desc 3: and flicks its eyes around nervously as it sneaks about. The mountain
Desc 4: kobolds are known to be tougher than most other kobold breeds.

Name: kobold warrior
Desc 1: The creature before you stands about four feet tall, has small pointy
Desc 2: teeth, and is garbed in rigid leather. It carries a broadsword in
Desc 3: both hands with some small skill, as the mountain kobolds are tougher
Desc 4: than most, and their warriors even more so.

Name: kobold king
Desc 1: This huge kobold is as brawny as an average human-- which is massive
Desc 2: indeed, for a kobold. He bears a perpetual sneer of disdain, as
Desc 3: though all in his gaze are beneath him. A heavy sword hangs by his
Desc 4: side and an iron crown with an amber stone rests on his head.

Name: barrow wight
Desc 1: This frightening apparition is completely garbed in what appear to be
Desc 2: gilded ceremonial robes, the kind that nobles and heros are buried
Desc 3: in. In one withered hand it wields a long, glittering silvery dagger,
Desc 4: and twin points of red light glow from beneath its darkened hood!

Name: tortured spirit
Desc 1: This spirit appears as a glowing, translucent humanlike shape, whose
Desc 2: form shifts and wavers like a desert mirage. It moans in agony and
Desc 3: despair, living even in death and prevented from eternal rest.

Name: spectral knight
Desc 1: This tall, glowing figure is garbed in ghostly plate armour engraved
Desc 2: with arcane sigils and swirls. It wields a long, heavy blade of
Desc 3: ancient make in one hand. From the depths of its greathelm, two
Desc 4: pinpoints of green fire pierce out like rays.

Name: spore zombie
Desc 1: This is an animated, rotting corpse. It walks around listlessly, and
Desc 2: its eyeless face gives no hint of emotion. Small cluters pale
Desc 3: spores cover its body, controlling its every movement.

Name: pale mushroom
Desc 1: This bulbous, slow-moving mushroom is a sickly pale white in colour.
Desc 2: It is covered in small spore tubes, and its moves about on four thick
Desc 3: tendril-like feet. Angling towards any noise or light, it is best
Desc 4: left alone.

Name: myconid
Desc 1: This humanoid mushroom creature is one of the peaceful mushroom-
Desc 2: herders of these caverns. Known to be non-aggressive, the myconids
Desc 3: can be dangerous when provoked.

Name: dark-elf harvester
Desc 1: This dark-elf moves about with superb grace and makes no sound
Desc 2: whatsoever. In one hand he carries a heavy sickle, with which he
Desc 3: collects mushrooms, placing them in a bag about his waist.

Name: water spirit
Desc 1: This partially-transparent creature has no defined form, but is
Desc 2: comprised of swirling waters and icy shapes. A palpable presence of
Desc 3: intelligence accompanies it, and although it has no mouth, has no
Desc 4: problem making its intentions known.

Name: salamander
Desc 1: This hideous creature has a human-like torso, head, and arms that
Desc 2: have a coppery sheen. Its lower half is that of a red-skinned
Desc 3: serpent, with a strong and flexible tail. In its hands it grips a
Desc 4: shining metal spear, and its eyes burn with a fiery light!

Name: efreeti
Desc 1: This nasty being burns with an unnatural flame. Fully twice as tall
Desc 2: as a man, he rides in a whirlwind of fire that makes the air around
Desc 3: him shimmer and waver. A master of his element, the efreeti is a
Desc 4: solid and deadly opponent.

Name: dwarven cleric
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a heavy
Desc 2: hammer. From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out warily.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: dwarven warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: dwarf
Desc 1: This lightly-armoured dwarf goes about his daily business with a
Desc 2: determined gait. At his side swings a well-used battle axe-- after
Desc 3: all, even a regular citizen of Khazarad is a decent warrior.

Name: dwarven smith
Desc 1: This lightly armoured dwarf pounds away at the forge with typical
Desc 2: dwarven diligence and concentration. Even more heavily muscled than
Desc 3: most dwarves, he looks as though he could pound a foe into pulp as
Desc 4: easily as he hammers at his metal works.

Name: dwarven shopkeeper
Desc 1: This lightly-armoured dwarf works in his shop with great pride and
Desc 2: professionalism. Though dwarves are often considered to be somewhat
Desc 3: slow in the head, they are actually very shrewd and this makes them
Desc 4: excellent businessmen.

Name: dwarven miner
Desc 1: This lightly-armoured dwarf works diligently in the many mines which
Desc 2: spread out like a spiderweb from the dwarven city. He is grungy and
Desc 3: somewhat antisocial, which makes him perfect for a miner's life. In
Desc 4: one hand he carries a heavy pickaxe, which he wields with skill.

Name: dwarven barkeep
Desc 1: This lightly-armoured dwarf is quite happy to serve drinks and clean
Desc 2: the bar all day. Used to hearing all manner of stories, he is not
Desc 3: easily surprised by anything. Who knows what tales he may have to
Desc 4: tell...

Name: dwarven royal guard
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears plate mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: His horned helm is inlaid with a single rune of mithril, which gleams
Desc 3: brightly in the light. He is the cream of the crop of the king's
Desc 4: dwarven warriors, and is a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: dwarven nobleman
Desc 1: This well-groomed dwarf wears fine chainmail under his stately robes.
Desc 2: He bears an expression of haughtiness, but is not ill-willed-- he
Desc 3: serves his people as much as they serve him. At his side hangs a
Desc 4: heavy axe, and he likely knows how to wield it.

Name: dwarven royal guard
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears plate mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: His horned helm is inlaid with a single rune of mithril, which gleams
Desc 3: brightly in the light. He is the cream of the crop of the king's
Desc 4: dwarven warriors, and is a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: dwarven warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: dwarven healer
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears light mail, and wields a heavy
Desc 2: hammer. Though peacefully inclined, he is no slouch in battle and
Desc 3: would be a match for many a lesser foe.

Name: Champion Gudruk
Desc 1: This massively-muscled dwarf appears the be recovering from some
Desc 2: nasty wounds. Bandages bound about his head, body and arms are
Desc 3: spotted with red. Although he is wounded, he still maintains a fierce
Desc 4: burning gaze, and has an aura of indomitable strength about him.

Name: King Kulgar
Desc 1: The Lord of Khazarad is an ancient and hardy dwarf, and is as cunning
Desc 2: as he is old. A generous soul to his friends, and a deadly foe to his
Desc 3: enemies, he is both wise and strong, fearless and humble. He is
Desc 4: perhaps one of the greatest dwarves to have lived in this age.

Name: Loremaster Thulgraf
Desc 1: This wizened dwarf spends long days poring over ancient tomes and
Desc 2: gazing at the sky through his sky-glass. He knows much about what
Desc 3: goes on in the world, and even more about its history. Little escapes
Desc 4: his keen scrutiny.

Name: Master Smith Martok
Desc 1: This ancient dwarf is unbelievably muscled. His powerful arms appear
Desc 2: strong enough to snap an ogre in two. His skin is tanned brown from
Desc 3: the constant fires of the forge. A master of his craft, he knows
Desc 4: everything about metals and the forging of weapons and armour.

Name: dwarven royal guard
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears plate mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: His horned helm is inlaid with a single rune of mithril, which gleams
Desc 3: brightly in the light. He is the cream of the crop of the king's
Desc 4: dwarven warriors, and is a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: ancient sand dragon
Desc 1: This gigantic creature is fully seventy feet long, covered in dull
Desc 2: yellow scales harder than steel. His talons are like swords; a strike
Desc 3: of his tail, like a thunderclap. He is an elder of his kind,
Desc 4: immensely powerful and malicious. Death follows in his wake.

Name: ancient sand dragon
Desc 1: This gigantic creature is fully seventy feet long, covered in dull
Desc 2: yellow scales harder than steel. His talons are like swords; a strike
Desc 3: of his tail, like a thunderclap. He is an elder of his kind,
Desc 4: immensely powerful and malicious. Death follows in his wake.

Name: troglodyte
Desc 1: This tall, reptilian creature greatly ressembles a humanoid lizard.
Desc 2: Long and thin, it walks on two legs, has sharp claws and a crest
Desc 3: running over the top of its head. Its skin is greyish-brown, but it
Desc 4: can change the colour of its skin for camouflage.

Name: troglodyte leader
Desc 1: This tall, reptilian creature greatly ressembles a humanoid lizard.
Desc 2: Long and thin, it walks on two legs, and bears a long steel-tipped
Desc 3: spear in its hands. Smarter and stronger than its brothers, it
Desc 4: achieved this position by use of force and skill.

Name: rock eater
Desc 1: This strange rocky creature looks a little reptilian, but has stony
Desc 2: grey skin. It walks on four short legs, and has a broad flat head
Desc 3: with small black eyes. It peacefully chews on rocks with its wide
Desc 4: mouth.

Name: margoyle
Desc 1: This hideous creature appears to be made out of dark grey stone. Its
Desc 2: curved claws, batlike wings, and horned, demon-like head instill fear
Desc 3: in all but the boldest adventurers. They are known to be vicious
Desc 4: fighters, delighting in torture when their adversary is down.

Name: white scorpion
Desc 1: This pale scorpion is about six feet long, with pasty white skin and
Desc 2: black-tipped pincers and stinger. It moves about with great speed on
Desc 3: its eight legs, and is a vicious predator, attacking anything that
Desc 4: comes near.

Name: black pudding
Desc 1: This large, quivering blob oozes about at an astonishing rate,
Desc 2: considering it has no legs! It leaves a trail of corrosive acid
Desc 3: behind it, and consumes anything it comes in contact with.

Name: giant slug
Desc 1: This massive creature must be at least twenty-five feet long. It is
Desc 2: a mutation of the normal, benign slug, but in this form it is far
Desc 3: from harmless. Its raspy maw can deliver deadly bites, and it can
Desc 4: spit a highly corrosive acid at will.

Name: purple worm
Desc 1: This violet monstrosity burrows through the earth in search of prey.
Desc 2: It is thirty feet long, and has a mouth bristling with pointed teeth.
Desc 3: Attacking any source of vibration, the purple worm is a danger to be
Desc 4: feared and shunned.

Name: dwarf
Desc 1: This lightly-armoured dwarf goes about his daily business with a
Desc 2: determined gait. At his side swings a well-used battle axe-- after
Desc 3: all, even a regular citizen of Khazarad is a decent warrior.

Name: dwarven miner
Desc 1: This lightly-armoured dwarf works diligently in the many mines which
Desc 2: spread out like a spiderweb from the dwarven city. He is grungy and
Desc 3: somewhat antisocial, which makes him perfect for a miner's life. In
Desc 4: one hand he carries a heavy pickaxe, which he wields with skill.

Name: dwarven warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: Kai Master
Desc 1: This tall, powerful man has an ageless air about him. Although he
Desc 2: appears to be middle-aged, the look in his eyes and the unshakeable
Desc 3: way he appears to see through things speaks otherwise. Lithe and
Desc 4: quick, his eyes sparkle an unnatural blue.

Name: Kai Master
Desc 1: This tall, powerful man has an ageless air about him. Although he
Desc 2: appears to be middle-aged, the look in his eyes and the unshakeable
Desc 3: way he appears to see through things speaks otherwise. Lithe and
Desc 4: quick, his eyes sparkle an unnatural blue.

Name: quaggoth
Desc 1: This powerful humanoid creature stands seven feet and is covered
Desc 2: in shaggy white hair. Its beastlike head has milky white eyes and
Desc 3: a snarling mouth filled with sharp teeth. It has short, sharp claws,
Desc 4: and the strength of limb to cause great damage with them.

Name: quaggoth thonot
Desc 1: Ths powerful humanoid creature stands seven feet tall, and is covered
Desc 2: in shaggy white hair. Its beastlike head has milky white eyes and
Desc 3: a snarling mouth filled with sharp teeth. It has short, sharp claws,
Desc 4: and the strength of limb to cause great damage with them.

Name: quaggoth jald
Desc 1: Ths powerful humanoid creature stands seven feet tall, and is covered
Desc 2: in shaggy white hair. Its beastlike head has milky white eyes and
Desc 3: a snarling mouth filled with sharp teeth. In one hand it carries a
Desc 4: heavy steel hammer, which it wields with skill.

Name: huge obsidian golem
Desc 1: This twenty-foot-tall construction ressembles a human garbed in
Desc 2: strange, exotic armour. In one fist it grasps a heavy sword, whose
Desc 3: edge appears razor-sharp. Small spikes cover its entire body. Up the
Desc 4: the centre of its breastplate, strange angular runes are carved.

Name: stone elemental
Desc 1: This vaguely humanoid-shaped creature is formed out of the living
Desc 2: rock of the mountain itself. Studded with stones and precious gems,
Desc 3: it thunders along with a surprisingly quick gait. Standing over eight
Desc 4: feet tall, it would be a tough combatant.

Name: gemstone juggernaut
Desc 1: This colossal being towers over fifteen feet in height, and is nearly
Desc 2: as wide. It has a somewhat humanoid shape, with long arms and short
Desc 3: thick legs. Two rubies glow brightly where eyes might be. Since its
Desc 4: body is covered in gems, it is both damaging and well-armoured.

Name: duergar warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully. His
Desc 3: skin is sallow and greyish, his demeanor calculating and cruel. The
Desc 4: so-called deep dwarves are reknowned for their hatred of the good.

Name: duergar lord
Desc 1: This heavy-browed deep dwarf has piercing blue eyes, and a pallid
Desc 2: complexion that makes him look like a corpse. A palpable aura of
Desc 3: command surrounds him, and anyone can see that he is in control of
Desc 4: some mystical evil power.

Name: dwarf warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out dully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: dwarf warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully.
Desc 3: Skilled and powerful warriors, the dwarven folk of Khazarad are not
Desc 4: to be made enemies of lightly.

Name: brain eater
Desc 1: This small, hideous demon is no larger than a toad. It is covered in
Desc 2: slimy red skin, and has four crooked legs that end in razor-sharp
Desc 3: claws the size of daggers. It slits a person's head open and climbs
Desc 4: in, then controlling the corpse with uncanny skill.

Name: shapeshifter
Desc 1: This swiftly-changing mass of quivering white flesh shifts and
Desc 2: transforms in order to avoid attacks or to make itself more
Desc 3: destructive in combat. A black spiky form floats in its centre,
Desc 4: perhaps the brain or heart of the beast.

Name: winged demon
Desc 1: This man-sized demon somewhat ressembles an insect, and walks on two
Desc 2: jointed grasshopper-like legs. Two pairs of shimmering, angular wings
Desc 3: spread out from its back, and its six glistening black eyes gaze
Desc 4: about with predatory intelligence.

Name: rotting monstrosity
Desc 1: This hunched, rancid beast is roughly centauroid in shape, with four
Desc 2: thick stumpy legs and a squat head. Its four arms each end in a two-
Desc 3: foot long bone blade, which appears razor-sharp. All over its body
Desc 4: are oozing pustules and sores, and a foul stench puffs out from it.

Name: Gulgulthra
Desc 1: This bloated, sluglike creature is covered in a thick layer of
Desc 2: scaly hide. Ringing his round head are many long, rubbery tentacles,
Desc 3: each tipped with a razor-sharp claw. His gaping three-part mouth is
Desc 4: filled with serrated teeth, and his cluster of eyes glare out evilly!

Name: shifty dwarf
Desc 1: This dirty, disheveled dwarf appears to have crawled through the
Desc 2: gutter and back. Dressed in filthy rags, he talks to himself and
Desc 3: has a crazed look in his eye.

Name: Champion Gudruk
Desc 1: This massively-muscled dwarf appears the be recovering from some
Desc 2: nasty wounds. Bandages bound about his head, body and arms are
Desc 3: spotted with red. Although he is wounded, he still maintains a fierce
Desc 4: burning gaze, and has an aura of indomitable strength about him.

Name: Ghost of Trader Tull
Desc 1: The wavering form before you was that of the icon of commerce, Tull.
Desc 2: Now he is nothing more but an apparition, obviously still in waking
Desc 3: death because of his brutal murder that took place.

Name: purple slime
Desc 1: This is a small violet blob of protoplasm, which moves about with a
Desc 2: sickening slurping sound. Waving about in the air are thin tendrils,
Desc 3: which radiate a cold which saps the heat from the area.

Name: green slime
Desc 1: This is a small green blob of protoplasm, which moves about with a
Desc 2: sickening slurping sound. Waving about in the air are thin tendrils,
Desc 3: which drip a nauseating fluid.

Name: red slime
Desc 1: This is a small crimson blob of protoplasm, which moves about with a
Desc 2: sickening slurping sound. Waving about in the air are thin tendrils,
Desc 3: which radiate a heat that makes the air shimmer.

Name: azure slime
Desc 1: This is a small blue blob of protoplasm, which moves about with a
Desc 2: sickening slurping sound. Waving about in the air are thin tendrils,
Desc 3: which crackle with small bright sparks.

Name: white jelly
Desc 1: This is a large, lumpy, quivering blob of what appears to be oozing
Desc 2: while jelly. An acrid stink wafts from its blubbery mass, and its
Desc 3: moves about with surprising speed with a rolling motion.

Name: zombie cat
Desc 1: This stiff, undead cat is surprisingly large, and moves with somewhat
Desc 2: less grace than it did in life. Being dead has its advantages,
Desc 3: however, and the zombie cat is both vastly stronger and tougher than
Desc 4: any mortal cat.

Name: rotworm
Desc 1: This long, fat worm is a nauseating phlegm-yellow in colour, and
Desc 2: reeks of rot and filth. Black ropy veins can be seen pulsating
Desc 3: beneath its thin skin, and its oversized mouth is filled with long
Desc 4: needle-like teeth.

Name: leprous outcast
Desc 1: This hunched, ragged figure is swathed in filthy robes and bandages,
Desc 2: which completely obscure its features. Pus stains its clothes and a
Desc 3: foul reek surrounds it like a shroud. In one hand it holds a rusted
Desc 4: blade.

Name: dark dabbler
Desc 1: This hunched figure appears to be human, but moves with a strange
Desc 2: slowness and smells strongly of rot and decay. Dead cats hang from
Desc 3: his belt like grisly war trophies. It moves about clutching a gnarled
Desc 4: wooden staff, searching the sewers for new victims.

Name: thief
Desc 1: This shifty-eyed human is garbed in light leathers, and constantly
Desc 2: looks around as if watching for guards. Wielding a short blade, he
Desc 3: appears fairly capable and cold-hearted.

Name: smuggler
Desc 1: Wearing studded leather armour and bearing a viciously-spiked club,
Desc 2: this shady character has the careless gaze of the career criminal.
Desc 3: Known for their unscrupulousness, the smugglers of Silvermere will
Desc 4: do what needs to be done if they are discovered.

Name: smuggler boss
Desc 1: This middle-aged man is stocky and grizzled, bearing the scars of
Desc 2: many an alley-fight. With a keen, surveying gaze and the casual
Desc 3: ruthlessness of the natural predator, he hasn't kept his position by
Desc 4: being nice.

Name: half-orc sentry
Desc 1: This tall, ugly creature has the features of a human, but the cunning
Desc 2: and ferocity of an orc. Used as lookouts because of their greater
Desc 3: discipline and perception, they are not quite as tough as their full-
Desc 4: blooded orcish brethren.

Name: orc warrior
Desc 1: This tall, ferocious-looking orc wears chainmail and wields a razor-
Desc 2: sharp scimitar, a sure sign of high rank. He is disciplined and holds
Desc 3: himself in such a manner as to indicate that he knows how to use his
Desc 4: weapon skilfully.

Name: orc shaman
Desc 1: This brutal-looking figure is garbed in a rough brown robe. Glowing
Desc 2: red eyes peer at you from the depths of its hood, and it waves its
Desc 3: clawed hands about in mystical patterns. An evil aura emanates from
Desc 4: this creature.

Name: black orc boss
Desc 1: This huge, powerful orc has skin as black as night, and glowing red
Desc 2: eyes that burn with evil intensity. Clutched in one hand is a heavy
Desc 3: serrated scimitar, and a long shirt of black chainmail protects him.

Name: worker ant
Desc 1: This large, blood-red ant is about a foot and a half long, with
Desc 2: unnaturally large and powerful jaws. It scuttles about quickly, its
Desc 3: six legs bearing it rapidly wherever there is work to be done.

Name: soldier ant
Desc 1: This large, blood-red ant is about a foot and a half long, with a
Desc 2: large head and long, razor-sharp mandibles. It is ferocious and will
Desc 3: fight to the death to protect the sanctity of the nest and the queen.

Name: queen ant
Desc 1: This large, fat creature is a dark red, and is hideously bloated from
Desc 2: egg production. Nearly immobile, the queen's sole purpose it to lay
Desc 3: as many eggs as possible to ensure propagation of her brood.

Name: Leo the Quick
Desc 1: This tall, fat man is garbed in expensive crushed velvet the colour
Desc 2: of red wine. He has an arrogant, pompous smirk, and is quite the
Desc 3: braggart-- but many have mistaken him for a weakling and have died to
Desc 4: his lightning-quick blade.

Name: dark apprentice
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is garbed in flowing robes of dark grey
Desc 2: and black, and moves with an alarming grace. Emblazoned on the front
Desc 3: and cuffs of its robe is a clenched white fist.

Name: dark monk
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is garbed in flowing robes of dark grey
Desc 2: and black, and moves with an alarming grace. Emblazoned on the front
Desc 3: and cuffs of its robe is a clenched grey fist.

Name: dark mystic
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is garbed in flowing robes of dark grey
Desc 2: and black, and moves with an alarming grace. Emblazoned on the front
Desc 3: and cuffs of its robe is a clenched red fist.

Name: dread mystic
Desc 1: Tall and powerfully built, this intimidating figure has the speed of
Desc 2: a cobra, the stealth of a cat, and the ruthless predatory instinct
Desc 3: of a tiger. He is garbed in flowing nightblack robes, embellished
Desc 4: with deep blue symbols representing a clenched fist.

Name: flesh golem
Desc 1: This eight-foot-tall monstrosity appears to have been put together
Desc 2: from assorted body parts. Hideous and powerful, it is devoid of all
Desc 3: sentiment and is now nothing but a relentless killer.

Name: zombie
Desc 1: This is an animated, rotting corpse. It walks around listlessly, and
Desc 2: its eyeless face gives no hint of emotion. The necromantic magic that
Desc 3: has animated this creation has made it quite tough to slay, and it is
Desc 4: imbued with an unnatural strength.

Name: ju-ju zombie
Desc 1: This is an animated, rotting corpse. It walks around listlessly, and
Desc 2: its eyeless face gives no hint of emotion. The necromantic magic that
Desc 3: has animated this creation has made it quite tough to slay, and it is
Desc 4: imbued with an unnatural strength.

Name: necromancer
Desc 1: Ragged black robes are wrapped around the skeletally-thin form of the
Desc 2: necromancer. Not quite dead but certainly not living, he exists
Desc 3: between the realm of life and death, transforming all he meets into
Desc 4: leathery-skinned zombies who serve him.

Name: crazed lunatic
Desc 1: This naked, drooling idiot runs about like, well, a madman. Filled
Desc 2: with a berserk, all-consuming fury, he fights anything he sees with
Desc 3: no regard for his own life.

Name: depraved murderer
Desc 1: This slobbering, vicious murderer prowls about here in search of
Desc 2: victims. He holds a bloodstained axe in one hand, and a large bag
Desc 3: full of scalps in the other. A leather muzzle covers most of his
Desc 4: features, with the exception of the burning hatred in his gaze.

Name: twisted guard
Desc 1: The strange nightmarish forces that have warped the asylum have also
Desc 2: changed its guards. Now with almost bestial features, the asylum
Desc 3: guards are nothing more than crazed killers, wielding their clubs
Desc 4: with deadly force.

Name: insane mage
Desc 1: This leering, maniacal figure runs about in tattered clothes. Driven
Desc 2: insane by drawing too much magic, he was institutionalized.
Desc 3: Eventually the twisted forces leaking from his shattered mind warped
Desc 4: the very reality of the asylum, turning into a realm of nightmares.

Name: old man
Desc 1: This old, wizened man is garbed in tattered robes and is chained to
Desc 2: the wall. Despite his advanced age, his gaze is piercing and he
Desc 3: appears more than competent.

Name: foul creation
Desc 1: This reeking, misshapen creature is the failed result of a mage's
Desc 2: magical experiments. Twisted beyond recognition, its former shape
Desc 3: cannot be guessed at. Tossed down in these caves to be forgotten, it
Desc 4: has grown lonely and hateful in the darkness.

Name: chaos demonling
Desc 1: This tiny, vicious creature is the unwanted result of a failed
Desc 2: summoning spell. Wild and uncontrollable, it is incredibly fast and
Desc 3: deadly for its size, and delights in ruin and chaos.

Name: abomination
Desc 1: This hulking, freakish monstrosity was surely born in the sordid
Desc 2: depths of the mad mage Whittaker's unholy laboratories. These unholy
Desc 3: castoffs of aborted creation live as testaments to the far reaches
Desc 4: some mages will go in search for power and knowledge.

Name: shadow guard
Desc 1: This is a shadowy spirit in the vague shape of a human, with glowing
Desc 2: red points of light where its eyes should be. It is hard to see, and
Desc 3: seems to fade in and out of existance. In one hand it grips a blade
Desc 4: of spectral energy which it wields menacingly.

Name: Morukai
Desc 1: This tall, mysterious figure is one of the heroes of legend. Garbed
Desc 2: in midnight blue robes, he wields arcane magic that would burn the
Desc 3: souls of less powerful wizards. Morukai was instrumental in the
Desc 4: defeat of the dark one ages ago, and is the most powerful mage alive.

Name: haunting spirit
Desc 1: This wispy, translucent apparition is bound to this area in death,
Desc 2: and wails mournfully.

Name: duergar captain
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully. His
Desc 3: skin is sallow and greyish, his demeanor calculating and cruel. The
Desc 4: so-called deep dwarves are reknowned for their hatred of the good.

Name: practice dummy
Desc 1: This large stuffed dummy somehow has survived all the ravages the
Desc 2: city has thrown at it. Magically enchanted to endure unlimited
Desc 3: beating, it is used for combat practice and to test weapons.

Name: Tyrannosaur
Desc 1: Before you towers a terrible lizard beast, standing upright, it is
Desc 2: over eighteen feet tall. It lets out a spine shattering roar and the
Desc 3: rancid stink of death almost bowls you over. Long razors of teeth
Desc 4: adorn its gaping maw that could easily swallow you in one bite.

Name: tetraraptor
Desc 1: Standing a mere three feet tall this lizard creature gazes at you
Desc 2: with frightening intelligence as it moves with fluid agility. Flesh
Desc 3: rending claws curve out cruelly from its arms and feet, looking
Desc 4: as though it would hold you down even as it was slicing you open.

Name: ruby guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this embodiment of ruby gems is man or
Desc 2: monster, but it looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow
Desc 3: kept together by some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to
Desc 4: gaze at you, searching for something.

Name: zapsalis
Desc 1: Black ichor drips from long spindly claws of this reptilian creature.
Desc 2: Seven feet tall it has strange swirling eyes that seem mesmerizing,
Desc 3: it begins moving towards you, claws outstretched, ready to fill your
Desc 4: veins with its poisonous touch.

Name: pteranodon
Desc 1: Swooping about you is a great reptile with a wingspan of over twenty
Desc 2: feet. Its thick leathery skin offers ample protection as it hovers
Desc 3: and glides about, its eyes settle on you and it begins a dive, ready
Desc 4: to spear you with its long beak.

Name: topaz guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this armored force of cut topaz is man
Desc 2: or monster, but it looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are
Desc 3: somehow kept together by some force, and the eyes of the guardian
Desc 4: seem to gaze at you, searching for something.

Name: Tyrannosaur
Desc 1: Before you towers a terrible lizard beast, standing upright, it is
Desc 2: over eighteen feet tall. It lets out a spine shattering roar and the
Desc 3: rancid stink of death almost bowls you over. Long razors of teeth
Desc 4: adorn its gaping maw that could easily swallow you in one bite.

Name: deinodon
Desc 1: This black scaled reptile charges at you immediately, powerful legs
Desc 2: reaching immossible speeds for its thirty foot long body. It lets
Desc 3: out a roar, and saliva drips from its massive fanged maw, ready to
Desc 4: easily devour you.

Name: amber guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this being of solid amber is man or
Desc 2: monster, but it looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow
Desc 3: kept together by some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to
Desc 4: gaze at you, searching for something.

Name: horned demon
Desc 1: This towering demon has brilliant yellow skin and two sharpened
Desc 2: sets of antlers that branch out from the sides of its head. Its
Desc 3: powerful arms have long, hooked claws, and its glaring black eyes
Desc 4: have no hint of mercy in them.

Name: flaming mammoth
Desc 1: A massive burning beast of hellfire stands before you. A nightmarish
Desc 2: mix of elephant and bull, it stands up right fifteen feet, with two
Desc 3: great horns coming from its head and long tusks that protrude from
Desc 4: its jaw. Its large trunk ends in a wickedly curved spike.

Name: emerald guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this hulk of emerald is man or monster, but
Desc 2: it looks just as fearsome. FInely cut gems are somehow kept together
Desc 3: by some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to gaze at you,
Desc 4: searching for something.

Name: ankylosaur
Desc 1: Covered in thick plated scales this lizard is a well armoured
Desc 2: monster. Standing on four stubby legs, it devours a nearby plant,
Desc 3: ignoring you completely. Behind it you see a long thick tail ending
Desc 4: in a large bone cluster, looking like a large mace.

Name: stegosaur
Desc 1: A massive creature stands here before you, it is easily eight feet
Desc 2: tall, not including the passive bone plates that jut from its back.
Desc 3: Animal dumbness fills its eyes and it ignores you entirely, you note
Desc 4: with unease the massive spikes that reside at the end of its tail.

Name: sapphire guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this sapphire servant is man or monster,
Desc 2: but it looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow kept
Desc 3: together by some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to gaze at
Desc 4: you, searching for something.

Name: deinonychus
Desc 1: Long grasping talons and edged teeth are the only greeting you find
Desc 2: from this reptile creature. Standing upright it is six feet tall,
Desc 3: with spindly arms and hind legs which send it running at high speeds.
Desc 4: Snapping and growling at you, it prepares to get its next meal.

Name: tetraraptor
Desc 1: Standing a mere three feet tall this lizard creature gazes at you
Desc 2: with frightening intelligence as it moves with fluid agility. Flesh
Desc 3: rending claws curve out cruelly from its arms and feet, looking
Desc 4: as though it would hold you down even as it was slicing you open.

Name: amethyst guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this beast of glowing amethyst is man or
Desc 2: monster, but it looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow
Desc 3: kept together by some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to
Desc 4: gaze at you, searching for something.

Name: disenchanter
Desc 1: This fierce-looking guard looks at you with intense distrust. He
Desc 2: caries a shield with a crimson flame on it and wields a broadsword.
Desc 3: Garbed in crimson scale armour, he moves with unsettling confidence
Desc 4: and has a certain fanatical gleam to his eye.

Name: eradicator
Desc 1: This guard gives you a look bordering on hatred. Wielding a deadly
Desc 2: longsword, colored crimson to match his shield. Wearing crimson
Desc 3: leathers, he follows your every move with his eyes, filled with a
Desc 4: zealous rage.

Name: onyx guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this onyx beast is man or monster, but it
Desc 2: looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow kept together by
Desc 3: some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to gaze at you,
Desc 4: searching for something.

Name: demonhunter
Desc 1: Scars and tatoos almost make this person unrecognizable. His stoney
Desc 2: eyes gaze at you, seeing nothing more then another target. Full scale
Desc 3: armour of crimson hue guard him against danger, while a massive
Desc 4: greatsword are held by his seasoned hands.

Name: Crazed Inquisitor
Desc 1: It is evident this man was once handsome and strong, but sleepless
Desc 2: eyes and a foaming mouth show his sanity is long lost. He babbles
Desc 3: in guttural tongues and the bite marks on his arms and hands show he
Desc 4: has inflicted those upon himself. A vile greataxe is his only weapon.

Name: silver guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this pure silver is man or monster, but it
Desc 2: looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow kept together by
Desc 3: some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to gaze at you,
Desc 4: searching for something.

Name: Inquisitor Fulgore
Desc 1: This haggard man with blood-shot eyes has seen better days, and those
Desc 2: are long gone. The stink of old sweat mixed with blood comes strongly
Desc 3: from him and his crimson armor. He looks at you with a mix of
Desc 4: distrust and apathy.

Name: flaming zombie
Desc 1: Charred burning flesh are all you see of this walking dead thing.
Desc 2: A cloud of ash follows its every step and its mouth and eyes are
Desc 3: nothing but places for smoke to escape. Some wicked power created and
Desc 4: controls this burning puppet, and they seem intent upon ending you.

Name: gold guardian
Desc 1: It is hard to say whether this guardian of gold is man or monster,
Desc 2: but it looks just as fearsome. Finely cut gems are somehow kept
Desc 3: together by some force, and the eyes of the guardian seem to gaze at
Desc 4: you, searching for something.

Name: flaming waist
Desc 1: This is the severed lower body of something that has been dead for a
Desc 2: long, long time. Despite this condition it seems very lively and
Desc 3: senses your presence. To your horror it begins to lurch towards you.

Name: flaming torso
Desc 1: The severed upper body of something that has been dead for awhile is
Desc 2: floating towards you by unknown means. The head of this nightmare
Desc 3: suddenly seems alive, cursing at you and snapping its teeth as if it
Desc 4: had been waiting to dine on flesh for ages untold.

Name: diamond guardian
Desc 1: Massive cut diamonds make up this magical beast. It glows brightly
Desc 2: with some inner power, and you feel chills looking at the eyes, which
Desc 3: pulse with life. A single cut diamond is shaped to looks like a
Desc 4: broadsword, which gleams brightly.

Name: guardsman
Desc 1: This is a fierce-looking guardsman. He wields a drawn broadsword and
Desc 2: carries a round shield, and his well-polished chainmail armour gleams
Desc 3: in the light. Guardsmen are known to be excellent fighters, and are
Desc 4: more than a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: Spacelord
Desc 1: The entity emits the most powerful energy you have ever felt. He
Desc 2: exists more as a spiritual entity rather then a physical one, and
Desc 3: appears as a semi-transparent figure of vaguely humanoid form-- his
Desc 4: true features cannot be distinguished.

Name: Vashti
Desc 1: This firey lady is an identical twin sister to Vasili. The nymph
Desc 2: is almost entirely naked, save for her multi-layered blazing skirts.
Desc 3: She moves gracefully, and as she walks small flames dance along her
Desc 4: skirts and flowing red hair. She gestures playfully at you.

Name: Vasili
Desc 1: This firey lady is an identical twin sister to Vashti. The nymph
Desc 2: is almost entirely naked, save for her multi-layered blazing skirts.
Desc 3: She moves elegantly, and as she walks small stones sparkle in her
Desc 4: flaming red hair. She smiles seductively you.

Name: burnt witchunter
Desc 1: Blisters and scorchmarks cover nearly all of the witchunters body.
Desc 2: Half of his armour seems missing or incomplete, and his weapon
Desc 3: looks warped from heat. He has ripped some of his underclothing
Desc 4: to make bandages for his wounds, but the cloths are all bloodsoaked.

Name: Cygani
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: platinum knight
Desc 1: This vision of the supernatural mixed with reality gazes at you with
Desc 2: furious, dead eyes. Armoured in platinum and wielding a blade of the
Desc 3: same metal, his ghostly arm swings it at you, righteous rage evident
Desc 4: on his spectral face.

Name: Old Mother Woodard
Desc 1: Short and round, this grey-haired lady has a warm, wrinkled
Desc 2: face and inviting smile. A beautiful apron wrapped about her
Desc 3: waist looks new and wellborn compared to her peasant garb.
Desc 4: Her two black boots thunk loudly as she walks about.

Name: Farmer Woodard
Desc 1: Tall and lean, this old man wears a flat straw cap and brocade
Desc 2: overalls. His white tunic was worn and over-soiled years ago, and
Desc 3: sports many mends and signs of repeated repair. In striking contrast
Desc 4: to his attire, though, is a fine pair of hardened leather boots.

Name: necromancer
Desc 1: Ragged black robes are wrapped around the skeletally-thin form of the
Desc 2: necromancer. Not quite dead but certainly not living, he exists
Desc 3: between the realm of life and death, and drains the souls from all
Desc 4: those he meets.

Name: stone sphinx
Desc 1: This intimidating-looking creature has the body of a powerful lion,
Desc 2: and the head of a noble man. However, it is easily twice the normal
Desc 3: size, and seems to be made out of sandstone. The intelligent glitter
Desc 4: in its eyes is an obvious sign of life, and it watches you intently.

Name: stone sphinx
Desc 1: This intimidating-looking creature has the body of a powerful lion,
Desc 2: and the head of a noble man. However, it is easily twice the normal
Desc 3: size, and seems to be made out of sandstone. The intelligent glitter
Desc 4: in its eyes is an obvious sign of life, and it watches you intently.

Name: stone sphinx
Desc 1: This intimidating-looking creature has the body of a powerful lion,
Desc 2: and the head of a noble man. However, it is easily twice the normal
Desc 3: size, and seems to be made out of sandstone. The intelligent glitter
Desc 4: in its eyes is an obvious sign of life, and it watches you intently.

Name: stone sphinx
Desc 1: This intimidating-looking creature has the body of a powerful lion,
Desc 2: and the head of a noble man. However, it is easily twice the normal
Desc 3: size, and seems to be made out of sandstone. The intelligent glitter
Desc 4: in its eyes is an obvious sign of life, and it watches you intently.

Name: stone sphinx
Desc 1: This intimidating-looking creature has the body of a powerful lion,
Desc 2: and the head of a noble man. However, it is easily twice the normal
Desc 3: size, and seems to be made out of sandstone. The intelligent glitter
Desc 4: in its eyes is an obvious sign of life, and it watches you intently.

Name: nekojin traveler
Desc 1: This well-dressed creature greatly ressembles a bipedal cat, with
Desc 2: long tufted ears and beautiful oval eyes. It stands about five feet
Desc 3: tall, and sports a ferocious smile that is somewhat unsettling,
Desc 4: despite the creature's apparent good mood.

Name: nekojin elder
Desc 1: This short, fierce Nekojin is garbed in simple white robes, and is
Desc 2: gnarled with age. Despite this, he has a piercing gaze and an aura of
Desc 3: power that is unmistakeable.

Name: nekojin
Desc 1: This well-dressed creature greatly ressembles a bipedal cat, with
Desc 2: long tufted ears and beautiful oval eyes. It stands about five feet
Desc 3: tall, and sports a ferocious smile that is somewhat unsettling,
Desc 4: despite the creature's apparent good mood.

Name: nekojin guardian
Desc 1: This well-dressed creature greatly ressembles a bipedal cat, with
Desc 2: long tufted ears and beautiful oval eyes. It is larger and more
Desc 3: powerfully-built than most, and has a deadly grace that is notable,
Desc 4: even for its race.

Name: stronghold guard
Desc 1: This grim-looking figure is garbed in worn leather armour, and a
Desc 2: long scimitar hangs in a sheath at his side. On constant alert for
Desc 3: Saracen raiders, he is very suspicious of outsiders.

Name: guard sergeant
Desc 1: The sergeant of the stronghold guards is a large, clever brute who
Desc 2: enjoys nothing more than a good fight. He is garbed in heavy leather
Desc 3: armour, and wields a large scimitar.

Name: Master Trader Tolgard
Desc 1: This hard, portly man sits at his desk going over records and
Desc 2: ledgers. Never one to mince words, he gets straight to the point in
Desc 3: a very un-traderlike way. It is he who controls this stronghold and
Desc 4: all its resources.

Name: seeress
Desc 1: This beautiful, elegant woman has strangely youthful features, that
Desc 2: belie the aura of knowing that she possesses. She is garbed in a
Desc 3: seductive, almost revealing gown, and uses dramatic makeup that only
Desc 4: accentuates her beauty.

Name: beautiful woman
Desc 1: This incredibly beautiful woman is a vision of perfection. She wears
Desc 2: long white robes, and has an expression of ultimate serenity and
Desc 3: happiness upon her face. She carries a bowl of delicious-looking
Desc 4: fruit about in her hands.

Name: handsome man
Desc 1: This incredibly handsome man is a vision of perfection. He wears long
Desc 2: white robes, and has an expression of ultimate serenity and happiness
Desc 3: upon his face. He carries a bowl of delicious-looking fruit in his
Desc 4: hands.

Name: rakshasha
Desc 1: This frightening creature stands nearly seven feet tall, and greatly
Desc 2: ressembles a bipedal tiger. It is garbed in expensive silk clothing
Desc 3: and fine jewelry. Rakshasha are masters of illusion and are powerful
Desc 4: wizards, and their hatred of other species knows no bounds.

Name: rakshasha rukh
Desc 1: This frightening creature stands nearly seven feet tall, and greatly
Desc 2: ressembles a bipedal tiger. It is garbed in expensive silk clothing
Desc 3: and fine jewelry. Rakshasha Rukhs are the elite of the species, and
Desc 4: are much more powerful than the normal type.

Name: rakshasha sage
Desc 1: This frightening creature stands nearly seven feet tall, and greatly
Desc 2: ressembles a bipedal tiger. It appears old and decrepit, and one of
Desc 3: its eyes is covered by a gilded leather patch. Ancient Rakshasha are
Desc 4: usually just as fierce as the young, as they have nothing to lose.

Name: rakshasha rajah
Desc 1: This large, powerfully-built rakshasha's eyes burn with intensity.
Desc 2: He is clothed in the finest silks, and glittering jewelry literally
Desc 3: hangs off of him. The definition of opulent, the rakshasha lord is a
Desc 4: fearsome fighter and mage whose power is rarely challenged.

Name: withered old man
Desc 1: This crooked, cowering old man reeks strongly of alcohol. His skin
Desc 2: is heavily creased and wrinkled, and his eyes deeply sunken-- they
Desc 3: are strangely dead and lifeless. He is garbed in filthy clothing and
Desc 4: clutches a rancid wineskin. He mutters softly to himself.

Name: saracen raider
Desc 1: This tall, arrogant warrior is nothing more than a self-righteous
Desc 2: brigand. Barely believing in the extreme religion he follows, he is
Desc 3: a thug and murderer who lives simply to bring pain upon others. The
Desc 4: only law he lives by is the rule of greater strength.

Name: saracen leader
Desc 1: This tall, arrogant warrior is nothing more than a self-righteous
Desc 2: brigand. Barely believing in the extreme religion he follows, he is
Desc 3: a thug and murderer who lives simply to bring pain upon others. He
Desc 4: leads only because he is stronger or more ruthless than the others.

Name: giant roc
Desc 1: This titanic creature ressembles a vulture, but of an incredible
Desc 2: size. Its wingspan must be at least a hundred feet wide, its beak as
Desc 3: long as a canoe and razor-sharp. Each talon is as long as a human is
Desc 4: tall. Luckily it is huge enough that it ignores most small folk.

Name: black asp
Desc 1: This deadly serpent reaches nearly six feet in length, and has
Desc 2: powerful jaws that enable it to pierce armour to deliver its poison.
Desc 3: It is not truly evil, but attacks any creature that approaches. It is
Desc 4: best to be wary of this snake.

Name: giant scorpion
Desc 1: This huge scorpion measures at least ten feet long, with shiny black
Desc 2: carapace and razor-sharp pincers. Its long, segmented tail holds a
Desc 3: deadly stinger that can punch through platemail with ease. It is a
Desc 4: vicious predator, attacking anything that comes near.

Name: sandworm
Desc 1: This long, sand-coloured worm is about two feet in diameter, and
Desc 2: moves with great speed through the desert. It is a natural predator,
Desc 3: burrowing quickly beneath its target and then striking upwards and
Desc 4: biting with its sharp teeth.

Name: dustdevil
Desc 1: This whirling creature is shrouded in a man-sized tornado of sand.
Desc 2: Two burning red eyes can be seen glowing from within the whirlwind,
Desc 3: accompanied by a malevolent evil presence.

Name: nomad
Desc 1: This peaceful nomad wanders the desert, simply seeking to live in
Desc 2: solitude. Ususally hired by merchants to transport objects from place
Desc 3: to place, he also sells water for those who are in dire need.

Name: saracen zealot
Desc 1: This fanatical saracen follows the tenet of his intolerant religion
Desc 2: with bloodthirsty fervor. A wild, insane light burns in his eyes,
Desc 3: which constantly look about as if searching for unbelievers.

Name: saracen high priest
Desc 1: This wild-eyed old man has a long grey beard and a fierce demeanor.
Desc 2: Cleary quite insane, he has an overwhelming charisma, that when
Desc 3: combined with his extreme religious rhetoric, is effective in
Desc 4: converting people to his faith.

Name: spiny tentacle
Desc 1: This long, gnarled tentacle is a dull green in colour, with thick
Desc 2: rubbery skin. Nasty-looking spines jut out along its length, and the
Desc 3: vicious maw at its tip gnashes needle-like teeth. A steaming liquid
Desc 4: drips from its mouth, causing the ground to pit and char.

Name: hideous abomination
Desc 1: This gargantuan beast is covered with thick, rubbery skin and
Desc 2: wickedly-curved spines. Many serpentine tentacles sprout from its
Desc 3: hunched back, and its eyeless head is wide and blunt-nosed. Its mouth
Desc 4: is filled with fangs and is large enough to swallow someone whole.

Name: stomach lining
Desc 1: This is the lining of the stomach wall. The only way to escape from
Desc 2: this foul beast's stomach is by forcing it to spit you up!

Name: jackal-headed warrior
Desc 1: This tall, powerfully-built man is garbed in an ornate skirt and
Desc 2: sandals. His bare chest glistens with oils, and in one hand he wields
Desc 3: a heavy blade. However, instead of a normal head he has the head of
Desc 4: a vicious, snarling jackal!

Name: falcon-headed warrior
Desc 1: This tall, powerfully-built man is garbed in an ornate skirt and
Desc 2: sandals. His bare chest glistens with oils, and in one hand he wields
Desc 3: a heavy blade. However, instead of a normal head he has the feathered
Desc 4: head of a ruthless, keen-eyed falcon!

Name: serpent-headed warrior
