Desc 1: This tall, powerfully-built man is garbed in an ornate skirt and
Desc 2: sandals. His bare chest glistens with oils, and in one hand he wields
Desc 3: a heavy blade. However, instead of a normal head he has the head of
Desc 4: a black-scaled serpent!

Name: undead priest
Desc 1: This eternally rotting corpse is animated by some evil, unnatural
Desc 2: force. Once a high-ranking priest of the Dark One, it now serves him
Desc 3: in death, retaining its unholy powers even after death. It has no
Desc 4: mercy for the living.

Name: manscorpion
Desc 1: This hideous creature is part scorpion and part humanoid. Atop a
Desc 2: giant scorpion's dun-coloured body is the upper body of a human. Its
Desc 3: skin is tough and flexible, and it possesses a brutal cunning. These
Desc 4: strange creatures use long polearms in addition to their stingers.

Name: manscorpion shaman
Desc 1: This hideous creature is part scorpion and part humanoid. Atop a
Desc 2: giant scorpion's dun-coloured body is the upper body of a human. Its
Desc 3: skin is tough and flexible, and it possesses a brutal cunning. These
Desc 4: strange creatures use long polearms in addition to their stingers.

Name: manscorpion king
Desc 1: This hideous creature is part scorpion and part humanoid. Atop a
Desc 2: giant scorpion's dun-coloured body is the upper body of a human. Huge
Desc 3: and incredibly tough, the king of the manscorpions is a fearsome
Desc 4: warrior as well as a skilled spellcaster.

Name: hydra
Desc 1: This monstrous, reptilian beast has thick scaly skin that glistens
Desc 2: with oily secretions. It has many heads attached to long, serpentine
Desc 3: necks, that act independently of the body. Hydras have incredible
Desc 4: regeneration and are rumoured to be able to regrow their heads.

Name: hydra head
Desc 1: Each head of the monstrous hydra has beady, glowing red eyes, and a
Desc 2: gaping maw full of wickedly curved teeth. Atop a serpentine neck,
Desc 3: each head can attack a different target, in any direction.

Name: wraith
Desc 1: This unnerving apparition seems to be your worst nightmare-- a large
Desc 2: shadowy figure with long, wicked claws and hellishly burning eyes.
Desc 3: It exits only to bring death to living creatures, and leaves no
Desc 4: being it encounters alive.

Name: shade
Desc 1: This is a shadowy spirit in the vague shape of a human, with glowing
Desc 2: red points of light where its eyes should be. It is hard to see, and
Desc 3: seems to fade in and out of existance.

Name: spectre
Desc 1: This nearly transparent apparition moans softly as it floats about.
Desc 2: It clutches its torn white funeral rags closely to itself. Although
Desc 3: it appears sad and lonely, the undead are known to vent their rage
Desc 4: and frustration upon the living.

Name: Pharaoh Rastep
Desc 1: This tall, intense man is garbed in the gilded clothes of a desert
Desc 2: king. Upon his fierce brow sits a golden headdress, fashioned in the
Desc 3: likeness of a serpent, which hangs down over his shoulders. In one
Desc 4: hand he grips a divine symbol, and in the other, a dark rod.

Name: dying pharaoh
Desc 1: The pharaoh, once arrogantly noble and tyranically powerful, now lays
Desc 2: dying on the stone floor. Broken and cut from many wounds, he is
Desc 3: aging at an unnatural rate, that will soon take him from this mortal
Desc 4: realm. Strangely, he looks sad and peaceful now.

Name: grey portal
Desc 1: This swirling grey portal has ragged edges that crackle with a
Desc 2: crystalline light. A smell like salt and sand wafts from within the
Desc 3: portal, as well as an earthy stone scent.

Name: Dao Lord
Desc 1: This powerful being is a native of the elemental plane of earth. A
Desc 2: greater spirit of overwhelming evil, it works solely to futher its
Desc 3: own twisted goals, causing pain and suffering in its wake. Known for
Desc 4: their incredible power and cunning, the Dao are deadly foes.

Name: floating key
Desc 1: This is a small, golden key, which is lazily spinning in the air in
Desc 2: the middle of a shaft of light.

Name: huge fungus creature
Desc 1: This hulking creature appears to be part beast, part fungus... it is
Desc 2: humanoid, with a jutting head, long arms and stumpy legs. Vicious
Desc 3: talons spring from its fingertips. It is covered with a thick layer
Desc 4: of all manner of fungus, and it is hard to tell if it is even alive.

Name: gaunt one temple master
Desc 1: This tall, ancient gaunt one is garbed in the ceremonial robes of a
Desc 2: greater priest. Armed with the ancient knowledge of his people, his
Desc 3: role is to provide gaunts of a certain age with their birthright--
Desc 4: the ability to perceive concealed life forms.

Name: saracen raider
Desc 1: This tall, arrogant warrior is nothing more than a self-righteous
Desc 2: brigand. Barely believing in the extreme religion he follows, he is
Desc 3: a thug and murderer who lives simply to bring pain upon others. The
Desc 4: only law he lives by is the rule of greater strength.

Name: saracen commander
Desc 1: This tall, arrogant warrior is nothing more than a self-righteous
Desc 2: brigand. Barely believing in the extreme religion he follows, he is
Desc 3: a thug and murderer who lives simply to bring pain upon others. He
Desc 4: leads only because he is stronger or more ruthless than the others.

Name: hardened practice dummy
Desc 1: This large stuffed dummy somehow has survived all the ravages the
Desc 2: city has thrown at it. Magically enchanted to endure unlimited
Desc 3: beating, it is used to test combat and spellcasting skills. This
Desc 4: particular one has been hardened and enchanted to resist attacks.

Name: nekojin priestess
Desc 1: This well-dressed creature greatly ressembles a bipedal cat, with
Desc 2: long tufted ears and beautiful oval eyes. She is garbed in flowing
Desc 3: white hooded robes, but wears the hood down. Here gaze is steady and
Desc 4: unwavering, and you get the impression that she knows much.

Name: Argak the Grey
Desc 1: Standing before you is a stocky gnome, garbed in plain grey robes.
Desc 2: His coal eyes look at you with great acuity and his brown, wrinkled
Desc 3: face smiles. The mixed smell of fresh earth, and granite strongly
Desc 4: emenates from his body. He holds a petrified staff to his side.

Name: Choira Pyromancer
Desc 1: This red haired woman looks incredibly young for one with so much
Desc 2: wisdom behind her eyes. Her freckled skin seems to illuminate
Desc 3: everything around you, and her crimson robes emenate a burning heat.
Desc 4: Ruby lips smile at you as she curtsies, setting aside her ash staff.

Name: Lallim Whitemane
Desc 1: Crystal blue eyes of a middle aged elf greet you from under the hood
Desc 2: of a robe so starkly white it almost blinds you. He pulls down his
Desc 3: hood revealing a massve mane of long white locks, and he clasps his
Desc 4: hands together and bows.

Name: Sharh'Kur
Desc 1: Chills run down your skin just gazing at this ancient wise man. His
Desc 2: pale skin almost seems stretched beyond its means. His pupiless eyes
Desc 3: gaze at you, following your every move, dispelling the notion that he
Desc 4: is blind. His long fingers wrap around a long bluish staff.

Name: Argak the Grey
Desc 1: Standing before you is a stocky gnome, garbed in plain grey robes.
Desc 2: His coal eyes look at you with great acuity and his brown, wrinkled
Desc 3: face smiles. The mixed smell of fresh earth, and granite strongly
Desc 4: emenates from his body. He holds a petrified staff to his side.

Name: Choira Pyromancer
Desc 1: This red haired woman looks incredibly young for one with so much
Desc 2: wisdom behind her eyes. Her freckled skin seems to illuminate
Desc 3: everything around you, and her crimson robes emanate a burning heat.
Desc 4: Ruby lips smile at you as she curtsies, setting aside her ash staff.

Name: Lallim Whitemane
Desc 1: Crystal blue eyes of a middle aged elf greet you from under the hood
Desc 2: of a robe so starkly white it almost blinds you. He pulls down his
Desc 3: hood revealing a massve mane of long white locks, and he clasps his
Desc 4: hands to gether and bows. The air seems alive and your skin tingles.

Name: Sharh'Kur
Desc 1: Chills run down your skin just gazing at this ancient wise man. His
Desc 2: pale skin almost seems stretched beyond its means. His pupiless eyes
Desc 3: gaze at you, following your every move, dispelling the notion that he
Desc 4: is blind. His long fingers wrap around a long bluish staff.

Name: tasloi villager
Desc 1: This long legged and flat headed villager is roughly humanoid in
Desc 2: characteristic. His long arms almost reach the ground and his
Desc 3: knuckles are worn, leading you to believe they often drag. A deep
Desc 4: green skin covers most of the exposed hunter's body.

Name: tasloi hunter
Desc 1: This long legged and flat headed hunter is roughly humanoid in
Desc 2: characteristic. His long arms almost reach the ground and his
Desc 3: knuckles are worn, leading you to believe they often drag. A deep
Desc 4: green skin covers most of the hunter's exposed skin.

Name: tasloi chief
Desc 1: This regal looking tasloi towers before you.  He looks to be a larger
Desc 2: version of the normal tasloi, but with a few distinct differences.
Desc 3: The normal flat head has been replaced with a much larger skull,
Desc 4: which seems to lend a much higher predatory intellect.

Name: tasloi animal master
Desc 1: This fierce looking tasloi is not only a little larger than most of
Desc 2: the others of his kind, but seems to have a slightly more sinister
Desc 3: look to him.  His task, as defined by his attire, seems to be
Desc 4: training the wild creatures of the area.

Name: giant wasp
Desc 1: This enormous wasp hovers in the air effortlessly.  Large fangs,
Desc 2: which seems to be very uncharacteristic to this type of insect glint
Desc 3: menacingly as its jaw opens and closes silently.  The most
Desc 4: terrifying skill this creature possesses is its silent movement.

Name: tasloi shaman
Desc 1: This ancient tasloi wears a dented wizard's hat, which you can only
Desc 2: assume marks him as the tribe shaman.  Once very tall, his age and
Desc 3: dark rites have wasted him away into a shell of his former self.
Desc 4: His bone necklace rattles as he reaches into his bag.

Name: wild spider
Desc 1: This hairy and grotesque looking spider seems to fashioning some
Desc 2: kind of cocoon as you approach.  Thick legs hold up a leathery
Desc 3: skinned body of very large proportions.  A gleaming bundle of eyes
Desc 4: seems to be looking in all directions at the same time.

Name: trained spider
Desc 1: This hairy and grotesque looking spider seems to be standing guard
Desc 2: over its area.  Thick, spined legs hold up a leathery skinned body
Desc 3: of very large proportions.  A gleaming bundle of eyes peers around
Desc 4: in what looks to be some kind of methodical pattern.

Name: massive fanged spider
Desc 1: Only partially visible due to the poor lighting of the area, this
Desc 2: spider is easily four times the size of the other spiders of the
Desc 3: web.  The eye bundle staring at you glows with a low green light
Desc 4: and the huge fangs beneath it drip with venom.

Name: tasloi warrior
Desc 1: This long legged, muscular tasloi glares at you menacingly. Dressed
Desc 2: in battle armour, he appears ready to strike if you make any moves
Desc 3: towards the tasloi chieftan.

Name: hanging cocoon
Desc 1: This roughly man-sized cocoon hanges lifelessly from a thick strand
Desc 2: of webbing.  The entire cocoon is coated in some kind of very sticky
Desc 3: liquid, and a steady drip from the hanging mass has formed a small
Desc 4: pool underneath it.

Name: electric eel
Desc 1: Small, blue bolts of energy ripple lazily over the greenish skin of
Desc 2: this large eel.  Two eliptical golden eyes peer at you as it swims
Desc 3: slowly toward you.  Eels are known to have very strong jaws, and have
Desc 4: been rumored to crack open even the strongest shells with them.

Name: albino salamander
Desc 1: This large salamander is rather ghastly looking.  Its skin is almost
Desc 2: transparent, as it seems to be lacking any type of pigment
Desc 3: whatsoever. There are no eyes where you would normally find them,
Desc 4: leaving you to wonder how this creature navigates.

Name: giant oyster
Desc 1: This massive oyster sits resting on the smooth sand.  A large, pink,
Desc 2: tounge-like object hangs from the fissure between the shell top and
Desc 3: bottom.  As you approach, the massive shell quivers slightly and
Desc 4: slams shut with a loud clapping sound.

Name: giant crab
Desc 1: This man sized crab moves with incredible speed.  The multiple small
Desc 2: legs move in unison, propelling the creature sideways very quickly.
Desc 3: Two large pincers jut out from the front of the crab's shell, under
Desc 4: the eye stalks.

Name: river ray
Desc 1: This graceful creature glides through the shallow water with
Desc 2: practiced ease. A deep gray hide covers the top surface, providing
Desc 3: good protection from would be predators.  A small, coiled tail trails
Desc 4: the creature, with what look to be small barbs on the end of it.

Name: spider crab
Desc 1: Imagine a large crab crossed with a hideous, hairy, fanged spider
Desc 2: and you're looking at it. A hard brown shell sits atop a mass of six
Desc 3: legs, and two long pincers with snapping claws.  Small pieces of its
Desc 4: last meal hang from four fearsome looking fangs.

Name: lantern fish
Desc 1: This fearsome looking fish moves lazily about in this pool. Massive
Desc 2: jagged teeth line the gaping mouth, and when the jaw opens fully you
Desc 3: can see bits of flesh clinging to the larger teeth. You take that as
Desc 4: a definite sign of meat and flesh being this creature's main diet.

Name: parasite
Desc 1: This small worm-like creature sits idly as you approach. A thick
Desc 2: gelatinous covering shines as light hits it, and looks to provide
Desc 3: fairly decent protection. There are no evident sensory organs
Desc 4: whatsoever, and no remarkable features other than a barb-lined mouth.

Name: crimson priest
Desc 1: Clothed in crimson robes, this bald fanatic bears many wicked tattoos
Desc 2: as dedication of his demonic faith. His crazed black eyes look at you
Desc 3: with unending hatred, and he begins moving his hands about,
Desc 4: determined to make you his next sacrifice.

Name: giant war dog
Desc 1: This gigantic, muscled beast stands fully five feet tall at its
Desc 2: massive shoulder. Its great fanged maw is filled with curving razor-
Desc 3: like teeth, yellowed and stained. You catch the scent of decay, as
Desc 4: drool slobbers out of its mouth.

Name: tunnel horror
Desc 1: Before you is a horrifically spiked insectoid. Its carapace looks as
Desc 2: solid as the rock of this cavern. It stands upright having two
Desc 3: cruelly hooked claws that it waves around menacingly. Two small black
Desc 4: eyes adorn the sides of its head and its beak snaps your way.

Name: tentacled mass
Desc 1: This is a large masss of fleshy tentacles, slithering its body along
Desc 2: the cavern floor. Eyes, fanged maws and spikes jut from various of
Desc 3: its writhing appendages. The eyes study you for a second and its
Desc 4: jaws begin to drool.

Name: storm giant king
Desc 1: This regal giant stands thirty-feet tall, his arms are the size of
Desc 2: large barrels, he wields a stormhammer by his side and he has a crown
Desc 3: of bluish metal upon his head, marking him as a king. His dark-blue
Desc 4: skin looks aged, but you can tell he does not feel old.

Name: storm giant
Desc 1: This great giant is a full twenty-five feet tall with dark blue skin,
Desc 2: a long white beard and silvery blue eyes. He wears some strange
Desc 3: metallic bracers that glow bright blue and seem to crackle with
Desc 4: lightning. Strapped to his side is a stormhammer.

Name: storm giant commander
Desc 1: This huge man is twenty-eight feet tall, with a bright silvery beard,
Desc 2: and his violent face has many wrinkles of age on them. He wears a
Desc 3: bright silvery sash marking him as a commander. The most noticeable
Desc 4: thing is the gargantuan greataxe he has strapped to his back.

Name: stone giant shaman
Desc 1: This massive stone-colored giant stands eighteen feet head to toe,
Desc 2: his chiseled body is the color of dark-grey boulder. He is dressed
Desc 3: in grey cloth, except for his tanned lionskin belt around his waist.
Desc 4: You also notice a charm hanging from his neck.

Name: stone giant
Desc 1: This lean, hard giant stands at eighteen feet tall from head to toe
Desc 2: with chiseled stone grey features. His eyes are like dark black
Desc 3: rocks. In one hand he wields a massive stone club like a trained
Desc 4: warrior, and in the other he carries a man-sized boulder.

Name: stone giant chieftain
Desc 1: This great tower of stone is a huge ninteen feet tall. He wears a
Desc 2: massive petrified piece of wood which is strapped to him like armour.
Desc 3: By his side is a massive stone maul which he holds with ease. He
Desc 4: constantly glares around looking for someone to test his dominance.

Name: giant skeleton
Desc 1: An unfortunate trainee that fell victim to the caverns, it now has a
Desc 2: hatred for all that is living. It towers before you, its maniacal
Desc 3: grin lighted by the magic flame inside its rib-cage seems like a
Desc 4: heart of magma, it shouts a ghostly roar as it steps foward!

Name: pyrotrice
Desc 1: This monstrosity looks like a rooster with all red feathers, except
Desc 2: for its yellow striped lizard tail and stubby batwings. It seems to
Desc 3: eminate a heat of its own and you feel warmer as it glares at you.

Name: hill giant shaman
Desc 1: This huge sixteen foot humanoid is dressed in many colored animal
Desc 2: skins and pelts. You can tell by the bone trinkets and fur pouch
Desc 3: that he has at his waist that he is a shaman of his people. As you
Desc 4: look at his black eyes, you see a glimmer of zealous furor.

Name: hill giant
Desc 1: This huge sixteen foot simian creature has long forearms that droop
Desc 2: down to his knees. The only protection he has is sewn together
Desc 3: animal hides and his only weapon is a huge tree branch that he
Desc 4: carries over his shoulder. Despite this, you know he is formidable.

Name: hill giant chieftan
Desc 1: This monster stands a full seventeen feet tall, with massive muscles,
Desc 2: and arms the size of tree trunks. He wears a bear skull for a crown,
Desc 3: and the pelt of some mammoth. He carries with him a massive wooden
Desc 4: club with massive spikes jutting from it, which he swings with ease.

Name: devourer
Desc 1: This gigantic glowing worm emanates huge amounts of heat. It has no
Desc 2: eyes and senses by the vibrations it feels through its forty-foot
Desc 3: long body. The most noticeable thing about this worm is the great maw
Desc 4: it has including the superheating appendage around its mouth.

Name: aged earth dragon
Desc 1: This massive, earthy-scaled wyrm is seventy feet from snout to tail.
Desc 2: Its iridescent, reptilian eyes glare at you with malicious
Desc 3: intelligence. Its claws rend the stone floor like it was sand, and
Desc 4: its great teeth show they have rendered many an armoured knight.

Name: cockatrice
Desc 1: This repulsive hybrid bird is about the size of a large goose. It
Desc 2: has the body and head of a rooster, with two ghoulish bat wings and
Desc 3: a spiked lizard tail. It eyes you hungrily.

Name: slimeworm
Desc 1: Completely covered in thick slime, this worm smells as bad as it
Desc 2: looks. Large clumps of hardening slime fall from the creature as it
Desc 3: comes up out of the ground before you. A gaping maw full of small,
Desc 4: but very sharp looking teeth line the top and bottom of its mouth.

Name: amazon
Desc 1: Before you is a tall, muscular woman of the jungle. She is a simple
Desc 2: woman and wears a plain cloth smock, but even she is of incredible
Desc 3: beauty, as she does her daily tasks. Even still, you can not help but
Desc 4: admire her muscled body and tan skin.

Name: amazon warrior
Desc 1: Dressed in dyed leathers and annointed with warpaint, you see the
Desc 2: terror of the jungle, the amazon warrior. She has an animal look in
Desc 3: her eyes, and you can tell she is sizing you up, see how quickly she
Desc 4: can kill you, which sends chills down your spine as you look away.

Name: amazon shaman
Desc 1: Before you stands a religious leader of the Amazon people. She looks
Desc 2: middle-aged and not as strong as the other people of her tribe, but
Desc 3: she still has a formidable look about her, and a steely glint in her
Desc 4: eyes. She is dressed in plain robes stitched with various runes.

Name: amazon guard
Desc 1: You see before you a woman dressed in ornate leathers, with gold and
Desc 2: silver stitched in elaborate patterns. She wields a bright, shiny,
Desc 3: eight-foot spear in one hand, and a wooden shield in the other. She
Desc 4: has a deadly look about her, much like an animal stalking a prey.

Name: amazon battle master
Desc 1: You see a woman with hair the color of iron and bronzed skin. She is
Desc 2: dressed in the most basic leather, allowing her great flexibility in
Desc 3: combat. In one hand she has a short spear which she uses to make
Desc 4: quick and deadly jabs. She wields it with obvious expertise.

Name: male slave
Desc 1: This was once a man, but now he is just a beaten, humbled shell of
Desc 2: what he once was. He is dirty and grimy and has huge bruises on his
Desc 3: back from whip-scars. He was captured by the amazon tribe and will
Desc 4: now live out the rest of his days a slave to their whim.

Name: massive cocoon
Desc 1: This massive cocoon hangs lifelessly from a thick strand of webbing
Desc 2: in the center of the room. The entire cocoon is coated in some kind
Desc 3: of green, sticky liquid, and a steady drip from the hanging mass has
Desc 4: formed a large pool underneath it. The creatures that made and

Name: gorilla
Desc 1: Normally quite docile these gorillas are ferocious if provoked. The
Desc 2: same strong hands used to rip open trees for grubs are able to
Desc 3: crumple platemail like paper and hit with enough force to shatter the
Desc 4: mightiest shields.

Name: gorilla
Desc 1: Normally quite docile these gorillas are ferocious if provoked. The
Desc 2: same strong hands used to rip open trees for grubs are able to
Desc 3: crumple platemail like paper and hit with enough force to shatter the
Desc 4: mightiest shields.

Name: blood hawk
Desc 1: This innocent enough looking golden-brown hawk moves through the air
Desc 2: with the grace of an angel. Light glistens off a few feathers on the
Desc 3: far tips of the blood hawks wings and it lets out a soul curdling
Desc 4: call as it begins to swoop towards you.

Name: leafling
Desc 1: Just under two feet in height the leafling reminds you most of a
Desc 2: human made of celery.  It's light green skin color and dark green
Desc 3: hair of small leaves would make it easy to blend into the jungle.
Desc 4: It advances holding a rigid semicircle shaped leaf as a weapon.

Name: insect swarm
Desc 1: Hundreds of small insects mill about looking for anything living to
Desc 2: feast on. Any one of these two inch bugs alone would be easy enough
Desc 3: to crush but in this case it would be as useless as trying to stop a
Desc 4: flood by drinking a glass of water.

Name: whipvine
Desc 1: Dozens of long, inch thick, vines dotted with thin needle like spikes
Desc 2: jut out from a central spot in the earth.  As you approach they
Desc 3: spring to life in a whirling dervish of chaos and destruction
Desc 4: attempting to rip apart anything within reach.

Name: constrictor
Desc 1: More then thirty feet long this brown and green banded serpent moves
Desc 2: exceedingly quickly for its massive size.  A large forked tongue
Desc 3: slips in and out of its mouth as it stares at you longingly with deep
Desc 4: crimson eyes.

Name: dae asp
Desc 1: Five feet long this dusty brown snake would not be so menacing if not
Desc 2: for the three pairs of fangs it now displays before you.  Many an
Desc 3: adventurer has a tale of near death to accompany one of the trademark
Desc 4: six-holed bite wounds.

Name: shadow frog
Desc 1: Milky white pupil-less eyes of this enormous toad stand out in
Desc 2: contrast to it's black and gray mottled hide.  Enormous rear legs end
Desc 3: in large webbed feet displaying dagger-like claws dirty with the
Desc 4: remains of its previous victim.

Name: jeweled viper
Desc 1: Sparkling in the sunlight this snake could easily be mistaken for a
Desc 2: three to four foot necklace of polished gems. As it slithers forward
Desc 3: you note that its pearl white skull is clearly visible through what
Desc 4: must be transparent skin. Fangs appear as it prepares to strike.

Name: silver cobra
Desc 1: The hood of the silver cobra spread wide before you gives a clear
Desc 2: sight to the silvery grey belly scales that contrast so greatly with
Desc 3: the jet black ones that cover most of the snakes body.

Name: grall
Desc 1: A rumbling growl accompanies the vicious claws that appear from the
Desc 2: forepaws of this orange and white mottled feline. The cat's
Desc 3: penetrating eyes, one sea-blue the other a hazel green, bore deep
Desc 4: into your soul looking for fear. The beast prepares to pounce.

Name: moss zombie
Desc 1: A massive humanoid shape made of deep green moss walks through the
Desc 2: jungle crushing everything in its path. A hollow echoing moan comes
Desc 3: from the cavity that should be a mouth as it spots you and begins to
Desc 4: close the distance.

Name: whipvine
Desc 1: Dozens of inch thick vines dotted with thin needle like spikes jut
Desc 2: out from a central spot in the earth. As you approach they spring to
Desc 3: life whirling dervish of chaos and destruction attempting to rip
Desc 4: apart anything within reach.

Name: tasloi scout
Desc 1: Roughly humanoid with long legs and a flattened head this creature
Desc 2: barely breaks three feet in height. Running at you javelin in hand,
Desc 3: knuckles nearly dragging across the ground, it seems to be in a
Desc 4: furious rage for no apparent reason.

Name: hanging cocoon
Desc 1: This roughly man-sized cocoon hanges lifelessly from a thick strand
Desc 2: of webbing.  The entire cocoon is coated in some kind of very sticky
Desc 3: liquid, and a steady drip from the hanging mass has formed a small
Desc 4: pool underneath it.

Name: hanging cocoon
Desc 1: This roughly man-sized cocoon hanges lifelessly from a thick strand
Desc 2: of webbing.  The entire cocoon is coated in some kind of very sticky
Desc 3: liquid, and a steady drip from the hanging mass has formed a small
Desc 4: pool underneath it.

Name: magma golem
Desc 1: This massive figure appears to be a magical creation of raging-hot
Desc 2: magma. The ground hisses with each slow step it takes, and its great
Desc 3: size causes the ground to almost shake. It looks at you with eyes of
Desc 4: fire, telling you of the burning death that awaits.

Name: fire toad
Desc 1: This great, red and mottled yellow mutant toad is a sight to behold.
Desc 2: Its two huge bulbous eyes glow an eerie blue as if they held a flame
Desc 3: of their own. It flicks its fiery tonque and you notice a fanged maw.
Desc 4: Slowly it begins to spring forward on its great spry legs.

Name: pyrogoyle
Desc 1: This nightmarish creature appears to be made out of some type of
Desc 2: fiery black rock. Its venomous jagged claws, horned, demon-like and
Desc 3: great batlike wings all emenate a dark flame. You smell a sulphur as
Desc 4: it spreads its wings, and with a squeal of delight it springs forth!

Name: lava imp
Desc 1: This dastardly tiny monster of evil flies around on wings of flame.
Desc 2: It grins at you lecherously with a horned face and flicks its spiked
Desc 3: tail. It sways in the air menacingly, looking for a place to strike.
Desc 4: It clenches its tiny claws, and cackles at you!

Name: greater salamander
Desc 1: This gigantic monster has a hideous human-like torso, head of fire,
Desc 2: and arms that have a dark, coppery sheen. The lower half of its body
Desc 3: is a red dragon serpent, with a strong and flexible tail. It holds a
Desc 4: large pitchfork in its hands, and eyes that burn a dark, evil light.

Name: pyrimera
Desc 1: This monster is an abomination of monster parts. Its front half is
Desc 2: that of a lion, the hind half is that of a red dragon, with two large
Desc 3: flexing wings. Three heads jut from its front, the head of a red
Desc 4: maned lion, the head a red dragon, and the head of a pyrotrice.

Name: flame elemental
Desc 1: This monster looks like a seven foot tall man whos been set on fire.
Desc 2: The flames all over its body seem to waiver and dance hypnotically,
Desc 3: they almost seem to leap off its body and reach out towards you. It
Desc 4: walks towards you in methodical steps.

Name: fire knight
Desc 1: Magma and fire seem to combine together to form a knight of flame. It
Desc 2: has a plume of blue flame, while its helmet and plate armor are made
Desc 3: of reddish magma. It carries a greatsword, with flames licking up and
Desc 4: down the blade. It begins to walk towards you in a practiced stance.

Name: giant efreeti
Desc 1: This malevolence is a terror of flame. He rides a whirlwind of lava
Desc 2: and fire, magma shoots everywhere. He stands taller than an ogre and
Desc 3: horns form an odd crown around his head. Slitted blue eyes stare down
Desc 4: at you, he grins evily and his whirlwind turns white-hot.

Name: sand crab
Desc 1: These large sand crabs spend most of their time burrowed in the sand.
Desc 2: Their thick shell is a blend of soft browns, easily camouflaging them
Desc 3: to the untrained eye. They are extremely territorial and aggressive.

Name: sandworm
Desc 1: This long, sand-coloured worm is about two feet in diameter, and
Desc 2: moves with great speed through the desert. It is a natural predator,
Desc 3: burrowing quickly beneath its target and then striking upwards and
Desc 4: biting with its sharp teeth.

Name: seagull
Desc 1: These are large white birds with black tips on the feathers. They are
Desc 2: extremely loud and constantly squawking as you pass by them. They are
Desc 3: not aggressive, but follow you closely to see if you'll drop a morsel
Desc 4: or two.

Name: green tortoise
Desc 1: The shell of this creature is an intricate hexagonal pattern. Hard as
Desc 2: rock and at least an inch thick, it's difficult to break through with
Desc 3: most weapons. The color is a dark brownish-green shade.

Name: ocean hawk
Desc 1: These soft brown birds soar gracefully around the island cliffs. They
Desc 2: build their nests high up in the rocks, and only attack when they
Desc 3: believe danger threatens their young.

Name: king crab
Desc 1: The size of this crab is unlike anything you've seen before. The
Desc 2: island he is buried on suddenly looks much smaller as you try to find
Desc 3: a way to escape his menacing claws.

Name: giant river turtle
Desc 1: This massive turtle lived underground so long it can no longer see.
Desc 2: Its large eyes have become a dull milky white color. Unfortunatly his
Desc 3: sense of sound is hypersensitive as a result of this change, and he
Desc 4: misses none of your movements.

Name: behemoth hellhound
Desc 1: This gargantuan creature is the size of a small hill, its huge black
Desc 2: mane reeks of sulphur and death. Two great eyes of fire glare at you,
Desc 3: and a small puddle has formed under its mouth. It grins menacingly
Desc 4: revealing shockingly white fangs.

Name: old amazon woman
Desc 1: This old, wrinkled woman wears a simple robe with a crooked staff,
Desc 2: which she waves occasionally in front of her. She stands hunched over
Desc 3: and you wonder how she could have survived like this in a savage
Desc 4: land. She waits expectently for you to speak.

Name: amazon craftswoman
Desc 1: This beautiful, silver-haired woman glances up at you from her work.
Desc 2: You size her up and tell by the leather apron she wears that she has
Desc 3: fashioned many a weapon or piece of armour in her long life. She puts
Desc 4: down her large iron mallet and looks up at you expectently.

Name: gaunt one weaver
Desc 1: This thin humanoid stands a full seven and a half feet tall. His long
Desc 2: face is locked in concentration as he manipulates magical energies to
Desc 3: manufacture what appears to be a simple cloak. He finishes and looks
Desc 4: up at you, no sign of emotion in his face.

Name: gaunt one messenger
Desc 1: This gaunt one appears thinner then any you have seen. He sits in a
Desc 2: meditative posture, obviously resting from some great travel. He
Desc 3: breaks from his trance and glances up at you, suprise actually
Desc 4: displayed on his face. He looks at you to make the next move.

Name: gaunt one elder
Desc 1: This tall, lanky gaunt has many wrinkles of age upon his wizened
Desc 2: face. He wears simple robes and nothing of consequence except a
Desc 3: hematite medallion, which you guess marks him as the elder of this
Desc 4: settlement. Despite his age he seems to have a youthful smile.

Name: wounded sailor
Desc 1: This haggered man is dressed in tattered garb of a sailor, his shirt
Desc 2: torn and pants ripped in many places. He has the look of someone who
Desc 3: has been hunted for many days. His eyes are red from lack of sleep
Desc 4: and he keeps looking around nervously.

Name: dark phoenix
Desc 1: This large magical bird is a sight of black feathers and tainted
Desc 2: fire. It has a massive forty-foot wing span, and the feathers are a
Desc 3: mix of black, red and dark blue. It gazes at you with golden yellow
Desc 4: eyes, pure malevolence shining down at you.

Name: mamba
Desc 1: Easily surpassing forty feet in length this snake is at least as wide
Desc 2: around as a halfling barkeep. Rather then slithering, as most snakes
Desc 3: do, she moves with little effort and amazing speed you could liken it
Desc 4: to a stream of blak water flowing in your direction.

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull green glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: ancestral guardian
Desc 1: Trapped somewhere between this life and the next this ghost appears
Desc 2: to be only semi-solid. Gliding across the floor, a look of pain marks
Desc 3: the ethereal being face showing the torment it must forever endure.

Name: crane spirit
Desc 1: Tall, slender and moving with a deliberate grace this spirit looks to
Desc 2: pose no threat. A beautiful set of white feathers cover the birds
Desc 3: body excepting the tips of its wings which seem to have a crimson
Desc 4: tinge.

Name: flesh ripper
Desc 1: No bigger then a dog, the size of this beast is not as terrifying as
Desc 2: its wicked jaws that contains the hundreds of finely edged teeth used
Desc 3: to remove its favorite food, the flesh of the recently deceased. Open
Desc 4: sores fest on the pale white hide visibly showing veins that pulse.

Name: gorilla spirit
Desc 1: This massive spectre stands over nine feet tall and is nearly as
Desc 2: wide. Hands large enough to enwrap a human head knuckle up in balled
Desc 3: fists larger then most mace heads. Nothing is meant to get past the
Desc 4: awesome force of this spirit.

Name: monkey spirit
Desc 1: Resembling a large monkey this spirit moves with amazing speed.
Desc 2: Gravity seems to have no hold on this being is it runs up walls as
Desc 3: easily as you walk along the floor. Fire of the dead burns in its
Desc 4: eyes to match the equally wicked smile that crosses its face.

Name: amazon queen
Desc 1: Nearly 7 feet tall, one of the tallest women you have seen before.
Desc 2: She has a deadly look in her eyes as she eyeballs you. Decorative
Desc 3: scars have been etched into her arms. Like most amazons, her right
Desc 4: breast is cut off to allow more freedom of movement with the bow.

Name: amazon queen
Desc 1: Smaller and gentler looking than most amazons, the queen of domestics
Desc 2: sits on the throne before you. Her hair is delicately braided around
Desc 3: a pale gold crown. She has a beautiful smile, and lays her soft hands
Desc 4: on your head reciting a blessing.

Name: sahuagin shaman
Desc 1: Rows of sharp yellow fangs fill the mouth of this blackish green fish
Desc 2: man. Not as able bodied out of the water as it is in, their predatory
Desc 3: nature and strong build more then makes up for the disadvantage.
Desc 4: Small magical symbols have been cut into the hide of this sahuagin.

Name: sahuagin
Desc 1: Rows of sharp yellow fangs fill the mouth of this blackish green fish
Desc 2: man. Not as able bodied out of the water as it is in, their predatory
Desc 3: nature and strong build more then makes up for the disadvantage.

Name: sahuagin warrior
Desc 1: Rows of sharp yellow fangs fill the mouth of this blackish green fish
Desc 2: man. Not as able bodied out of the water as it is in, their predatory
Desc 3: nature and strong build more than makes up for the disadvantage.
Desc 4: Showing battle scars, you can tell this creature has seen battle.

Name: coral lobster
Desc 1: The meat of a coral lobster could feed the entire complement of
Desc 2: Silvermere's guards quite easily. At the size of a small cart its
Desc 3: claws become lethal weapons and its outer covering, which is itself
Desc 4: made of coral, becomes nearly impenetrable.

Name: brine hag
Desc 1: This creature appears to be a wretched old woman with blackened teeth
Desc 2: and back bent like a shepherds crook. Wearing a well worn black robe
Desc 3: she picks her way along the reef cackling in glee upon sighting the
Desc 4: carcass of any animal and stomping on others small enough to crush.

Name: Seher'Sahham
Desc 1: Seher'Sahham is a wiry old man, though his movements display no signs
Desc 2: of age so visible in the wrinkles that cover his skin. A long bluish
Desc 3: grey robe flows freely about him and the small magical patterns
Desc 4: embroidered along the cuffs and neck, show he is man of great power.

Name: gnome merchant
Desc 1: This squat looking woman has packs piled on her back, and multiple
Desc 2: pouches tied about her waist. She smiles and greets you warmly as you
Desc 3: approach.

Name: Sylk
Desc 1: Deep jagged scars seem to cover the entire body of the well-built
Desc 2: goblin before you. Her black silk clothing ripples in the slightest
Desc 3: breeze as she sits in a wooden chair emanating an aura of confidence
Desc 4: and knowledge. A navy blue teardrop is branded on her right cheek.

Name: Kuel
Desc 1: Kuel's body seems totally relaxed as his deep blue eyes peer through
Desc 2: you and beyond, he seems to take no notice of you in his deep
Desc 3: meditative trance as you walk about the room.

Name: deranged priest
Desc 1: This black haired, black eyed priest is garbed in brown sack cloth.
Desc 2: He appears to be whispering to himself in some tongue which you can't
Desc 3: place. As you look closer at him you notice a slight slant to his
Desc 4: eyes, which you have not seen on any other humanoid form.

Name: gibbering mage
Desc 1: This man has light tan skin, and is wearing nothing but a burlap sack
Desc 2: to cover his body. Oddly the sack has several runes written on it,
Desc 3: with what looks like dried blood. He gibbers to himself in a strange
Desc 4: tongue and you notice an odd slant to his eyes.

Name: large red demonling
Desc 1: Ancient lore tells you this monster is a servant to the darkest
Desc 2: magic, summoned through evil rites. Its hide is colored blood-red and
Desc 3: it seems to be dripping some type of ichor, its claws and fangs are
Desc 4: razor sharp. Its tail ends in a poisonous stinger which waves about.

Name: Putakwa
Desc 1: Most likely one of the most handsome men on this side of the world
Desc 2: his appearance is nearly perfect. Neither smudge nor smear mar his
Desc 3: jewelry, hair perfectly in place and all the items for sale around
Desc 4: him are fastidiously cleaned.

Name: practice dummy
Desc 1: Broken and battered, this stuffed dummy is almost in pieces from the
Desc 2: onslaught of the orc hordes practice sessions. Through all the rips
Desc 3: and tears you can see it is the effigy of the Sheriff of Silvermere.

Name: orc warlord
Desc 1: Massive muscles ripple underneath the black scale armour of this
Desc 2: vicious-looking orc. Hardened in the fires of countless battles, the
Desc 3: orc warlord is a ruthless and cunning leader who does not hesitate to
Desc 4: sacrifice his troops when needed, and never retreats from combat.

Name: orc captain
Desc 1: This tall, powerfully built orc has jet black skin and glowing red
Desc 2: eyes. He wears glittering black chainmail, and wields a heavy
Desc 3: scimitar. His evil grin exposes his sharp yellow fangs.

Name: ogre gladiator
Desc 1: The massive ogres bred for arena combat are fierce indeed. Their
Desc 2: stupidity has been focused so that they obey every command from their
Desc 3: superiors, and their berserk fighting style makes them devastating
Desc 4: in battle.

Name: orc lieutenant
Desc 1: This tall, ferocious-looking orc wears chainmail and wields a razor-
Desc 2: sharp scimitar, a sure sign of high rank. He is disciplined and holds
Desc 3: himself in such a manner as to indicate that he knows how to use his
Desc 4: weapon skilfully.

Name: orc warrior
Desc 1: This tall, muscular orc is garbed in a well-maintained suit of
Desc 2: chainmail, and glares at you through the eyeslits of a steel helm. He
Desc 3: wields a wickedly-curved scimitar, and wields it with deadly
Desc 4: competence.

Name: orc fanatic
Desc 1: Garbed in a sleevless leather tunic, runic tattoos play across the
Desc 2: orc's well muscled arms. A wicked looking halberd made of the orcish
Desc 3: black steel moves fluidly back and forth in the beasts hands with the
Desc 4: quickness of a weapon half its size.

Name: orc trainee
Desc 1: Wearing a tattered suit of chainmail, bruises and cuts show that this
Desc 2: orc has been greatly abused. Looking to prove themselves in a fight
Desc 3: and get the title of Warrior, this orc is looking to do battle.

Name: nanati
Desc 1: It is hard to see this pale, lanky figure as it seems to absorb any
Desc 2: light surrounding it. Pupiless black eyes stare at you as a dark and
Desc 3: evil smile reveals long canine fangs. It's hair is also pale and hard
Desc 4: to see. A diamond-shaped black stone is imbedded in its forehead.

Name: nanati
Desc 1: It is hard to see this pale, lanky figure seems to absorb any light
Desc 2: around her, making it difficult to see. She stares at you with
Desc 3: pupilless black eyes; and a dark, evil smile spreads across her face,
Desc 4: revealing long, canine fangs.

Name: nanati sorceress
Desc 1: This lithe figure is dressed in heavy black robes, making it
Desc 2: impossible to see any features other than two points of red light
Desc 3: that shine like rubies. Your gaze catches the floor and you see this
Desc 4: figure actually isn't even standing on the floor but hovering.

Name: nanati deathweaver
Desc 1: This figure is crouched so low to the ground you wonder if it has
Desc 2: some disfigurement. However, you can tell by the black clothing and
Desc 3: the way it weaves two deadly blades, that it is in a fighting stance,
Desc 4: beautiful and deadly. Fangs are revealed from its wicked smile.

Name: nanati bladesman
Desc 1: This humanoid can only be described as a living wire. Tight muscles
Desc 2: make up its entire figure, and it only wields a sword in one hand,
Desc 3: but inch-long claws on its other hand tell you its not limited to
Desc 4: just a blade. Simple black cloth cover its body.

Name: nanati shadow
Desc 1: Blackness shapes this figure, leaving only pale luminescence to
Desc 2: outline the features of this strange humanoid. You can faintly see
Desc 3: eyes staring back at you, but you can feel the waves of malevolence
Desc 4: that seem to come from them. With deadly grace it begins to approach.

Name: dark assassin
Desc 1: This lean, stooped figure is tightly swathed in jet black robes. A
Desc 2: horned skull is emblazoned on its chest, and a pair of straight
Desc 3: blades hang on its back. It moves with the incredible quiet grace of
Desc 4: the trained killer.

Name: dark stalker
Desc 1: The gray garbed figure shows the grace of a panther and has movements
Desc 2: as precise as a fine weapons blade. Finely chiseled and toned muscles
Desc 3: quiver beneath its clothes as a cat's might before they pounce.

Name: dark nightblade
Desc 1: The face of this elite killer, if not naturally dark, must be painted
Desc 2: black to match the light absorbing metal of their deadly blade. The
Desc 3: only thing not as dark as pitch on its clothing are the stains of
Desc 4: blood.

Name: master assassin
Desc 1: This lithe, well-built woman has the smooth angular features of a
Desc 2: dark-elf. She is garbed in a leathery black wrap, and wields a large
Desc 3: curved blade that gleams with unnatural hunger. She moves with the
Desc 4: deadly grace of a predator, and has a ruthless gleam in her eyes.

Name: yeti
Desc 1: Before you stands a large, powerfully muscled ape-like creature of
Desc 2: approximately 9 feet in height. Its white fur pelt makes it hard
Desc 3: to distinguish in the deep snow. It bares its yellow, chipped fangs
Desc 4: at your approach and bellows, extending its huge arms upward.

Name: ice golem
Desc 1: This giant human-like contraption has been made from solid ice. It
Desc 2: moves quite slowly, but its chiseled arms look big enough to crush
Desc 3: an ogre's head in its arms.

Name: ice wraith
Desc 1: Two red eyes stare at you from a wispy dark mass encased in a body of
Desc 2: ice. This undead elemental stands upright at shoulder height, with
Desc 3: two spindly arms that end in five sharpened iciciles for claws. It's
Desc 4: cold eyes seem to hunger for your soul.

Name: amazon shopkeeper
Desc 1: This cowering shopkeeper is obviously in fear of his life. As you
Desc 2: approach, he fauns over you, displaying his best wares prominently.
Desc 3: He is quite a pathetic person, and you might have felt sorry for him
Desc 4: if he wasn't such a piece of worthless scum.

Name: dying master assassin
Desc 1: This once graceful woman is now a disheveled heap of tattered cloth
Desc 2: and blood. Her breathing is very shallow and you can tell she is
Desc 3: about to be visited by the Reaper himself.

Name: stronghold guard
Desc 1: This grim-looking figure is garbed in worn leather armour, and a
Desc 2: long scimitar hangs in a sheath at his side. On constant alert for
Desc 3: Saracen raiders, he is very suspicious of outsiders.

Name: massive white dragon
Desc 1: This gigantic, white-scaled lizard is nearly fourty-five feet from
Desc 2: its icy snout to its frigid tail. Its frosty blue eyes stare at you
Desc 3: in pure malevolence. You see parts of its body covered in thick
Desc 4: sheets of ice.

Name: mule
Desc 1: This large, hoofed equine has a dull brown coat patched with white
Desc 2: and grey spots. His black mane is short and hawked, and his tail wags
Desc 3: occasionally to slap an annoying insect. He seems tired and grumpy,
Desc 4: probably from years of good service to his owner.

Name: lady of the dark
Desc 1: Wearing a large crown of utter blackness you see a figure that is
Desc 2: darker then the blackest night sky. Two eyes, as white as a new star
Desc 3: gaze at you. All light around you is absorbed by this malevolent
Desc 4: being and elongated claws weave in mythical patterns.

Name: orc warrior
Desc 1: This tall, muscular orc is garbed in a well-maintained suit of
Desc 2: chainmail, and glares at you through the eyeslits of a steel helm. He
Desc 3: wields a wickedly-curved scimitar, and wields it with deadly
Desc 4: competence.

Name: orc fanatic
Desc 1: Garbed in a sleevless leather tunic, runic tattoos play across the
Desc 2: orc's well muscled arms. A wicked looking halberd made of the orcish
Desc 3: black steel moves fluidly back and forth in the beasts hands with the
Desc 4: quickness of a weapon half its size.

Name: orc trainee
Desc 1: Wearing a tattered suit of chainmail, bruises and cuts show that this
Desc 2: orc has been greatly abused. Looking to prove themselves in a fight
Desc 3: and get the title of Warrior, this orc is looking to do battle.

Name: Enigma Lord
Desc 1: A tall thin man, with impossibly long limbs, towers above you. Easily
Desc 2: seven feet tall, he looks to be someone caught between the world of
Desc 3: the living and the dead. His eyes of coal are the only contrast to
Desc 4: his glaring white skin. His face shows no hint of remorse or mercy.

Name: frost giant
Desc 1: This huge man stands twenty feet tall, with an extra five feet added
Desc 2: due to his massive helm, making him look more fearsome. His snow
Desc 3: white skin is tinged only by his bushy blue eyebrows and ice blue
Desc 4: beard. His eyes look down at you, and he bellows in outrage.

Name: elite guardsman
Desc 1: This is a massive burly man wearing gleaming platemail that shines
Desc 2: brightly as if freshly polished. He wields a massive platinum
Desc 3: greatsword with incredible ease, and you can only assume to be
Desc 4: the guardsman he must have cast knowledge to use it too.

Name: skeleton
Desc 1: The animated skeleton of a humanoid creature stands before you. Bits
Desc 2: of dried flesh cling to its yellow bones, and faint flickers of red
Desc 3: light can be seen in its eye sockets. The undead are known to be very
Desc 4: difficult to destroy, as they are already dead.

Name: zombie
Desc 1: This is an animated, rotting corpse. It walks around listlessly, and
Desc 2: its eyeless face gives no hint of emotion. The necromantic magic that
Desc 3: has animated this creation has made it quite tough to slay, and it is
Desc 4: imbued with an unnatural strength.

Name: shade
Desc 1: This is a shadowy spirit in the vague shape of a human, with glowing
Desc 2: red points of light where its eyes should be. It is hard to see, and
Desc 3: seems to fade in and out of existance.

Name: ghoul
Desc 1: This awful-looking creature appears to be a filthy, emaciated human -
Desc 2: until you see its glowing red eyes and sharp claws. Its frail
Desc 3: appearance belies powerful muscles, and it moves with surprising
Desc 4: grace.

Name: wight
Desc 1: This revolting undead creation is a bent, misshapen humanoid with
Desc 2: glowing red points for eyes, and cruelly-hooked claws. Despite its
Desc 3: gaunt appearance, you can see it is powerfully muscled, and moves
Desc 4: with the confident speed of a cat.

Name: skeletal warrior
Desc 1: This tall, mail-armoured figure walks rigidly erect. A long
Desc 2: broadsword hangs from its waist, and it carries a round shield in its
Desc 3: left hand. Twin points of light glow from within its polished iron
Desc 4: helm like burning fires.

Name: moaning spirit
Desc 1: All you can see of this strange apparition is a swirling, misty
Desc 2: shape somewhat like smoke. It moans ominously, making the hair stand
Desc 3: up on the back of your neck.

Name: banshee
Desc 1: This misty appararition appears to be a white-robed woman, her face
Desc 2: hidden by a dark hood. Her translucent form seems to radiate power,
Desc 3: and a chill of fear runs up your spine.

Name: ghost
Desc 1: This nearly transparent apparition moans softly as it floats about.
Desc 2: It clutches its torn white funeral rags closely to itself. Although
Desc 3: it appears sad and lonely, the undead are known to vent their rage
Desc 4: and frustration upon the living.

Name: shadowraith
Desc 1: This unnerving apparition seems to be your worst nightmare-- a large
Desc 2: shadowy figure with long, wicked claws and hellishly burning eyes. It
Desc 3: moves with an unnatural grace as it stalks you!

Name: barrow wight
Desc 1: This frightening apparition is completely garbed in what appear to be
Desc 2: gilded ceremonial robes, the kind that nobles and heros are buried
Desc 3: in. In one withered hand it wields a long, glittering silvery dagger,
Desc 4: and twin points of red light glow from beneath its darkened hood!

Name: zombie cat
Desc 1: This stiff, undead cat is surprisingly large, and moves with somewhat
Desc 2: less grace than it did in life. Being dead has its advantages,
Desc 3: however, and the zombie cat is both vastly stronger and tougher than
Desc 4: any mortal cat.

Name: undead priest
Desc 1: This eternally rotting corpse is animated by some evil, unnatural
Desc 2: force. Once a high-ranking priest of the Dark One, it now serves him
Desc 3: in death, retaining its unholy powers even after death. It has no
Desc 4: mercy for the living.

Name: tortured spirit
Desc 1: This spirit appears as a glowing, translucent humanlike shape, whose
Desc 2: form shifts and wavers like a desert mirage. It moans in agony and
Desc 3: despair, living even in death and prevented from eternal rest.

Name: ju-ju zombie
Desc 1: This is an animated, rotting corpse. It walks around listlessly, and
Desc 2: its eyeless face gives no hint of emotion. The necromantic magic that
Desc 3: has animated this creation has made it quite tough to slay, and it is
Desc 4: imbued with an unnatural strength.

Name: necromancer
Desc 1: Ragged black robes are wrapped around the skeletally-thin form of the
Desc 2: necromancer. Not quite dead but certainly not living, he exists
Desc 3: between the realm of life and death, and drains the souls from all
Desc 4: those he meets.

Name: giant skeleton
Desc 1: An unfortunate trainee that fell victim to the caverns, it now has a
Desc 2: hatred for all that is living. It towers before you, its maniacal
Desc 3: grin lighted by the magic flame inside its rib-cage seems like a
Desc 4: heart of magma, it shouts a ghostly roar as it steps foward!

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull green glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: filthy beggar
Desc 1: This filthy wretch appears gaunt and incredibly dirty. You can are
Desc 2: almost overcome by the smell of sweat and rubbish that covers this
Desc 3: person clothed only in rags and burlap. A single dirty hand reachs up
Desc 4: to you asking for money.

Name: depraved murderer
Desc 1: With a crazed look in his bloodshot eyes this man looks at you with
Desc 2: a hunger that turns your stomach, he wields an evil looking knife
Desc 3: made of bone, and the blood of his victims is stained on his smock.
Desc 4: With cold yet chaotic precision he begins to advance on you.

Name: mangy dog
Desc 1: You almost gag from the smell that rises from the fur of this filthy
Desc 2: mutt. He glances at you once barring his teeth, and then begins to
Desc 3: clean his nether regions.

Name: dread planewalker
Desc 1: All you can see of this nightmarish creature is a faint outline of
Desc 2: talons and fangs, and blood red reptilian eyes. A cold wind seems to
Desc 3: blow in from some where and it lets out a howl of a thousand shrieks
Desc 4: giving you chills to the point of convulsion.

Name: townsman
Desc 1: A simple townsman dressed in plain leathers and an old dusty hat he
Desc 2: appears to be in thought about his task at hand or ahead of him. He
Desc 3: glances up at you from his reverie and smiles before continuing on.

Name: drunken brawler
Desc 1: This obviously plastered person staggers aimlessly about, an empty
Desc 2: pewter tankard in one hand, and a link of sausages in the other. He
Desc 3: is quite angry, probably at being thrown out of every bar in town,
Desc 4: and is picking fights with everyone he meets.

Name: townswoman
Desc 1: Almost as plain as the simple dress she wears this lady looks to be
Desc 2: going to or from a destination, she stops briefly to curtsey to you
Desc 3: before continuing on.

Name: squirrel
Desc 1: This chittery litte forest creature prances around looking for food,
Desc 2: he keeps an eye on you all times as he forages for food, ready to
Desc 3: spring at any moment.

Name: Mayor Godfrey
Desc 1: This middle-aged man has salt and peppered hair and sports a small
Desc 2: goatee. Dressed in fine silks he walks around with a proud air of
Desc 3: any elected official. Despite this he is very jovial looking and you
Desc 4: can't help but like him. Around his neck is the town seal.

Name: troll
Desc 1: This hideous beast looks like something out of your worst nightmare.
Desc 2: It is a humanoid monstrosity, a perversion of nature verified by its
Desc 3: foot-long claws and serrated teeth. Red eyes peer at you from a thin,
Desc 4: grey-skinned face, and it flexes its ropy muscles in preparation.

Name: black cat
Desc 1: This sleek black feline has a natural elegance about it as it brushes
Desc 2: up against your leg. It purrs softly before moving on in search of
Desc 3: food. You chuckle at an old superstition wondering how any creature
Desc 4: like this could cause harm to someone.

Name: mercenary healer
Desc 1: This figure has goes door to door selling his healing powers for the
Desc 2: all powerful gold crown. Grabed in simple grey robes he sits in the
Desc 3: middle of the floor awaiting your request.

Name: mangy dog
Desc 1: You almost gag from the smell that rises from the fur of this filthy
Desc 2: mutt. He glances at you once barring his teeth, and then begins to
Desc 3: clean his nether regions.

Name: young gypsy girl
Desc 1: Looking at this young girl you would guess her age was preteen except
Desc 2: for an ancient wisdom that seems to lie in her hazel eyes. She sits
Desc 3: before an ancient red card table, placing cards from a deck in her
Desc 4: hand onto the table. You wonder what luck may lay in those cards.

Name: gravedigger
Desc 1: The gravedigger of Silvermere appears to be a middle-aged man with
Desc 2: dirty grey hair and a gaunt look on his face. You can tell he hasn't
Desc 3: slept in days, and he has a nervous twitch in his left cheek. He gaze
Desc 4: at you wordlessly with his bloodshot eyes.

Name: roc
Desc 1: This giant birdlike creature resembles a huge two headed buzzard,
Desc 2: aside from its white downy feathers. It has a twenty foot wingspan,
Desc 3: and its enormous claws hold razor sharp talons.

Name: giant roc
Desc 1: This titanic creature ressembles a vulture, but of an incredible
Desc 2: size. Its wingspan must be at least a hundred feet wide, its beak as
Desc 3: long as a canoe and razor-sharp. Each talon is as long as a human is
Desc 4: tall. Luckily it is huge enough that it ignores most small folk.

Name: lonely traveler
Desc 1: Caked in dirt and bedraggled, this poor sod looks as if he has been
Desc 2: traveling for some time now. As he looks you up and down you see his
Desc 3: arm is bandaged with torn cloth, but the wound has not closed.

Name: lonely traveler
Desc 1: Caked in dirt and bedraggled, this poor sod looks as if he has been
Desc 2: traveling for some time now. As he looks you up and down you see his
Desc 3: neck is bandaged with torn cloth, but his wound has not closed.

Name: dirty farmer
Desc 1: Dressed in dirt covered overalls, this farmer looks at you with a
Desc 2: leathery face and eyes filled with a horror unspeakable. He watches
Desc 3: your every move, expecting you to shed your skin and become his
Desc 4: nightmare.

Name: myrmidon
Desc 1: Dressed in platemail and travel clothes this warrior wields a his
Desc 2: blade with ease. Scruffy from the travel, he looks at you with a
Desc 3: practical eye. A man who uses his blade for a living he has little
Desc 4: time for the wishy washy.

Name: rogue
Desc 1: Dressed in black leathers and simple traveling clothes, you can tell
Desc 2: by the way this man walks, and darts his eyes from purse to purse
Desc 3: that he is an unseemly character. He glances at you and you make sure
Desc 4: your purse is fastened securely.

Name: rubicant
Desc 1: Garbed in the clothes of a simple traveler, the jingle under his
Desc 2: clothes tells you that this traveler wears chainmail. You notice
Desc 3: runes are tattooed to a book he has strapped to his belt.

Name: sorcerer
Desc 1: Quarterstaff in hand, layered in several types of robes and cloaks,
Desc 2: this man of magic and mystery gives you a guarded smile which makes
Desc 3: the hairs on your arms stand on end. You are sure to give him his
Desc 4: distance.

Name: sage
Desc 1: With a smell of pine or cedar surrounding her, this sylvan mistress
Desc 2: gives you a small smile. She is dressed in form fitting leathers
Desc 3: which appear to have been worn from travelling abroad. Her eyes are
Desc 4: somewhat wrinkled from ageless knowledge.

Name: ogre zombie
Desc 1: A rotting carcass stands before you. Ten feet of worm eaten ogre
Desc 2: slowly lurches towards you, deadly intention in it's now dead face.
Desc 3: Massive bulk still hang from the bones, giving you the notion that
Desc 4: any contact with the massive fists would mean certain doom.

Name: rabid dire wolf
Desc 1: This great wolf stands over four feet and is covered with a silvery
Desc 2: grey pelt. It opens its mouth to let loose a gargled howl as its maw
Desc 3: is covered with flowing foam, marking it a rabid beast.

Name: boneless zombie
Desc 1: This animated corpse looks to be some gruesome trick by a crazed god.
Desc 2: Only muscle and rotting organs remain of this worm-eaten abomination.
Desc 3: In a sick twist of irony it wields a large bone club, swinging at you
Desc 4: as it creeps with a groan of undying hunger on its lips.

Name: skeletal acid beast
Desc 1: Animated from mismatched bones of half skulls and splintered parts,
Desc 2: an aura of sulphur surrounds it as the ground hisses from the globs
Desc 3: of acid that splashes on the ground. It rushes towards you, a horrid
Desc 4: music erupting as its bones clack and acid splashes in larger pools.

Name: scarab swarm
Desc 1: The buzzing of a hundred scarab beetles bring an eerie chill to your
Desc 2: heart. The swarm picks up your scent of fear and moves upon you with
Desc 3: intent of burrowing into your skin and devouring your flesh. You know
Desc 4: how futile using your weapon would be, even as the first bite appears

Name: weeping apparition
Desc 1: Despite the wisp of a formless body, the face of pure malevolence is
Desc 2: clearly made out as you gaze at this undead spirit. It is strangely
Desc 3: silent but you can clearly make out words of foul and wretched curses
Desc 4: it seems to be wishing on you. A ghostly tendril moves in to strike.

Name: wolfman
Desc 1: An experiment of magic gone awry, this monster has the lower body
Desc 2: of a well-muscled man, but the upper body is mutated between a dire
Desc 3: wolf and an ogre. Massive, grey furred arms lead down to sharp claws.
Desc 4: The head is an enlarged wolf's with an eerie howl escaping its maw.

Name: vampire fledgling
Desc 1: Alluring ruby eyes gaze at you from an ashen white face. You are
Desc 2: almost enchanted by the beautiful features of this undead youngling
Desc 3: except for the fanged mouth which whispers to you in soothing tones
Desc 4: even as he is raising his hand to strike.

Name: Death Shrieker
Desc 1: Rumored to be a form of banshee that dealt with evil powers before
Desc 2: a wicked end, this ghostly apparition is covered in the remnants of
Desc 3: a white tattered robe, the cowl hiding all features. As she floats
Desc 4: towards you the air begins to grow shrill and your ears begin to ache

Name: nightshade
Desc 1: Long spindly arms and legs made of shadowform attach to a black torso
Desc 2: and head. Red eyes with yellow, horizontal slits stare at you with
Desc 3: a pronounced hunger that twists your stomach. A vile aura seems to
Desc 4: lash out at you from its fingertips and you jump back in fear.

Name: Bloody Executioner
Desc 1: So named because of his gore spattered escapades in the country side,
Desc 2: this massive brute of a man has chosen you for his next victim.
Desc 3: Dressed in a blood splattered cowl, and large black robe covered in
Desc 4: gore, he swings a massive two handed axe which has a hungry gleam.

Name: sdfsdfsfs
Desc 1: A most foul and undead creation, this was once a knight of great
Desc 2: prowess. Now it wears the blood and gore of its victims on the many
Desc 3: spikes that jut from it's armor. A skeletal grin greets your gaze as
Desc 4: it raises a large bone sword to attack.

Name: rotting beholder
Desc 1: A sphere of rotting flesh and eyestalks, this is also known as a
Desc 2: beholder of undeath. Rotworms at it's body even as long eyestalks are
Desc 3: stare at you with malevolence and a massive central eye promises
Desc 4: untold suffering and pain.

Name: skeletal steed
Desc 1: Once the proud warhorse of some nobleman or knight, this animal has
Desc 2: been summoned from its sleep to do the bidding of an evil power. You
Desc 3: are chilled by the sight of the massive frame of bone, and the frozen
Desc 4: grin of a horse skull. Though without muscle it is still formidable.

Name: dark treant
Desc 1: As you take in the full size of this sylvan creature, you can only
Desc 2: assume it is the corrupted form of a treant, turned to the forces of
Desc 3: evil. Dark red ichor oozes out of the bark, making the emotionless
Desc 4: visage of the monster look as though it is weeping tears of blood.

Name: midnight unicorn
Desc 1: A corruption of pure evil, this monster is a mockery of the good
Desc 2: hearted counterpart. It snorts causing flame and sulphur to erupt,
Desc 3: as it gazes at you with eyes of hell-fire. It stamps it's hooves on
Desc 4: the ground and lowers it's dark horn directly at you before charging.

Name: Banished One
Desc 1: Dressed entirely in black leathers, this man is hunched over somewhat
Desc 2: , wearing a cowl to hide his face. In one hand he carries a jagged
Desc 3: sabre that has a fearful glow to it. At first glance his other hand
Desc 4: is signalling to you, and then you see he is about to cast a spell!

Name: hanging tree
Desc 1: A great massive tree, reaching fifty feet in the air is rooted here.
Desc 2: Were it not for the mass of dead bodies hanging from the twisting
Desc 3: branches you would take no notice. The bodies suddenly begin cursing
Desc 4: at you, and then you are surrounded by a mass of dead fists and feet.

Name: black rosebush
Desc 1: This spiny bush of blood-tinged thorns is covered by roses of the
Desc 2: blackest color of night. The leaves seem to sway for a moment as if
Desc 3: signalling for you to come closer. You cant help but sniff the roses
Desc 4: alluring, almost numbing fragarance.

Name: clawed beast man
Desc 1: A massive furred man with the head of some jackal-like creature is
Desc 2: before you, fangs bared as it gives a dangerous growl. Its hands end
Desc 3: in massive nine-inch claws, each one tinged with a black substance.
Desc 4: With amazing agility, the grey-furred beast jumps towards you!

Name: groaning cloud
Desc 1: All you can see of this strange cloud formation is a swirling yellow
Desc 2: form, hidden somewhere within the folds. It lets out a groan of
Desc 3: hunger and longing, two orbs of white look upon you, and it
Desc 4: moves towards you with amazing speed!

Name: scythe skeleton
Desc 1: The yellowed bones of a humanoid skeleton stand before you. A macabre
Desc 2: twist for this monster is the two scythes attached to the elbows
Desc 3: where arms should be. It clacks it teeth at you and you sense almost
Desc 4: a cackle coming from its fleshless mouth.

Name: bone snake
Desc 1: The yellowed bones of a serpent make up the body of this undead
Desc 2: creation. Two massive fangs protrude from the human skull that is the
Desc 3: head of this monster. Slithering with wicked grace the snake lifts
Desc 4: its head and lets out a silent hiss.

Name: vampiric mist
Desc 1: Its physical form destroyed, this is the gaseous form of a vampire.
Desc 2: Swirling and spinning in hypnotic patterns, malevolence exudes from
Desc 3: the mist cloud and the smell of death taints the air around you. With
Desc 4: amazing speed it swoops in to strike!

Name: drooling blood ghoul
Desc 1: Blood flows down the mouth of this emaciated undead monster, like an
Desc 2: unending river of crimson. Glowing red eyes shine dully with little
Desc 3: or no intelligence. You almost gag as you see the awful trail of red
Desc 4: reaches down to its jagged feet, leaving a trail of death.

Name: spirit assassin
Desc 1: A ghostly image of its former self, this was once an assassin paid
Desc 2: by many to carry out deeds of death and murder. Now summoned into
Desc 3: undeath its only mission is to bring strife and murder to all things
Desc 4: living. Garbed in ghostly clothes it wields an ethereal dagger.

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull red glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: wraith
Desc 1: This unnerving apparition seems to be your worst nightmare-- a large
Desc 2: shadowy figure with long, wicked claws and hellishly burning eyes.
Desc 3: It exists only to bring death to living creatures, and leaves no
Desc 4: being it encounters alive.

Name: flesh golem
Desc 1: This eight-foot-tall monstrosity appears to have been put together
Desc 2: from assorted body parts. Hideous and powerful, it is devoid of all
Desc 3: sentiment and is now nothing but a relentless killer.

Name: spectre
Desc 1: This nearly transparent apparition moans softly as it floats about.
Desc 2: It clutches its torn white funeral rags closely to itself. Although
Desc 3: it appears sad and lonely, the undead are known to vent their rage
Desc 4: and frustration upon the living.

Name: Spirit of Draka
Desc 1: Hovering before you is a nekojin garbed in ancient armor. His aura
Desc 2: dulls your senses, stopping anything magical from having effect. His
Desc 3: golden eyes hold power to be respected and feared much like the order
Desc 4: of spellbreakers that his physical self once belonged to.

Name: vampire bat
Desc 1: This huge, jet-black bat has a wingspan of at least twelve feet. Its
Desc 2: small, crimson eyes glow evilly, and it flexes its razorlike talons
Desc 3: compulsively.

Name: vampire magus
Desc 1: Garbed in the clothes of a noblemen, he could pass for an everyday
Desc 2: earl or duke, were it not for the elongated fangs he bares at you,
Desc 3: slavering for the sweet taste of your lifeblood. His pale, bony hands
Desc 4: begin to gesture in arcane motions, and magic begins to form.

Name: vampire acolyte
Desc 1: Adorned in the holy symbols of some long dead priesthood, this is an
Desc 2: abomination to all things holy. Eyes of crimson grin at you evilly
Desc 3: as the undead holyman gathers his power from some vile diety to bring
Desc 4: destruction upon you, or even worse, use you as the next feeding.

Name: vampire elder
Desc 1: An ancient monstrosity, still keeping up the facade of humanity this
Desc 2: undead creature shows many years upon him. Clothed in rich silks it
Desc 3: does nothing to hide the vile, hairless visage and white skin
Desc 4: stretched over his skull. Fangs slaver with delight at your scent.

Name: Ozrinom the Vampire Lord
Desc 1: The master of his realm, power oozes from him like a dark seductress,
Desc 2: full of charm and elegance he is the most handsome face you have seen
Desc 3: in your life. His crimson eyes almost gaze at you with a predatory
Desc 4: gleam, and you feel very much so that you are the prey in this game.

Name: Death Mist of Ozrinom
Desc 1: A black and horrid mist, death and decay emit from it like a plague
Desc 2: train. So large it almost seems to snake entirely around you, this
Desc 3: mist is the form of an angered lord of vampires. As its midnight
Desc 4: tendrils duck and weave, they seem to spell out your demise.

Name: gremlin
Desc 1: A winged goblinoid, gremlins are well-known for mischief making. Red
Desc 2: eyes gaze at you with evil as it grins, revealing rows of dagger like
Desc 3: teeth. It cackles at you and swoops around you, a brownish blur.
Desc 4: Suddenly it is behind you claws ready to strike!

Name: Scarecrow
Desc 1: The form of a ghoulish looking piece of farm superstition stands
Desc 2: before you. A straw effigy of a man in overalls, a rotted pumpkin
Desc 3: makes for its face. Oddly enough it seems to hang from nothing as if
Desc 4: it were standing on its own will.

Name: famished cow
Desc 1: This poor beast of labor shows signs of not being fed for days. Who
Desc 2: ever the owner was has either left it or forgotten about it, or more
Desc 3: sinister things have happened. It looks up at you and lets out a weak
Desc 4: moo to signify it knows of your presence.

Name: starving pig
Desc 1: This poor beast of labor shows signs of not being fed for days. Who
Desc 2: ever the owner was has either left it or forgotten about it, or more
Desc 3: sinistar things have happened. It looks up at you and lets out a weak
Desc 4: oink in your general direction and continues to scrounge for food.

Name: chicken
Desc 1: Clucking away, ignoring you all the while, this chicken pecks around
Desc 2: snatching at some piece of corn you didn't see, or a worm that popped
Desc 3: out of nowhere. It crawls across your foot, ignoring your presence
Desc 4: entirely, daring you to make yourself known.

Name: death chicken
Desc 1: A black mammoth beast is before you. A cross between some monster
Desc 2: and a chicken, its feathers are black as night and its beak seems
Desc 3: to have a wicked curve, ready to wreck havoc. You know not what plane
Desc 4: this beast may have come but it brings terror to your heart.

Name: ancient gypsy woman
Desc 1: Decades have weathered the skin of this woman that she easily appears
Desc 2: to be almost one hundred years of age. She wears simple garb to go
Desc 3: with her walking stick and faded shawl. Her eyes have milked over
Desc 4: with age and you wonder if she even senses your prescence.

Name: gypsy protector
Desc 1: A great, burly man stands before you, arms like beer barrels. He
Desc 2: seems immensely imposing, even more so with the vile looking sword
Desc 3: strapped to his waist. His black eyes gaze at you, almost as if to
Desc 4: burn holes into your flesh. He is not to be trifeled with.

Name: white hart
Desc 1: Prancing about like a king, this deer is true majesty in motion.
Desc 2: A crown of horns reach to the sky from atop his head and he gazes at
Desc 3: you with more then animal intelligence. The white fur makes it appear
Desc 4: as if new snow had just been sprinkled upon him.

Name: white doe
Desc 1: Graceful as a sylvan queen, this deer is petite yet has a masterful
Desc 2: aura of grace. A fleece like pure snow causes the doe to almost
Desc 3: glow with a blinding light. She sniffs the air occasionally, aware of
Desc 4: your prescence, but you know only an evil soul would harm her.

Name: ivory golem
Desc 1: A massive metal statue of ivory inlaid with gold, it has two large
Desc 2: sapphires for eyes that are full of magical life. Standing almost
Desc 3: twelve feet tall it is a massive weapon of destruction, quick to turn
Desc 4: a skull or chest to mush with a strike from its huge fists.

Name: Ghost of Justice Darkbane
Desc 1: The image of the legendary paladin hovers before you. Even in death
Desc 2: he looks noble. With blond hair hanging to his shoulders, and emerald
Desc 3: eyes gazing at you with piercing justice. Two swords hang at his side
Desc 4: showing even in death he is never too slow to dole out justice.

Name: Dark Mage
Desc 1: The scent of death is apparent on this man like a second skin. His
Desc 2: ancient black eyes gaze at you like pools of the abyss. His gnarled
Desc 3: hands, skin stretched over bone like decrepit parchment, stroke his
Desc 4: dirty cotton beard, and he lets out a harsh, wretched laugh.

Name: colossal midnight dragon
Desc 1: All light seems to be absorbed by the black scales of this beast.
Desc 2: It is impossible to gauge his size the way shadows dance around his
Desc 3: body, but clearly visible are its dark red eyes staring at you with
Desc 4: pure death. An aura of cold surrounds you, chilling your marrow.

Name: Shadow Master
Desc 1: Garbed in black shadow material, this man has a body like steel.
Desc 2: With the swift, graceful steps of a man who inflicts death, you see
Desc 3: nothing of his face save for his piercing eyes. The dragon on the
Desc 4: chest of his black ninja robes almost seems alive.

Name: Mayor of Arlysia
Desc 1: This short pudgy man has seen better days. Wearing clothes he has
Desc 2: slept in, from his blood-shot eyes you are certain he is very sleep
Desc 3: deprived. He has the expression of a hunted animal making his beard
Desc 4: give an almost feral tinge. All the same he tries to be polite.

Name: townsman
Desc 1: A simple townsman, dressed in plain leathers and an old dusty hat he
Desc 2: throws you a grin and gives you a wave, obviously in high spirits.
Desc 3: From the way he laughs it was as if he was having the time of his
Desc 4: life though he seems to be doing nothing but walking around.

Name: townswoman
Desc 1: Almost as plain as the simple dress she wears, this lady walks around
Desc 2: in complete confidence. She gazes at you, a seductive twinkle in her
Desc 3: eye, and blows a kiss in your direction as she keeps walking.

Name: townsman
Desc 1: A simple townsman, dressed in plain leathers and an old dusty hat he
Desc 2: looks at you warily as if some monster were about to burst forth
Desc 3: from your skull. You can tell he has had many sleepless nights and
Desc 4: doesnt seem to be eating well, truly something has disturbed him.

Name: townswoman
Desc 1: Almost as plain as the simple dress she wears, this lady looks as if
Desc 2: she has seen ghosts from the grave. She seems almost startled by you,
Desc 3: and holds in the urge to scream. Something terrible has happened to
Desc 4: cause this to any normal person.

Name: arlysian guardsman
Desc 1: This is a scared-looking guard of the town. Wielding a greatsword
Desc 2: uncertainly, you wonder if he is green or has fought things that his
Desc 3: weapon is useless against. He gazes at you, wary of any tricks you
Desc 4: may pull, for he is only afraid of what he can't see.

Name: Inquisitor Armandriel
Desc 1: A man of imperious strength and willpower, he stands before you, the
Desc 2: relic of a long forgotten order. He gazes at you, seeking out any
Desc 3: thing that might be magical, but his sight is not what it used to be.
Desc 4: He is adorned in crimson scale mail and bears a sabre at his side.

Name: Oik
Desc 1: A simple innkeeper, you can guess by his gaunt body that business
Desc 2: has not been good. All the same he gives his customary greeting to
Desc 3: you and gives you a gap toothed smile.

Name: Lud
Desc 1: A simple man of smithy, he is built much like an anvil, short and
Desc 2: bulky. Massive arms hang about his waist as his black eyes stare at
Desc 3: you from under large salt and pepper eyebrows. He makes an impatient
Desc 4: snort obviously having no time for chit chat.

Name: Pastor Lander
