Desc 1: A very elderly holy man is hunched over before you. He whispers a
Desc 2: prayer to himself before giving you the best smile he can muster. His
Desc 3: eyes were once sea blue but have now dulled to a light grey.

Name: Volum
Desc 1: Dressed here in simple wizards garb, this young apprentice bows to
Desc 2: you slightly, before waving his hand in the direction of his wares.
Desc 3: His blond hair seems to sparkle, and his eyes twinkle with youthful
Desc 4: glee or with greed, you are unsure which.

Name: old hermit
Desc 1: This old, wizened man is garbed in plain grey robes tied together by
Desc 2: a belt of rope. Despite his incredible age he looks at you with
Desc 3: bright, keen eyes that almost seem to have a hint of glee.

Name: vampire minion
Desc 1: Alluring ruby eyes gaze at you from an ashen white face. You are
Desc 2: almost enchanted by the beautiful features of this undead youngling
Desc 3: except for the fanged mouth which whispers to you in soothing tones
Desc 4: even as he is raising his hand to strike.

Name: horned spider
Desc 1: This nightmare spider gazes at you with great anticipation. Large eye
Desc 2: clusters sits atop a great horned head. The entire body looks as
Desc 3: though it were encased in a great suit of thick armour, except for
Desc 4: the spindly legs, which jut out great spikes for ripping and tearing.

Name: animated book
Desc 1: The movement of this book can only be explained as a perversion of
Desc 2: magics, gone terribly wrong. It flies around with the swiftness of a
Desc 3: bird. Abruptly it hovers before you, turning its pages rapidly before
Desc 4: stopping. The runes on the page glow brightly and a spell erupts!

Name: animated book
Desc 1: The movement of this book can only be explained as a perversion of
Desc 2: magics, gone terribly wrong. It flies around with the swiftness of a
Desc 3: bird. Abruptly it hovers before you, turning its pages rapidly before
Desc 4: stopping. The runes on the page glow brightly and a spell erupts!

Name: animated book
Desc 1: The movement of this book can only be explained as a perversion of
Desc 2: magics, gone terribly wrong. It flies around with the swiftness of a
Desc 3: bird. Abruptly it hovers before you, turning its pages rapidly before
Desc 4: stopping. The runes on the page glow brightly and a spell erupts!

Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: dirty fisherman
Desc 1: Grime and dirt coat this man like a doublet and you almost hold your
Desc 2: nose from the deep, musky scent of water emenates from him. He gazes
Desc 3: at you with a wary eye, before taking a large drink from his cup. You
Desc 4: can faintly smell mead from his tankard.

Name: tsunami squid
Desc 1: A monstrous creature of water, it destroys entire cycles of life with
Desc 2: its prescence. It is the size of an entire ship and its tentacles
Desc 3: can destroy one easily. Mammoth eyes on either side glare at you with
Desc 4: fury, you the minnow caught in its kingdom of water.

Name: pirate ghost
Desc 1: Even in death this dead pirate wears an eye patch. A skeletal grin
Desc 2: greets you as it advances with a rusty old sabre clutched in one
Desc 3: ghostly hand. The pirate cackles at you evilly, telling you about
Desc 4: someone's locker.

Name: first mate
Desc 1: A huge undead creature, he must have been a half-ogre when he was
Desc 2: alive. Now he is rotted flesh and muscle, covered by a moth eaten
Desc 3: shirt that has more holes then actual cloth. He stomps towards you,
Desc 4: a horrid grin on his dead face.

Name: Dread Captain
Desc 1: The great and mighty captain of this ancient ship. He seems the most
Desc 2: human except for a faint pall to his skin like someone freshly
Desc 3: drowned. His huge beard barely hides the leer he throws at you, an
Desc 4: evil gleam in his eye as he brandishes his cutlass.

Name: death minion
Desc 1: Your bones are frozen in place as you gaze at the minon of the
Desc 2: Reaper. Fabled to be summoned only by the vilest magery, it is an
Desc 3: embodiment of negative power. Wielding a massive scythe it makes
Desc 4: absolutely no sound as it hovers before you, readying to strike.

Name: animated sword
Desc 1: This sword moves and weaves as if it were wielded by a warrior, but
Desc 2: there is no warrior that wields it. A massive broadsword it flies
Desc 3: through the air, as fast as a dagger. The blade humming with a life
Desc 4: of its own, it dives towards your head!

Name: darken beast
Desc 1: A creature of shadowform it is still enough of a behemoth to convince
Desc 2: you that it is real. Silver, pupiless eyes stare at you with hunger,
Desc 3: its jaws already slavering with the expectation that you are its next
Desc 4: meal. On four legs it stands just above your chest. It lunges at you!

Name: sea hag
Desc 1: A hideous mutation of fish and human, this wretched monster goes by
Desc 2: many names but most common is a sea hag. Oily green hair are matted
Desc 3: on this hunchbacks villanous, scaly face. She cackles at you evilly,
Desc 4: making your spine chilled. Long blue claws reach out towards you!

Name: severed waist
Desc 1: This is the severed lower body of something that has been dead for a
Desc 2: long, long time. Despite this condition it seems very lively and
Desc 3: senses your presence. To your horror it begins to lurch towards you.

Name: dark cupid
Desc 1: This small, dark-skinned creature could be easily mistaken for a boy
Desc 2: with wings, were it not for its evil appearance. Small red horns
Desc 3: sprout just above his forehead and fangs are revealed as he cackles
Desc 4: wickedly at you. He raises his small bow with a grin and aims at you!

Name: canimera
Desc 1: This mammoth creature is an abomination of magic and nightmares.
Desc 2: Three heads sprout from the chest of this dog-like monster. Each one
Desc 3: the face of a terrible hound, each one with slavering fangs. All are
Desc 4: breathing the breath of a dragon, causing death in its wake.

Name: daggerweed
Desc 1: A long, spiny plant curls out from the undergrowth. It is covered
Desc 2: with several jagged leaves that almost look like daggers. You believe
Desc 3: it to be your own imagination, but the plant seems to move at your
Desc 4: approach, its long vines stretching out as if to greet you.

Name: stitched zombie
Desc 1: A hideous monster created by hands that were mad and demented, it
Desc 2: lurches towards you with horrid slowness. Stitched at the arms, legs
Desc 3: and head, it is a mindless zombie that is somewhat lopsided as if it
Desc 4: were a puppet with tangled strings. It lets out an agonizing moan.

Name: fiery skull
Desc 1: This humanoid skull of flame, floats around, a bright torch of evil.
Desc 2: Occasionaly it clacks its teeth as if mouthing the words of some
Desc 3: phrase.

Name: old man
Desc 1: This wretched old man has been lying here for days. Half delirious
Desc 2: from malnourishment you have to plug your nose from the ghastly smell
Desc 3: that arises from his burlap clothed body. He rubs his eyes at your
Desc 4: intrusion before getting an insane grin.

Name: severed torso
Desc 1: The severed upper body of something that has been dead for awhile is
Desc 2: floating towards you by unknown means. The head of this nightmare
Desc 3: suddenly seems alive, cursing at you and snapping its teeth as if it
Desc 4: had been waiting to dine on flesh for ages untold.

Name: severed leg
Desc 1: Somehow animated with a life of its own, this is the rotten, severed
Desc 2: leg of something long dead. Blackened flesh lead to a sharply toed
Desc 3: foot. Hopping along in a macrabe dance it moves towards you as if
Desc 4: intent upon your demise.

Name: severed arm
Desc 1: Rotten and decayed, no natural explanation explains why this arm of
Desc 2: a reeking corpses floats here, fist closed, and swinging at you.
Desc 3: Broken nails scratch at you and fist flies, as if trying to pound out
Desc 4: your existance.

Name: severed head
Desc 1: Worm eaten eyes glare at you with hatred and malevolence. The severed
Desc 2: head of something once human growls at you with supernatural evil.
Desc 3: It swoops left and right looking for an opening, teeth gnashing in
Desc 4: anticipation of a bite.

Name: giant locust
Desc 1: This large, insectoid has been mutated by nature to become giant in
Desc 2: size. Black in colour, its multifaceted eyes seem to stare right at
Desc 3: you, its mandibles almost clicking in delight it seems. Suddenly it
Desc 4: takes flight and takes aim at you!

Name: Warmonger of Blood
Desc 1: This tall, massively muscled man is garbed in a gruesome mismatch of
Desc 2: black steel and bone armour. He wields a huge sword, also of bone,
Desc 3: and from the depths of his helm, his eyes glow with a crazed, fanatic
Desc 4: gleam. He exudes a massive presence of evil and malevolence.

Name: gremlin witchdoctor
Desc 1: A winged goblinoid, this one carries a feathered staff in his clawed
Desc 2: grasp. An elaborate headdress of small bones and trinkets decorate
Desc 3: his horned head. It weaves its staff in a pattern and begins growling
Desc 4: in your direction. You realize a spell is about to be cast upon you!

Name: stranglevine
Desc 1: Long green vines stretch from the ground in a massive jumble. You
Desc 2: faintly see tiny, red-tinged barbed points along the length of the
Desc 3: vines. Something catches your eye and you glance down to see one of
Desc 4: the vines has somehow wrapped itself around your leg.

Name: skeletal parrot
Desc 1: A bird long dead, now it is a dried, yellow skeleton. Through
Desc 2: dark magic it takes flight, a needle sharp beak ready to rip your
Desc 3: eyes apart. A hollow squak somehow leaves its throatless maw, and it
Desc 4: begins to descend upon you!

Name: animated knight
Desc 1: A massive suit of armour, worn by thin air as far as you can see.
Desc 2: Even so it moves about like an actual warrior, sword in hand and
Desc 3: pointed at you. It barely makes a sound as it weaves towards you,
Desc 4: ready to cleave you in two!

Name: arachnigoth
Desc 1: A skeletal spider the size of a house, it can only have come from
Desc 2: an unholy pit. Massive glowing eyes all gaze at you hungrily and it
Desc 3: flexes its fangs in anticipation. The stink of death is thick upon
Desc 4: it and you gag, your bones feel an deadly chill as it advances.

Name: deformed mutant
Desc 1: This hideous, misshapen creature appears to have once been a
Desc 2: humanoid. Its blistered skin is deformed and covered in thick black
Desc 3: hairs, and its face would make an ogre look beautiful. Its limbs are
Desc 4: filled with unnatural strength, and it attacks with berserk fury!

Name: blood skeleton
Desc 1: Blood red bones creak towards you in furious undeath. No light
Desc 2: emanates from the hollowed sockets and they almost seem to swallow
Desc 3: your sanity. The skeleton uses a simple morning-star, which it seems
Desc 4: to wield with unusual efficiency.

Name: dirty farmer
Desc 1: Dressed in dirt covered overalls, this farmer looks at you with a
Desc 2: leathery face and eyes filled with a horror unspeakable. He watches
Desc 3: your every move, expecting you to shed your skin and become his
Desc 4: nightmare.

Name: animated chains
Desc 1: These chains move in hypnotic patterns, two cobras ready to spring.
Desc 2: The clasps snap at you in anticipation, rust making it seem as if
Desc 3: the grinding of links made a hissing sound. While attached to the
Desc 4: wall they seem to have limitless length, offering little safety.

Name: dread planewalker
Desc 1: All you can see of this nightmarish creature is a faint outline of
Desc 2: talons and fangs, and blood red reptilian eyes. A cold wind seems to
Desc 3: blow in from some where and it lets out a howl of a thousand shrieks
Desc 4: giving you chills to the point of convulsion.

Name: crimson mist
Desc 1: This mysterious swirling mist flies through the air with great speed.
Desc 2: Flashing within the mist are tiny red lights, and emanating from the
Desc 3: mist cloud are sounds which ressemble the shrieking and moaning of
Desc 4: hundreds of tortured beings!

Name: guardsman
Desc 1: This is a fierce-looking guardsman. He wields a drawn broadsword and
Desc 2: carries a round shield, and his well-polished chainmail armour gleams
Desc 3: in the light. Guardsmen are known to be excellent fighters, and are
Desc 4: more than a match for most lesser adversaries.

Name: Dreadlord of Blood
Desc 1: This tall, massively muscled man is garbed in a gruesome mismatch of
Desc 2: black steel and bone armour. He wields a great smoking hammer,
Desc 3: and from the depths of his helm, his eyes glow with a crazed, fanatic
Desc 4: gleam. He exudes a massive presence of evil and malevolence.

Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: Mayor Delanon
Desc 1: This tall, fearsome creature is the spiteful, burning remnant of a
Desc 2: once-beautiful angel. Twisted and misformed by its unfathomable hate,
Desc 3: it flies about on hooked wings the colour of soot, and wields a
Desc 4: spectral glass blade that burns with unholy intensity.

Name: Aeriana the Pure
Desc 1: Ancient wisdom resides in the sapphire eyes of this dwarf. Garbed in
Desc 2: white her ankle length hair spills from her shoulders like a silver
Desc 3: and golden waterfall. She smiles at you merrily, and a calm resides
Desc 4: over you.

Name: mammoth rot worm
Desc 1: This gut-wrenching undead beast seems to have no end to its length,
Desc 2: or vileness. An eyeless worm, its maggot filled skin falls in clumps
Desc 3: beneath it as it churns the gruond with its maw of a million teeth.
Desc 4: It senses your presence and reaches out to consume you.

Name: barmaid
Desc 1: This pretty barmaid walks around in tight-fitting kitchen garb, a
Desc 2: tray in one hand, and the other free to slap the hands of forward
Desc 3: men.

Name: Madame Madison
Desc 1: Lady Madison looks barely a week over twenty five and yet her eyes
Desc 2: carry a wisdom much longer then that. With skilled hand she guides a
Desc 3: needle through a cloth of thread, creating a robe in no time. She
Desc 4: smiles shyly at you, and continues with her work.

Name: ivory golem
Desc 1: A massive metal statue of platinum inlaid with gems, it has two
Desc 2: gold spheres for eyes that are full of raw power. Standing almost
Desc 3: twelve feet tall it is a massive weapon of destruction, quick to turn
Desc 4: a skull or chest to mush with a strike from its large warhammer.

Name: Jandare Leafdancer
Desc 1: A handsome elf, with ageless beauty, his silver hair and bright blue
Desc 2: eyes have a constant twinkle to them. He wears typical forest green
Desc 3: leather, which reveals a body fit for battle and agility.

Name: townsman
Desc 1: A simple townsman, dressed in plain leathers and an old dusty hat he
Desc 2: looks at you warily as if some monster were about to burst forth
Desc 3: from your skull. You can tell he has had many sleepless nights and
Desc 4: doesnt seem to be eating well, truly something has disturbed him.

Name: townswoman
Desc 1: Almost as plain as the simple dress she wears, this lady looks as if
Desc 2: she has seen ghosts from the grave. She seems almost startled by you,
Desc 3: and holds in the urge to scream. Something terrible has happened to
Desc 4: cause this to any normal person.

Name: dirty fisherman
Desc 1: Grime and dirt coat this man like a doublet and you almost hold your
Desc 2: nose from the deep, musky scent of water emenates from him. He gazes
Desc 3: at you with a wary eye, before taking a large drink from his cup. You
Desc 4: can faintly smell mead from his tankard.

Name: dirty farmer
Desc 1: Dressed in dirt covered overalls, this farmer looks at you with a
Desc 2: leathery face and eyes filled with a horror unspeakable. He watches
Desc 3: your every move, expecting you to shed your skin and become his
Desc 4: nightmare.

Name: Enigma Lord
Desc 1: A tall thin man, with impossibly long limbs, towers above you. Easily
Desc 2: seven feet tall, he looks to be someone caught between the world of
Desc 3: the living and the dead. His eyes of coal are the only contrast to
Desc 4: his glaring white skin. His face shows no hint of remorse or mercy.

Name: gypsy spirit
Desc 1: Before you stands the image of a half-elf, dressed in clothes of many
Desc 2: shades, with a shortsword attached to its belt. He grins and gives
Desc 3: you an extravagant bow. Assigned to guard this entrance, he waits
Desc 4: patiently for your request.

Name: giant locust
Desc 1: This large, insectoid has been mutated by nature to become giant in
Desc 2: size. Black in colour, its multifaceted eyes seem to stare right at
Desc 3: you, its mandibles almost clicking in delight it seems. Suddenly it
Desc 4: takes flight and takes aim at you!

Name: stitched zombie
Desc 1: A hideous monster created by hands that were mad and demented, it
Desc 2: lurches towards you with horrid slowness. Stitched at the arms, legs
Desc 3: and head, it is a mindless zombie that is somewhat lopsided as if it
Desc 4: were a puppet with tangled strings. It lets out an agonizing moan.

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull red glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull red glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull red glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: wraith knight
Desc 1: A most foul and undead creation, this was once a knight of great
Desc 2: prowess. Now it wears the blood and gore of its victims on the many
Desc 3: spikes that jut from it's armor. A skeletal grin greets your gaze as
Desc 4: it raises a large bone sword to attack.

Name: crowned spider
Desc 1: A creature bizarre beyond description, it is a massive spider with
Desc 2: the formation of a crown of spikes upon its head. The massive shell
Desc 3: looks thicker then most earthly metal. Large red eye clusters gaze
Desc 4: at you, hunger read in each one. It moves at you, its fangs at ready!

Name: Darken Beast Lord
Desc 1: A nightmarish humanoid, standing easily twelve feet tall. He looks to
Desc 2: have the strength of a horde of men, yet his approach to you shows a
Desc 3: supernatural agility. Wielding a terrifying long-spear, he is garbed
Desc 4: only in a dark leather hide. His animal eyes burn you with hatred!

Name: townsman
Desc 1: A simple townsman, dressed in plain leathers and an old dusty hat he
Desc 2: looks at you warily as if some monster were about to burst forth
Desc 3: from your skull. You can tell he has had many sleepless nights and
Desc 4: doesnt seem to be eating well, truly something has disturbed him.

Name: townsman
Desc 1: A simple townsman, dressed in plain leathers and an old dusty hat he
Desc 2: looks at you warily as if some monster were about to burst forth
Desc 3: from your skull. You can tell he has had many sleepless nights and
Desc 4: doesnt seem to be eating well, truly something has disturbed him.

Name: ancient gremlin shaman
Desc 1: A winged goblinoid, this one is ancient beyond recognition. Parchment
Desc 2: skin stretch over his thin frame. No longer taking flight his eyes of
Desc 3: evil gaze at you. A massive shamanic headdress seems to teeter on his
Desc 4: shrivled head, and with a hiss he begins a dreadful incantation.

Name: Lord Feyr
Desc 1: A huge hulking brute, he stands almost seven feet tall, armoured in
Desc 2: a massive dark shell of metal. An emblem is engraved on his
Desc 3: breastplate, that of a white skeletal claw, crushing a red skull.
Desc 4: Wielding a massive sword, he grins at you with sharpened canines.

Name: stitched zombie
Desc 1: A hideous monster created by hands that were mad and demented, it
Desc 2: lurches towards you with horrid slowness. Stitched at the arms, legs
Desc 3: and head, it is a mindless zombie that is somewhat lopsided as if it
Desc 4: were a puppet with tangled strings. It lets out an agonizing moan.

Name: gnaj zombie
Desc 1: A ghastly mix of dead flesh and tainted metal, this beast looks at
Desc 2: at you with blank eyes. A nightmare that could only be crafted by
Desc 3: magic means, pieces of armour and metal have been melded into rotted
Desc 4: flesh. It moves with at a slow deliberate pace, saying nothing.

Name: mind flayer magus
Desc 1: This tentacled terror stands six feet tall with purple slimey skin.
Desc 2: Its alien claws grasp a staff, and it seems to move its tentacles in
Desc 3: a pattern, and the perverse symbols of death on its robes glow,
Desc 4: devouring the light around it.

Name: white assassin
Desc 1: This figure in glaring white clothing, moves with incredible agility.
Desc 2: It is hard to see against their bright clothing but it appears as if
Desc 3: they were some type of lion like biped, wielding weapons of death.
Desc 4: Their cold feline eyes gaze at you, portraying your death.

Name: red worm
Desc 1: This crimson monstrosity burrows through the earth in search of prey.
Desc 2: It is twenty feet long, and has a mouth bristling with pointed teeth.
Desc 3: Attacking any source of vibration, the red worm is a danger to be
Desc 4: feared and shunned.

Name: purple worm
Desc 1: This violet monstrosity burrows through the earth in search of prey.
Desc 2: It is thirty feet long, and has a mouth bristling with pointed teeth.
Desc 3: Attacking any source of vibration, the purple worm is a danger to be
Desc 4: feared and shunned.

Name: white worm
Desc 1: This white monstrosity burrows through the earth in search of prey.
Desc 2: It is fourty feet long, and has a mouth bristling with pointed teeth.
Desc 3: Attacking any source of vibration, the white worm is a danger to be
Desc 4: feared and shunned.

Name: black worm
Desc 1: This dark monstrosity burrows through the earth in search of prey.
Desc 2: It is fifty feet long, and has a mouth bristling with pointed teeth.
Desc 3: Attacking any source of vibration, the black worm is a danger to be
Desc 4: feared and shunned.

Name: massive black worm
Desc 1: This massive black worm burrows through the earth in search of prey.
Desc 2: It is sixty feet long, and has a mouth bristling with pointed teeth.
Desc 3: Attacking any source of vibration, the dark worm is a danger to be
Desc 4: feared and shunned.

Name: triceratops
Desc 1: This horned beast gazes at you dumbly as it eats some nearby plants.
Desc 2: Two great horns project from a plated head with a large frill around
Desc 3: its skull. Its parrot-like beak looks very sharp though it is only
Desc 4: used to help devour vegetation. It looks fearsome but seems harmless.

Name: mirror portal
Desc 1: At first this looks to be nothing more then a cracked mirror. However
Desc 2: looking deeper into its depths reveal a bizarre image. Strange,evilly
Desc 3: dark mists swirl about your reflection, and you see yourself melting.
Desc 4: Almost abruptly nothing more is left but a skeleton, grinning at you.

Name: wraith spider
Desc 1: Upon eight spectral legs this freakish monster moves towards you with
Desc 2: supernatural speed. A cluster of eyes burn with hellish light, and
Desc 3: two spectral fangs glisten for a taste of your soul.

Name: gnaj golem
Desc 1: This eight-foot-tall creation is a wretched combination of body parts
Desc 2: and iron. Humanoid eyes gaze at you blankly from a metallic face, and
Desc 3: its two powerful arms that sprout from its shoulders combine with two
Desc 4: iron ones that sprout from its sides.

Name: halfling prisoner
Desc 1: This person is quiet strange. He appears to be a halfling, barely
Desc 2: four feet in height, chained to the wall by large metal links. What
Desc 3: seems most odd is that he is busyily hammering away at a large
Desc 4: piece of metal, with great powerful strokes unusual for his race.

Name: Gnaj the Creator
Desc 1: Tattered great robes surround the haggard form of this madman. A
Desc 2: living form of man and metal, pieces of him have been replaced with
Desc 3: steel and iron, making him look as though he were stitched together
Desc 4: by some god upon his birth. He grins at you wickedly.

Name: green demonling
Desc 1: Ancient lore tells you this monster is a servant to the darkest
Desc 2: magic, summoned through evil rites. Its thick greenish hide drips
Desc 3: ichor from gangreious sores. Its claws and fangs are razor-sharp,
Desc 4: quick to slice flesh and gnaw bone. Its tail ends in a sharp stinger.

Name: green demonling
Desc 1: Ancient lore tells you this monster is a servant to the darkest
Desc 2: magic, summoned through evil rites. Its thick greenish hide drips
Desc 3: ichor from gangreious sores. Its claws and fangs are razor-sharp,
Desc 4: quick to slice flesh and gnaw bone. Its tail ends in a sharp stinger.

Name: blue demonling
Desc 1: Ancient lore tells you this monster is a servant to the darkest
Desc 2: magic, summoned through evil rites. Its thick midnight blue hide
Desc 3: crackles with dark energy. Its claws and fangs are razor-sharp,
Desc 4: quick to slice flesh and gnaw bone. Its tail ends in a sharp stinger.

Name: red demonling
Desc 1: Ancient lore tells you this monster is a servant to the darkest
Desc 2: magic, summoned through evil rites. Its hide is colored blood-red and
Desc 3: it seems to be dripping some type of ichor, its claws and fangs are
Desc 4: razor sharp. Its tail ends in a poisonous stinger which waves about.

Name: flaming mammoth
Desc 1: A massive burning beast of hellfire stands before you. A nightmarish
Desc 2: mix of elephant and bull, it stands up right fifteen feet, with two
Desc 3: great horns coming from its head and long tusks that protrude from
Desc 4: its jaw. Its large trunk ends in a wickedly curved spike.

Name: horned demon
Desc 1: This towering demon has brilliant yellow skin and two sharpened
Desc 2: sets of antlers that branch out from the sides of its head. Its
Desc 3: powerful arms have long, hooked claws, and its glaring black eyes
Desc 4: have no hint of mercy in them.

Name: vision
Desc 1: Before you is a small spectre, floating about two feet off the ground
Desc 2: It is said to touch such a spectre is death.

Name: shadow spectre
Desc 1: This is a strange black spectre, floating around at rapid speed from
Desc 2: shadow. A small glint of metal is visible within it from time to time

Name: astral shade
Desc 1: This odd brightly colored spectre floats around the room seemingly at
Desc 2: random. It changes color quickly whenever it moves, and could be a
Desc 3: difficult opponent.

Name: spectral mage
Desc 1: Dressed completely as a mage, this ancient spectre has been granted
Desc 2: extreme power that flows out of him in the form of strange shrieking
Desc 3: spirits.

Name: ghostly figure
Desc 1: This nearly transparent apparition moans softly as it floats about.
Desc 2: Dressed in the clothes of a noble, his eyes fill your heart with
Desc 3: sorrow. He reaches towards you as if asking for help.

Name: bugbear
Desc 1: This muscular goblinoid stands almost seven feet tall, with a thick
Desc 2: yellow hide, and coarse black hair. Wearing chainmail and wielding a
Desc 3: battle-hammer, he snarls at you, hatred gleaming in his red eyes.

Name: bugbear captain
Desc 1: This muscular goblinoid stands over seven feet tall, with a thick
Desc 2: brown hide, and dark red hair. Wearing scalemaile and wielding a
Desc 3: greataxe which he wields with unusual precision.

Name: ogre
Desc 1: This huge figure towers nearly ten feet above the ground. It wears
Desc 2: heavy leather skins, and wields a massive club bound with iron. The
Desc 3: ogre's massive musculature makes you feel like an insect compared to
Desc 4: his power.

Name: wyvern
Desc 1: This large dragonlike monster is thirty feet long, half of that
Desc 2: belonging to its serpentine tail, with a poison-dipped stinger at
Desc 3: the end. Known for their tenacity, these monsters do not give up on
Desc 4: their prey, once it is found. It screeches at you as it swoops down!

Name: bugbear berserker
Desc 1: This muscular goblinoid looks at you with eyes filled with hate and
Desc 2: foam covering his lips. In a state of total rage he wears nothing but
Desc 3: a leather tunic, and wields a greatsword. Swinging wildly he comes at
Desc 4: you, his teeth baring in fury.

Name: dark goblin archer
Desc 1: This sneaky-looking goblin has dusky grey skin and is clad in black
Desc 2: leather armour. It wields a short bow, and a shortsword swings by its
Desc 3: side.

Name: dark goblin
Desc 1: This sly goblin has dusky grey skin and luminescent red eyes. He
Desc 2: wears black chainmail armour and wields a cruel-looking morningstar.
Desc 3: He leers evilly at you and chuckles.

Name: mutant spider
Desc 1: This thing is a hideous parody of a spider. It is almost as tall as a
Desc 2: man, and scuttles around on some 12 legs. Its cluster of black eyes
Desc 3: appear to glow in the darkness, and on the back of its black body are
Desc 4: several razor sharp spikes.

Name: dark-elf assassin
Desc 1: A figure of swift darkness moves about, his dark robes covering
Desc 2: everything but his face. Holding a blade of adamantite before him,
Desc 3: he gazes at you with dead eyes, already planning the quickest path
Desc 4: to your death.

Name: dark-elf mage
Desc 1: Garbed in midnight black robes, the power of wicked magic. With his
Desc 2: hood drawn you only see the hatred that burns from his eyes. His
Desc 3: hands move in myriad patterns as he prepares to obliterate you from
Desc 4: his sight.

Name: dark-elf faithkeeper
Desc 1: This dark figure is clad in flowing black robes that are marked in
Desc 2: several places with stange arcance symbols. His face is shrouded in
Desc 3: some unnatural darkness by his drawn hood. Around his neck is an
Desc 4: amulet of his dark goddess, and in his hand is a bloodstained knife.

Name: baby black dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about ten feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in blackish scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. Its small, but sharp teeth
Desc 4: seem to secreat a greenish fluid, that hisses as it hits the ground.

Name: young black dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about eighteen feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in black scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. Its small, but sharp teeth
Desc 4: seem to secreat a greenish fluid, that hisses as it hits the ground.

Name: adolescent black dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty-eight feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in dark black scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. Its small, but sharp teeth
Desc 4: seem to secreat a greenish fluid, that hisses as it hits the ground.

Name: black dragon hatchling
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about six feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in dark grey scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. Its small, but sharp teeth
Desc 4: seem to secreat a greenish fluid, that hisses as it hits the ground.

Name: baby white dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about nine feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright white scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. With frosty blue eyes it
Desc 4: stares at you with hunger, deciding to make you its next meal.

Name: young white dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about fifteen feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright white scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. With frosty blue eyes it
Desc 4: stares at you with hunger, deciding to make you its next meal.

Name: adolescent white dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty-five feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright white scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. With frosty blue eyes it
Desc 4: stares at you with hunger, deciding to make you its next meal.

Name: white dragon hatchling
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about seven feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright white scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. With frosty blue eyes it
Desc 4: stares at you with hunger, deciding to make you its next meal.

Name: drunken brawler
Desc 1: This obviously plastered person staggers aimlessly about, an empty
Desc 2: pewter tankard in one hand, and a link of sausages in the other. He
Desc 3: is quite angry, probably at being thrown out of every bar in town,
Desc 4: and is picking fights with everyone he meets.

Name: unicorn
Desc 1: The beautiful unicorn is a magical protector of the woods. It is
Desc 2: strong and quick, and extremely skilled with its horn. Although
Desc 3: normally shy and reclusive, the unicorn is a relentless and deadly
Desc 4: foe when it encounters creatures of evil.

Name: faerie
Desc 1: This exquisite, beautiful creature closely ressembles a tiny elf with
Desc 2: dragonfly wings. She glows with a soft light, and as she flies about
Desc 3: a trail of glittering faerie dust spins out behind her. Faeries are
Desc 4: incredibly magical creatures, and often command powerful magics.

Name: baby blue dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirteen feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in light blue scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A crackle of energy can be
Desc 4: seen escaping its maw and it gazes at you with glittering red eyes.

Name: young blue dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty-two feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in dark blue scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A crackle of energy can be
Desc 4: seen escaping its maw and it gazes at you with glittering red eyes.

Name: adolescent blue dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirty-five feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in dark blue scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A crackle of energy can be
Desc 4: seen escaping its maw and it gazes at you with glittering red eyes.

Name: blue dragon hatchling
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about eleven feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in light blue-grey scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A crackle of energy can be
Desc 4: seen escaping its maw and it gazes at you with glittering red eyes.

Name: Ebon Blade manhunter
Desc 1: Stalking from the shadows, the assassin is mostly shrouded from your
Desc 2: view. The only hint that he is even there is the reflection cast off
Desc 3: his adamantite blade as he prepares to strike you down. He lunges
Desc 4: at you from the darkness.

Name: Ebon Blade assassin
Desc 1: A tall elvish figure, dressed in black robes, steps towards you,
Desc 2: gracefully yet threatening, with the movements of a killer. You
Desc 3: can only see their dark eyes, as they brandish a pair of bright
Desc 4: adamantite knives in a hypnotic pattern.

Name: baby green dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirteen feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in light green scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: young green dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in dark green scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from its
Desc 4: mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: adolescent green dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in emerald green scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: green dragon hatchling
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about six feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in green shaded scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: white guardsman
Desc 1: Standing before you is a warrior of white, wielding a large
Desc 2: broadsword. His chain-mail and shield are of the purest white you
Desc 3: you have ever seen, and his drawn helm seems painted to match. The
Desc 4: guard does nothing as you gaze upon it, but ready for battle.

Name: black knight
Desc 1: A tall ominous figure dressed entirely in black armour towers before
Desc 2: you wielding a cruel looking flail in one hand, and holding a long
Desc 3: battle shield in the other. No sound of breath or voice comes from
Desc 4: him as he slowly moves towards you, swinging his flail menacingly.

Name: white bishop
Desc 1: A tall elderly man stands here clothed entirely in white clothing.
Desc 2: A cloth miter rises proudly above him, and his white pupiless eyes
Desc 3: seem to watch your every move. For a moment he says nothing and then
Desc 4: his lips move, and you realize he is preparing an incantation!

Name: black marble golem
Desc 1: This large creation is twelve feet of black, moving rock. Two fiery
Desc 2: eyes are all you see of its head, and it stomps down with slow,
Desc 3: powerful strides. It has no mouth and merely stalks you, ready to
Desc 4: pulverize you with its massive rock fists.

Name: white queen
Desc 1: Frigidly beautiful, this woman of white gazes at you imperiously.
Desc 2: Her face unmoving, she moves her hands in arcane gestures, showing no
Desc 3: emotion, even as she prepares to destroy you.

Name: black king
Desc 1: A figure of nobility and arrogance, this man of obsidian stands here
Desc 2: imperiously. Gazing at you with disdain bordering revulsion, he
Desc 3: wields a large sceptre of obsidian. Though he wields it slowly,
Desc 4: he moves it with slow, deadly accuracy.

Name: hooded man
Desc 1: This figure is shrouded completely in a light looking white
Desc 2: cloak. Though he is sitting at the table you can tell he would stand
Desc 3: well over six feet tall. He seems to be minding his own business but
Desc 4: something tells you he knows of something you want.

Name: old man
Desc 1: This wizened man sits here on a carved wooden bench. He wears faded
Desc 2: grey robes with what appear to have once been symbols on them. His
Desc 3: gaze wanders around vaguely, but as you turn to look away you think
Desc 4: you seem him appraise you shrewdly out of the corner of his eye.

Name: ancient tapestry
Desc 1: This particular piece of art has been fashioned from crimson and
Desc 2: black thread, with various pieces of white in between. Portraying
Desc 3: a terrible battle between a dark cowled man with a hoard of undead
Desc 4: and a group of ill-equipped travelers, fumbling with their weapons.

Name: shredded tapestry
Desc 1: You can tell this was once a piece of fine tapestry, but that would
Desc 2: have been ages ago. Now it is a pile of shredded and tattered thread.
Desc 3: Despite the toll time has taken upon its delicate fabric you can
Desc 4: still make out the picture of someone walking through a portal.

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: Bulging green eyes, and dark blue skin are what you first notice of
Desc 2: this tiny humanoid. His hair appears to be made from green leaves,
Desc 3: and were it not for the leer from his red lips, revealing rows of
Desc 4: pointy, sharp teeth, he could be considered strangely charming.

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: Bulging grey eyes, and pitch black skin are what you first notice of
Desc 2: this tiny humanoid. His hair appears to be made from browning leaves,
Desc 3: and were it not for the leer from his dark lips, revealing rows of
Desc 4: pointy, sharp teeth, he could be considered strangely charming.

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: Bright crimson eyes gaze at you with a hatred unlike any you have yet
Desc 2: seen. Hair the color and shape of dying leaves cover his head, and
Desc 3: his massive jowls barely hide the great fangs that lie within. He
Desc 4: roars in pure rage, and his barrel arms flex as he rushes at you!

Name: bone warrior
Desc 1: A dull red glow emanates from the eye sockets of this long since
Desc 2: dead warrior. No flesh appears upon the undead to show the scars of
Desc 3: battles past. Deep gouges in some of the bones surrounding vital
Desc 4: areas are evidence that their death was not timely.

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: Clothed in a robe of leaves, this impish being gazes at you with eyes
Desc 2: of amber. His lavender skin glows, and his razor sharp emerald teeth
Desc 3: give his face a visage of insanity. Clawed hands move in arcane
Desc 4: motions, and his face takes on a mask of hatred.

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: Golden eyes of hatred glare at you from this green skinned fiend.
Desc 2: Two clawed hands weave menacingly, and the two pincers that protrude
Desc 3: from his chest snap with ferocity. He bares his crimson fangs, and
Desc 4: the leaf tatooed on his forehead glows an ever growing blackness.

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: Bulging green eyes, and dark blue skin are what you first notice of
Desc 2: this tiny humanoid. His hair appears to be made from green leaves,
Desc 3: and were it not for the leer from his red lips, revealing rows of
Desc 4: pointy, sharp teeth, he could be considered strangely charming.

Name: Angelic Hunter
Desc 1: This gigantic angel like being stands at least fifteen feet tall and
Desc 2: is shrouded in a burning aura of darkness. It is garbed in a
Desc 3: strange metallic cloth that has been shredded by two hideous
Desc 4: black wings that have erupted from this foul beast's shoulders.

Name: Majestic Dragon
Desc 1: This gigantic dragon is at least one hundred feet long, with a
Desc 2: wingspan many times that. It has scales ranging from a deep blood
Desc 3: red to a dull yellow. Its features are beyond comparison to anything
Desc 4: a mortal could comprehend.

Name: Golden Phoenix
Desc 1: This large magical bird is a sight of beautiful feathers and searing
Desc 2: flames. It has a massive ninety-foot wing span, and the feathers
Desc 3: are a mix of gold, white, and bright orange. It gazes at you with
Desc 4: glowing eyes, radiating a since of overwhelming power.

Name: Demon Lord
Desc 1: This nightmarish demon stands easily twelve feet tall, and is
Desc 2: guarded by two huge black wings. He looks to have the strength of a
Desc 3: horde of men, but his approach shows signs that he is hiding his
Desc 4: agility. His demonic eyes burn you with hatred!

Name: Great Hydra
Desc 1: This monstrous, reptilian beast has thick scaly skin that glistens
Desc 2: with oily secretions. It has two heads attached to long, serpentine
Desc 3: necks, which act independently of the body. Hydras have incredible
Desc 4: regeneration and are rumored to be able to re-grow their heads.

Name: Mandrake the Songweaver
Desc 1: Brightly garbed in royal silks and fine leathers, this young
Desc 2: gentleman is quite dashing. He has a jingle to his step, and
Desc 3: plays a long flute, using it at times to lift the coat ends of
Desc 4: passersby. A bag is slewn over his shoulder, with instruments inside.

Name: inquisitor
Desc 1: This fierce-looking warrior stands before you garbed in crimson scale
Desc 2: armour that bears the crest of a flame upon it. Wielding a vicious
Desc 3: looking scythe, he gazes at you with eyes of fanaticism and hatred.

Name: inquisitor
Desc 1: This fierce-looking warrior stands before you garbed in crimson scale
Desc 2: armour that bears the crest of a flame upon it. Wielding a vicious
Desc 3: looking scythe, he gazes at you with eyes of fanaticism and hatred.

Name: inquisitor
Desc 1: This fierce-looking warrior stands before you garbed in crimson scale
Desc 2: armour that bears the crest of a flame upon it. Wielding a vicious
Desc 3: looking scythe, he gazes at you with eyes of fanaticism and hatred.

Name: inquisitor
Desc 1: A terrible vision of righteous fury, this warrior says nothing, but
Desc 2: wields a crimson shield and heavy longsword that show his intent on
Desc 3: your annihilation.

Name: Aderem
Desc 1: With reserved poise and eloquent tongue, this pirating Underlord
Desc 2: easily assumes the role of a noble count. Cleanshaven skin and
Desc 3: piercing blue eyes are framed by a head of short, wavey black hair.
Desc 4: His long velvet robe glides behind his step.

Name: inquisitor
Desc 1: This fierce-looking guard looks at you with intense distrust. He
Desc 2: carries a shield with a crimson flame on it and wields a broadsword.
Desc 3: Garbed in crimson scale armour, he moves with unsettling confidence
Desc 4: and has a certain fanatical gleam to his eye.

Name: enormous blue dragon
Desc 1: This massive dragon is at least sixty feet long, covered in scales
Desc 2: that are the blue of an evening sky. His gigantic wings look to span
Desc 3: its length by many times, and his menacing teeth seem to crackle with
Desc 4: energy. You are chilled by the sight of his hateful, reptilian eyes.

Name: prisoner
Desc 1: Dressed in rags with years of grime covering him, this emaciated man
Desc 2: attempts to glance up at you from his kneeling position. The sudden
Desc 3: clink of chains pulls him back down and you realize he has been
Desc 4: chained down like an animal, doubled over as if in submission.

Name: beautiful woman
Desc 1: A tall, graceful vision of breathtaking beauty stands before you,
Desc 2: clothed in a long grass colored robe. Her hair is the colour of
Desc 3: dandilions and her eyes the purple of orchid. She gazes at you with
Desc 4: some amount of indifference.

Name: handsome man
Desc 1: This massive brute stands easily ten feet tall, with skin the colour
Desc 2: of fresh grass, and eyes of a red rose. He smiles at you viciously,
Desc 3: wielding a blade of energy. With quick movements he takes on a stance
Desc 4: of battle, preparing to bring about your death the quickest possible.

Name: massive hydra head
Desc 1: This gargantuan head is nearly half the size of the body itself.
Desc 2: Its gaping maw is filled with massive serrated teeth, which
Desc 3: are easily the size of most large greatswords.

Name: Azrandimon
Desc 1: This towering man of flame stands ten feet tall. With broad shoulders
Desc 2: and a long fiery beard that reaches his waist, his eyeless sockets
Desc 3: send shivers down your spine, as you see small plumes of smoke that
Desc 4: seem to rise from them. His fanged maw smiles at you viciously.

Name: darken beast
Desc 1: A creature of shadowform it is still enough of a behemoth to convince
Desc 2: you that it is real. Silver, pupiless eyes stare at you with hunger,
Desc 3: its jaws already slavering with the expectation that you are its next
Desc 4: meal. On four legs it stands just above your chest. It lunges at you!

Name: Lorzina
Desc 1: An emerald green aura surrounds this woman. Her seven foot frame now
Desc 2: seems full of menace and wrath, and her face is contorted in a mask
Desc 3: of hatred and wickedness. Her long nails clench as they prepare to
Desc 4: bring down her immense anger upon you!

Name: demon imp
Desc 1: Covered in horns and a sickening slime, this pointy nosed being gazes
Desc 2: at you with an undeniable leer. Long spindly fingers flex with a
Desc 3: sickening anticipation, and you find it hard to bear looking at this
Desc 4: monster any longer.

Name: ancient sand dragon
Desc 1: This gigantic creature is fully seventy feet long, covered in dull
Desc 2: yellow scales harder than steel. Its talons are like swords; a strike
Desc 3: of its tail, like a thunderclap. It is an elder of its kind,
Desc 4: immensely powerful and malicious. Death follows in its wake.

Name: fallen angel
Desc 1: This tall, fearsome creature is the spiteful, burning remnant of a
Desc 2: once-beautiful angel. Twisted and misformed by its unfathomable hate,
Desc 3: it flies about on hooked wings the colour of soot, and wields a
Desc 4: spectral glass blade that burns with unholy intensity.

Name: aged earth dragon
Desc 1: This massive, earthy-scaled wyrm is seventy feet from snout to tail.
Desc 2: Its iridescent, reptilian eyes glare at you with malicious
Desc 3: intelligence. Its claws rend the stone floor like it was sand, and
Desc 4: its great teeth show they have rendered many an armoured knight.

Name: Dao Lord
Desc 1: This powerful being is a native of the elemental plane of earth. A
Desc 2: greater spirit of overwhelming evil, it works solely to futher its
Desc 3: own twisted goals, causing pain and suffering in its wake. Known for
Desc 4: their incredible power and cunning, the Dao are deadly foes.

Name: great green dragon
Desc 1: This huge monster is easily fifty feet long, with deep green scales
Desc 2: the color of spring leaves. Its massive fangs and claws look sharp
Desc 3: enough to rend stone like it were wheat, and its great wingspan
Desc 4: matches its length almost threefold. It roars at you with great rage.

Name: giant roc
Desc 1: This titanic creature ressembles a vulture, but of an incredible
Desc 2: size. Its wingspan must be at least a hundred feet wide, its beak as
Desc 3: long as a canoe and razor-sharp. Each talon is as long as a human is
Desc 4: tall. Luckily it is huge enough that it ignores most small folk.

Name: Darken Beast Lord
Desc 1: A nightmarish humanoid, standing easily twelve feet tall. He looks to
Desc 2: have the strength of a horde of men, yet his approach to you shows a
Desc 3: supernatural agility. Wielding a terrifying long-spear, he is garbed
Desc 4: only in a dark leather hide. His animal eyes burn you with hatred!

Name: Lord of the Hunt
Desc 1: This terryfing being stands at least fifteen feet tall, and is as
Desc 2: lithe as a cat. Garbed in a strange, metallic garb, he wields a long
Desc 3: spear which sparkles with blue light. The Lord of the Hunt's bright
Desc 4: green eyes almost entrance you as he stares right at you!

Name: silver warrior
Desc 1: A vision of pure justice, this creation flies at you upon agile wings
Desc 2: of white flame, and its well muscled arms wield a sword of diamond.
Desc 3: Its piercing eyes reflect nothing, and its silver face only displays
Desc 4: the desire to execute you.

Name: marble archer
Desc 1: Sapphire eyes reflect absolute order from this marble skinned being.
Desc 2: Upon swings of gold it flies at you, with unworldy focus it aims a
Desc 3: bow of silver at you.

Name: golden mist
Desc 1: This mist of golden flecks flies through the air with immense speed.
Desc 2: Sparkles of platinum and silver mingle with gold and you faintly
Desc 3: make out a face of determination. It seems to hover momentairly
Desc 4: before flying at you, promising pain upon its arrival

Name: spiked juggernaut
Desc 1: This horror of metal stands easily fifteen feet tall and has been
Desc 2: crafted into the image of a hellish man of nightmares. Spikes jut
Desc 3: from all sides and angles, with the largest one atop its head, curved
Desc 4: like a bulls horn. Its eyes of fire seem to smoke as it runs at you.

Name: Devil Fiend
Desc 1: A great demonic beast, it is guarded by two large cruel wings of
Desc 2: black. Thick reddish hide glow with a dark aura of fire and its
Desc 3: pupiless eyes show unending torture and pain. In one hand it carries
Desc 4: a sword of pure flame, and the other a wickedly barbed whip.

Name: Demoness
Desc 1: A monstrosity of nightmares, a serpenttine beast with the upper body
Desc 2: of a beautiful maiden and the lower body of a massive serpent. Her
Desc 3: very skin is set aflame. With demonic eyes she looks at you evilly
Desc 4: and her fanged grin slips out a serpentine tongue, tasting your fear.

Name: fanged demon
Desc 1: Hulking muscles bulge and writhe under the crimson hide of this
Desc 2: beast. Two massive horns protrude from the sides of its skull as its
Desc 3: onyx eyes look upon you with dumb hatred. Thousands of daggers line
Desc 4: its gaping mouth, and the stench of death exudes from its maw.

Name: demon imp
Desc 1: Covered in horns and a sickening slime, this pointy nosed being gazes
Desc 2: at you with an undeniable leer. Long spindly fingers flex with a
Desc 3: sickening anticipation, and you find it hard to bear looking at this
Desc 4: monster any longer.

Name: Horner the Hide
Desc 1: Horner is a burly half-orc with a black, tattered eye patch, and
Desc 2: thick iron nose-ring. His muscles bulge from his sleeveless shirt and
Desc 3: his savage scars intermingle with his reddish skin. His other eye
Desc 4: gazes at you with an air of caution and arrogance.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: great green dragon
Desc 1: This huge monster is easily fifty feet long, with deep green scales
Desc 2: the color of spring leaves. Her massive fangs and claws look sharp
Desc 3: enough to rend stone like it were wheat, and her great wingspan
Desc 4: matches her length almost threefold. She roars loudly in great fury.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: old thief
Desc 1: Dressed in dusty leathers, with a shortsword by his side, you see
Desc 2: before you a thin old man easily reaching his first century of age.
Desc 3: With a flowing beard that reaches his waist, his eyes seem to be
Desc 4: squinting, as if in some daydream.

Name: marble knight
Desc 1: A ten foot tall monster of marble stands before you, wielding an
Desc 2: equally massive marble greatsword. Carved in the image of a visored
Desc 3: knight in full armour, you see nothing of its face, and it makes no
Desc 4: sound as it steps towards you, greatsword ready to strike.

Name: white guardsman
Desc 1: Standing before you is a warrior of white, wielding a large
Desc 2: broadsword. His chain-mail and shield are of the purest white you
Desc 3: you have ever seen, and his drawn helm seems painted to match. The
Desc 4: guard does nothing as you gaze upon it, but ready for battle.

Name: white knight
Desc 1: A tall gallant figure shining brightly in white armour stands before
Desc 2: you wielding a large platinum greatsword. A tall plume rises out
Desc 3: about his visored greathelm. No sound of breath or voice comes from
Desc 4: him as he slowly moves towards you, holding a battle stance.

Name: white bishop
Desc 1: A tall elderly man stands here clothed entirely in white clothing.
Desc 2: A cloth miter rises proudly above him, and his white pupiless eyes
Desc 3: seem to watch your every move. For a moment he says nothing and then
Desc 4: his lips move, and you realize he is preparing an incantation!

Name: white marble golem
Desc 1: This large creation is twelve feet of white, moving rock. Two golden
Desc 2: eyes are all you see of its head, and it stomps down with slow,
Desc 3: powerful strides. It has no mouth and merely stalks you, ready to
Desc 4: pulverize you with its massive rock fists.

Name: white queen
Desc 1: Frigidly beautiful, this woman of white gazes at you imperiously.
Desc 2: Her face unmoving, she moves her hands in arcane gestures, showing no
Desc 3: emotion, even as she prepares to destroy you.

Name: white king
Desc 1: A figure of nobility and arrogance, this marble man stands before
Desc 2: you imperiously. Gazing at you with disdain bordering revulsion, he
Desc 3: wields a large sceptre of white marble. Though he wields it slowly,
Desc 4: he moves it with slow, deadly accuracy.

Name: black guardsman
Desc 1: Standing before you is a warrior of black, wielding a large
Desc 2: broadsword. His chain-mail and shield are of the darkest ebony you
Desc 3: you have ever seen, and his drawn helm seems painted to match. The
Desc 4: guard does nothing as you gaze upon it, but ready for battle.

Name: black knight
Desc 1: A tall ominous figure dressed entirely in black armour towers before
Desc 2: you wielding a cruel looking flail in one hand, and holding a long
Desc 3: battle shield in the other. No sound of breath or voice comes from
Desc 4: him as he slowly moves towards you, swinging his flail menacingly.

Name: black bishop
Desc 1: A tall elderly man stands here clothed entirely in black clothing.
Desc 2: A cloth miter rises proudly above him, and his ebony pupiless eyes
Desc 3: seem to watch your every move. For a moment he says nothing and then
Desc 4: his lips move, and you realize he is preparing an incantation!

Name: black marble golem
Desc 1: This large creation is twelve feet of black, moving rock. Two fiery
Desc 2: eyes are all you see of its head, and it stomps down with slow,
Desc 3: powerful strides. It has no mouth and merely stalks you, ready to
Desc 4: pulverize you with its massive rock fists.

Name: black queen
Desc 1: Harshly beautiful, this woman of black gazes at you imperiously.
Desc 2: Her face unmoving, she moves her hands in arcane gestures, showing no
Desc 3: emotion, even as she prepares to destroy you.

Name: black king
Desc 1: A figure of nobility and arrogance, this man of obsidian stands here
Desc 2: imperiously. Gazing at you with disdain bordering revulsion, he
Desc 3: wields a large sceptre of obsidian. Though he wields it slowly,
Desc 4: he moves it with slow, deadly accuracy.

Name: disenchanter
Desc 1: This fierce-looking guard looks at you with intense distrust. He
Desc 2: caries a shield with a crimson flame on it and wields a broadsword.
Desc 3: Garbed in crimson scale armour, he moves with unsettling confidence
Desc 4: and has a certain fanatical gleam to his eye.

Name: eradicator
Desc 1: This guard gives you a look bordering on hatred. Wielding a deadly
Desc 2: longsword, colored crimson to match his shield. Wearing crimson
Desc 3: leathers, he follows your every move with his eyes, filled with a
Desc 4: zealous rage.

Name: demonhunter
Desc 1: Scars and tatoos almost make this person unrecognizable. His stoney
Desc 2: eyes gaze at you, seeing nothing more then another target. Full scale
Desc 3: armour of crimson hue guard him against danger, while a massive
Desc 4: greatsword are held by his seasoned hands.

Name: red sphere
Desc 1: A round sphere of some unknown material floats here above you. Its
Desc 2: red shade seems to turn crimson and it emits an odd humming noise.
Desc 3: It is easy to discern by the way it floats about that it is aware of
Desc 4: Abruptly it begins to hum louder, and moves at high speed toward you!

Name: blue sphere
Desc 1: A round sphere of some unknown material floats here above you. Its
Desc 2: bluish color changes to dark shades and it emits an odd whirring.
Desc 3: It is easy to discern by the way it floats about that it is aware of
Desc 4: Abruptly it begins to hum louder, and moves at high speed toward you!

Name: green sphere
Desc 1: A round sphere of some unknown material floats here above you. Its
Desc 2: green shade wavers to emerald and it emits an odd clicking noise.
Desc 3: It is easy to discern by the way it floats about that it is aware of
Desc 4: Abruptly it begins to hum louder, and moves at high speed toward you!

Name: yellow sphere
Desc 1: A round sphere of some unknown material floats here above you. Its
Desc 2: yellow shade forms into brown and it emits an odd clacking noise.
Desc 3: It is easy to discern by the way it floats about that it is aware of
Desc 4: Abruptly it begins to hum louder, and moves at high speed toward you!

Name: Nahr
Desc 1: A mass of weaving arms surrounds this ten foot tall monstrosity. Two
Desc 2: crimson eyes gaze at you with immense hatred, and its large maw
Desc 3: gushes with saliva. Spikes protrude from its body at all angles, and
Desc 4: two large wings flex mightily. Nahr howls furiously and charges!

Name: black guardsman
Desc 1: Standing before you is a warrior of black, wielding a large
Desc 2: broadsword. His chain-mail and shield are of the darkest ebony you
Desc 3: you have ever seen, and his drawn helm seems painted to match. The
Desc 4: guard does nothing as you gaze upon it, but ready for battle.

Name: cloaked figure
Desc 1: A figure shrouded in darkness by its over-sized cape stands here
Desc 2: before you. Standing at about six feet, it is hard to size up this
Desc 3: humanoid. Nothing can be seen of its face or its body, only its hood
Desc 4: where you hear the faints sounds of breath being drawn.

Name: disenchanter
Desc 1: This fierce-looking guard looks at you with intense distrust. He
Desc 2: caries a shield with a crimson flame on it and wields a broadsword.
Desc 3: Garbed in crimson scale armour, he moves with unsettling confidence
Desc 4: and has a certain fanatical gleam to his eye.

Name: demon imp
Desc 1: Covered in horns and a sickening slime, this pointy nosed being gazes
Desc 2: at you with an undeniable leer. Long spindly fingers flex with a
Desc 3: sickening anticipation, and you find it hard to bear looking at this
Desc 4: monster any longer.

Name: constrictor
Desc 1: More then thirty feet long this brown and green banded serpent moves
Desc 2: exceedingly quickly for its massive size.  A large forked tongue
Desc 3: slips in and out of its mouth as it stares at you longingly with deep
Desc 4: crimson eyes.

Name: dae asp
Desc 1: Five feet long this dusty brown snake would not be so menacing if not
Desc 2: for the three pairs of fangs it now displays before you.  Many an
Desc 3: adventurer has a tale of near death to accompany one of the trademark
Desc 4: six-holed bite wounds.

Name: jeweled viper
Desc 1: Sparkling in the sunlight this snake could easily be mistaken for a
Desc 2: three to four foot necklace of polished gems. As it slithers forward
Desc 3: you note that its pearl white skull is clearly visible through what
Desc 4: must be transparent skin. Fangs appear as it prepares to strike.

Name: silver cobra
Desc 1: The hood of the silver cobra spread wide before you gives a clear
Desc 2: sight to the silvery grey belly scales that contrast so greatly with
Desc 3: the jet black ones that cover most of the snakes body.

Name: orc warlord
Desc 1: Massive muscles ripple underneath the black scale armour of this
Desc 2: vicious-looking orc. Hardened in the fires of countless battles, the
Desc 3: orc warlord is a ruthless and cunning leader who does not hesitate to
Desc 4: sacrifice his troops when needed, and never retreats from combat.

Name: orc captain
Desc 1: This tall, powerfully built orc has jet black skin and glowing red
Desc 2: eyes. He wears glittering black chainmail, and wields a heavy
Desc 3: scimitar. His evil grin exposes his sharp yellow fangs.

Name: ogre gladiator
Desc 1: The massive ogres bred for arena combat are fierce indeed. Their
Desc 2: stupidity has been focused so that they obey every command from their
Desc 3: superiors, and their berserk fighting style makes them devastating
Desc 4: in battle.

Name: orc lieutenant
Desc 1: This tall, ferocious-looking orc wears chainmail and wields a razor-
Desc 2: sharp scimitar, a sure sign of high rank. He is disciplined and holds
Desc 3: himself in such a manner as to indicate that he knows how to use his
Desc 4: weapon skilfully.

Name: orc warrior
Desc 1: This tall, muscular orc is garbed in a well-maintained suit of
Desc 2: chainmail, and glares at you through the eyeslits of a steel helm. He
Desc 3: wields a wickedly-curved scimitar, and wields it with deadly
Desc 4: competence.

Name: orc fanatic
Desc 1: Garbed in a sleevless leather tunic, runic tattoos play across the
Desc 2: orc's well muscled arms. A wicked looking halberd made of the orcish
Desc 3: black steel moves fluidly back and forth in the beasts hands with the
Desc 4: quickness of a weapon half its size.

Name: guard captain
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is clad in glittering black plate and
Desc 2: chainmail. Dark eyes peer at you maliciously from within its steel
Desc 3: helm. It wields a finely crafted broadsword, and moves with the grace
Desc 4: and discipline of the master warrior.

Name: elite guard
Desc 1: This tall, muscular figure wears glittering black chainmail armour,
Desc 2: and holds a black shield emblazoned with a red horned skull. It
Desc 3: wields a fine broadsword, and a golden brooch holding its cloak
Desc 4: declares it as a being of rank.

Name: dark cleric
Desc 1: The figure standing before you is clad in enameled black chainmail,
Desc 2: and wears a hooded mask so that you cannot see its face. It wields a
Desc 3: spiked morning-star, and carries a large shield with a hideous horned
Desc 4: skull emblazoned on it. It moves without uttering a sound.

Name: dark mage
Desc 1: This hunched, black-robed figure creeps about with the aid of a
Desc 2: gnarled staff. Embroidered in crimson thread upon the chest and cuffs
Desc 3: of its robe is a hideous horned skull. Eyes glitter darkly at you
Desc 4: from the depths of its hood, and an aura of evil power surrounds it.

Name: dark assassin
Desc 1: This lean, stooped figure is tightly swathed in jet black robes. A
Desc 2: horned skull is emblazoned on its chest, and a pair of straight
Desc 3: blades hang on its back. It moves with the incredibly quiet grace of
Desc 4: the trained killer.

Name: dark warrior
Desc 1: This tall, imposing figure is entirely clad in glittering black
Desc 2: platemail. It wields a heavy greatsword, and a tabard with the symbol
Desc 3: of a red horned skull hangs upon its chest. It stands with the
Desc 4: discipline of the trained fighter.

Name: adolescent red dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in blood-red scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from its
Desc 4: mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: young red dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright red scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from its
Desc 4: mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: baby red dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twelve feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in bright orange scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A wisp of smoke trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: adolescent green dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in emerald green scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: young green dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about twenty feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in dark green scales. It has long talons and fangs, and its
Desc 3: wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from its
Desc 4: mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: baby green dragon
Desc 1: This large reptilian creature is about thirteen feet long, and is
Desc 2: covered in light green scales. It has long talons and fangs, and
Desc 3: its wingspan is easily twice its length. A green cloud trails from
Desc 4: its mouth as it looks at you with its glittering black eyes.

Name: duergar captain
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully. His
Desc 3: skin is sallow and greyish, his demeanor calculating and cruel. The
Desc 4: so-called deep dwarves are reknowned for their hatred of the good.

Name: duergar warrior
Desc 1: This powerfully-build dwarf wears heavy mail and wields a broad axe.
Desc 2: From beneath his iron helmet his dark eyes peer out watchfully. His
Desc 3: skin is sallow and greyish, his demeanor calculating and cruel. The
Desc 4: so-called deep dwarves are reknowned for their hatred of the good.

Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: giant rat
Desc 1: This appears to be a mutant rat, grown to dog's size by some unknown
Desc 2: force. Its beady red eyes peer at you along the length of its dirty
Desc 3: muzzle, and it flicks its hairless pink tail nervously. The giant rat
Desc 4: has sharp, yellow teeth that could inflict sizeable wounds.

Name: saracen raider
Desc 1: This tall, arrogant warrior is nothing more than a self-righteous
Desc 2: brigand. Barely believing in the extreme religion he follows, he is
Desc 3: a thug and murderer who lives simply to bring pain upon others. The
Desc 4: only law he lives by is the rule of greater strength.

Name: saracen leader
Desc 1: This tall, arrogant warrior is nothing more than a self-righteous
Desc 2: brigand. Barely believing in the extreme religion he follows, he is
Desc 3: a thug and murderer who lives simply to bring pain upon others. He
Desc 4: leads only because he is stronger or more ruthless than the others.
